product.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A Kids with Kids Shock Proof Convertible Handle Light Weight Super Protective Stand Cover Case and S Pen (9.7, Wi-Fi) (White Tablet and Green Case)
product.product_body: The tablets SignLine are selling are from UK stock so you can be sure you have the full 2 year Samsung warranty that you will not get from an import from outside the UK/EU. CPU Speed 1.2GHz, CPU Type Quad-Core, Size Main Display) 9.7" (245.8mm), Resolution (Main Display) 1024 x 768 (XGA), Technology (Main Display) TFT, Color Depth (Main Display) 16M, S Pen Support Yes.

features.feature: Powerful Performance: Equipped with a 1.2GHz Quad Core processor, 2GB RAM and Lollipop, the latest AndroidTM OS, the Galaxy Tab A delivers powerful performance with a simplified UI, tailored to a new screen ratio. Enjoy seamless access to a variety of multimedia contents, including movies, music, and the Internet, all at lightning-fast speeds.

Optimal Viewing Experience: Take your web browsing and reading experience to the next level with the Galaxy Tab A. Its 4:3 aspect ratio screen is ideal for reading books, magazines and newspapers, as well as surfing the net.

Sleek, Modern Feel: Meet the stunning new Galaxy Tab A - an eye-catching device with sophisticated simplicity. Only 7.5 mm thick and just 487 g, the Galaxy Tab A provides you with unbeatable portability, as well as a firm, secure grip. Continuous Shot: Thanks to the continuous shot feature, you can capture multiple consecutive images by just holding down the Galaxy Tab A's camera button. Find all the camera and video controls you require on one simple easy-to-use screen.

Fun for the Kids: The Galaxy Tab A's Kids Mode offers a range of child-friendly apps designed to educate, entertain, and develop interests and skills. With a time limit function, you can regulate the time your child spends using the tablet. Better Photos with Auto Focus: The Galaxy Tab A's 5 MP rear camera provides you with outstanding photography options. Its auto focus feature makes it easier for you to take clearer pictures and videos. Use this function to scan QR codes and barcodes easily, providing you with even more exciting interaction opportunities.

Unique Pen Experience: Enjoy a natural pen-like experience when writing and drawing thanks to the Galaxy Tab A S Pen. Its newly added calligraphy feature makes your writing look more unique and attractive than ever. You can also use the S Pen to drag and drop multiple files and photos and make easy adjustments to your schedule. Free Premium Content and Services: Enjoy an array of free contents with the Galaxy Tab A. Included with your purchase is a free six-month subscription to The Economist, a 12-week subscription to the New York Times, and a monthly free e-book download via the Kindle for Samsung app.

features.feature: Powerful Performance: Equipped with a 1.2GHz Quad Core processor, 2GB RAM and Lollipop, the latest AndroidTM OS, the Galaxy Tab A delivers powerful performance with a simplified UI, tailored to a new screen ratio. Enjoy seamless access to a variety of multimedia contents, including movies, music, and the Internet, all at lightning-fast speeds.

Optimal Viewing Experience: Take your web browsing and reading experience to the next level with the Galaxy Tab A. Its 4:3 aspect ratio screen is ideal for reading books, magazines and newspapers, as well as surfing the net.

Sleek, Modern Feel: Meet the stunning new Galaxy Tab A - an eye-catching device with sophisticated simplicity. Only 7.5 mm thick and just 487 g, the Galaxy Tab A provides you with unbeatable portability, as well as a firm, secure grip. Continuous Shot: Thanks to the continuous shot feature, you can capture multiple consecutive images by just holding down the Galaxy Tab A's camera button. Find all the camera and video controls you require on one simple easy-to-use screen.

Fun for the Kids: The Galaxy Tab A's Kids Mode offers a range of child-friendly apps designed to educate, entertain, and develop interests and skills. With a time limit function, you can regulate the time your child spends using the tablet. Better Photos with Auto Focus: The Galaxy Tab A's 5 MP rear camera provides you with outstanding photography options. Its auto focus feature makes it easier for you to take clearer pictures and videos. Use this function to scan QR codes and barcodes easily, providing you with even more exciting interaction opportunities.

Unique Pen Experience: Enjoy a natural pen-like experience when writing and drawing thanks to the Galaxy Tab A S Pen. Its newly added calligraphy feature makes your writing look more unique and attractive than ever. You can also use the S Pen to drag and drop multiple files and photos and make easy adjustments to your schedule. Free Premium Content and Services: Enjoy an array of free contents with the Galaxy Tab A. Included with your purchase is a free six-month subscription to The Economist, a 12-week subscription to the New York Times, and a monthly free e-book download via the Kindle for Samsung app.

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Kitchen Duo Scourer Twin Pack (10)
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-BriteTM has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. The Scotch-BriteTM Kitchen Duo non-scratch sponge scourer makes scrubbing household surfaces quick and easy. Suitable for use all over the home, it will make light work of cleaning burnt-on food from your pots and pans or stubborn residue from the bathroom sink. The soft silver side is gentle enough for your most delicate surfaces, whilst the coloured side will cut through dirt and grease fast and effectively to leave your home gleaming. Kind to hands and comfortable to hold - even without rubber gloves - its thick inner sponge means that it is flexible enough to wrap around the contours of awkward shapes and squeeze into tight corners to make tricky cleaning jobs a doddle. Unlike traditional scouring pads, the Kitchen Duo is easy to rinse and wring out and will clean effectively for longer. Thanks to its powerful performance, you'll also find you need less chemical cleaning fluid - so it's economical and kinder to the environment too.

features.feature: Dual-purpose kitchen scourers
Coloured side scours through grease quickly and effectively
Superior scouring technology for sinks and surfaces
Silver side gently cleans delicate surfaces

product.title: 3M 80611211550 35 Scotch Electrical Colour Coding Tape, Vinyl, 19 mm x 20 m, White
product.product_body: 3M Scotch 35 Tape is a superb quality colour coding tape with excellent electrical insulating properties. The tape functions specifically well at colder temperatures and with its elasticated memory properties it dramatically outperforms cheaper alternatives. Scotch 35 vinyl electrical colour coding tape is used in phase identification, colour coding leads and piping systems and for marking safety areas. This tape is abrasion and weather-resistant, with excellent mechanical and electrical insulation properties that wraps smoothly and holds tight over a wide range of temperatures. UL Listed and CSA Certified, and is flame-retardant. Excellent all-weather performance in cold to -18(degree)C or hot to 105(degree)C.

features.feature: White, 0.178mm x 19mm x 20m roll supplied in a protective case
High dielectric strength, provides moisture tight mechanical & electrical protection with minimum bulk
Excellent resistance to abrasion, moisture, alkalis, acids, corrosion and varying weather conditions
Applicable for use in indoor and outdoor applications
Primary electrical insulation for all wire and cable splices and repairs, harnessing of wires and cables & protective jacketing

product.product_body:
The FUTURO Custom Dial Wrist Stabiliser features two adjustable dials that provide personalised fit and stabilization, in addition to allowing on-the-go-adjustments. The lacing system eliminates confusing straps and helps prevent loosening. The low-cut, ergonomic shape allows for freedom of hand movement, and the breathable, soft materials offer all day comfort and support. Easy sleeve design for quick and easy application. For use on right hand.

product.title: Scotch® 371 Packing Tape 48mm x 132m (36)
product.product_body: Buff Scotch Packing Tape - Easy Peel, Secure Stick Scotch Packing Tape has a rich heritage and 3M is still one of the leaders of packing tape and adhesive technology. We ensure that our brown packing tape is easy to peel off the roll yet provides a strong stick and seal. The hot melt tape is solvent free, abrasion resistant and will stick and fit edges to provide a tight seal. The strong but light packing tape is durable and consistent. Its resilience against splitting makes it a high quality sealing tape for all packaging. We recommend that you test products prior to use to ensure suitability.

features.feature: Good quality, general purpose box sealing Scotch packing tape from 3M
Polypropylene backing and a hot melt, solvent free synthetic rubber resin adhesive system
Consistent and reliable performance in a wide range of environments and applications
Ideal for all your package, envelope and box-sealing needs
At 132m these are double the length of most rolls that are 66m long

product.title: FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Replacement Filter (1, FAPF-04)
product.product_body: Replacement Filters For FiltreteTM Ultra Slim, Standard and Large Room Air Purifier - FAPF-01/02, FAPF-03 and FAP-04. These replacement air purifier filters are suitable for the FiltreteTM Air Purifier, check which one is for your purifier machine. Thanks to the quality materials and top filtering technology of this product, it provides a higher Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) than equivalent Hepa filters. As well as boasting a 99.9% removal rate when it comes to pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores, this FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Replacement Filter also offers an unrivalled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rates and value for money. The filter works by effectively capturing particles that are commonly found around the home including dust, pet dander, cigarette smoke, other smoke and even particles that carry odours and viruses. Securely trapped in the filter, these disruptive particles are no longer floating around the house, which means that any potential causes of discomfort - which may result in breathing difficulties, itchy eyes, irritated skin and many of the other symptoms of allergies - are eliminated. With an allergy UK seal of approval when used in conjunction with FiltreteTM Air Purifiers, this product can effectively help to alleviate the symptoms of allergies and hay fever or simply provide a cleaner living environment. * 99.9% effective at removing particles from the air which passes through the purifier. 3M Recommends filter change after 3 months of continuous use: To ensure particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning. To ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained; that's why washing the filters wouldn't work. Replacing the filter is important for maintaining the effectiveness of your FiltreteTM Room Air Purifier

features.feature: 99.9% effective removal of pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores*
Offers high filtering performance.
Unrivalled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rate and value for money
Allergy UK seal of approval

The filter works by effectively capturing particles that are commonly found around the home including dust, pet dander, cigarette smoke, other smoke and even particles that carry odours and viruses. Securely trapped in the filter, these disruptive particles are no longer floating around the house, which means that any potential causes of discomfort - which may result in breathing difficulties, itchy eyes, irritated skin and many of the other symptoms of allergies - are eliminated. With an allergy UK seal of approval when used in conjunction with FiltreteTM Air Purifiers, this product can effectively help to alleviate the symptoms of allergies and hay fever or simply provide a cleaner living environment. * 99.9% effective at removing particles from the air which passes through the purifier. 3M Recommends filter change after 3 months of continuous use: To ensure particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning. To ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained; that's why washing the filters wouldn't work. Replacing the filter is important for maintaining the effectiveness of your FiltreteTM Room Air Purifier

features.feature: 99.9% effective removal of pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores*

Unrivalled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rate and value for money

product.title: Mio 305E HR + C GPS Cycle Computer - White/Black
product.product_body: Meet the Mio Cyclo 305 HC: the easy-to-use, rugged bicycle navigation device for anyone who enjoys cycling and likes to keep track of their performances. The Mio Cyclo 305 HC allows you to navigate easily from point A to B or to follow your own preferred routes. The turn-by-turn navigation effortlessly guides you, indicating every instruction with a clear sound alert. It has never been so easy to keep track of your performance, analyse your data, and improve your health. With preinstalled Western Europe maps and a Heart rate monitor and Speed/cadence sensor included in the box, the Mio Cyclo 305 HC makes navigating, sharing your experiences and monitoring your performance easy and suits the needs of every recreational or sportive user.

features.feature: Includes heart rate monitor and speed/cadence sensor
Anti-glare touch screen
Rugged & waterproof
Includes West Europe Maps
Long-life rechargeable battery

product.title: Navman 5262N4290071 - MIO CYCLO 315 UK
product.product_body: Navman 5262N4290071 - MIO CYCLO 315 UK

product.title: Mio Cyclo 315 with Pre-Installed Western Europe maps
product.product_body: Meet the Mio Cyclo 315: the lightweight, easy-to-use bicycle navigation device, designed with an anti-glare flat screen, perfectly readable in the brightest sunlight. With cycle paths and road maps pre-installed, you can get started right out of the box. The Mio Cyclo 315 allows you to navigate easily from point A to B or to follow your preferred routes. However, if you choose to use the unique Surprise Me feature, the Mio Cyclo 315 will offer you three surprising bicycle routes based upon your entered time, distance or destination. This is the ideal feature for anyone who doesn't feel like downloading tracks: you just choose Surprise Me, and you can get on your bike and go. The flat, anti-glare 3" touch screen and lightweight design make the Mio Cyclo 315 perfect for anyone who likes stylish design and wants a slimline device to fit on their lightweight bike. The turn-by-turn navigation effortlessly guides you, indicating every instruction with a clear sound alert. With a simple menu structure and clear on-screen buttons, the Mio Cyclo 315 offers you true ease of use. With the MioShare desktop application you are able to store your data and manage your route history. The easy-to-use application allows you to download routes and enjoy new roads and areas that others fi nd interesting. The application is also your one-stop shop for managing your device and downloading map updates, software updates or the latest product information. And as the Mio Cyclo 315 is compatible with most third party platforms, you can easily upload your tracks to your preferred one. The Mio Cyclo 315 is fully equipped for the dedicated cyclist. As well as measuring everything you need to know about your performance, it also offers you workout programs, which can be done outdoors, but also indoors when the weather is not allowing you to cycle outside. It comes with a built-in ANT+ sensor, allowing you to easily connect with a wireless heart-rate monitor, wheel- and cadence sensor.

features.feature: Slim, lightweight, Rugged and waterproof
Pre-installed West Europe maps
Unique Surprise Me feature
Long-life rechargeable battery
Built-in ANT+ sensor

product.title: Gowe®Automatic Tape Dispenser,Electric Tape Dispenser
product.product_body: Features Only need to stick the tape tip to the outlet, then the tape at a required length will come out autoally. Auto mode and Manual mode is selective, in Auto mode, it will cut tape autoally. When a long tape is needed, keep pressing "FORWARD" key to the desired length, then press "CUT" key. The cutter unit cassette can be removed and replaced easily (tape jamming can be also easily fixed). The cutting length is shown on the LED display, you can set the cutting length easily by "CM" and "MM" key. Available tape type: PVC tape, paper tape, cloth tape, glass tape, pp tape, kraft adhesive tape ect. Freature: Can cut various tapes, low price and strong function make this model very popular all over the world! Specifications Available Width: 7 ~ 50mm Available Length: 5 ~ 999mm Display: 3 digit LED Power Supply: AC110V 60Hz / AC220V 50Hz 18W Measurement & Weight: 218×137×150mm 3.5Kg

product.title: Anki OVERDRIVE (Launch Bundle)
product.product_body: To get started with Anki OVERDRIVE, you need to make sure you have the Starter Kit. A start/finish track piece must be used in all track configurations and is only included in the Starter Kit. Download the free Anki OVERDRIVE app on a compatible iOS or Android device to control the cars on the track. Each player requires their own compatible device. Up to 4 cars can play at any time. If you want to play cross device a WiFi connection is required.

product.title: Mumbles Velvet Bear (Medium, Brown)
product.product_body: Mumbles bears love getting dressed up, and that's why we're pleased there's such a huge selection of clothes for us to choose from. We don't mind what we wear, because every item in our clothing range is beautifully made and designed to fit perfectly. We are made from the finest quality materials and are stringently tested, ensuring that we always comply to EN71 European Toy Safety Standards. Although we love children, we are not suitable for little ones under the age of three months because we have small parts. What makes Mumbles bears different We think that the Mumbles family is pretty special, and believe that it's the small details that make us stand out from other teddy bears on the market. We're all really happy to be a part of such a first-rate group, so you can't get rid of the grin on our distinctive faces! A smart ribbon for the undressed members of the family (Monty, Bracken, Bertie, Brumble, Otis), and well-made clothes for the ones who are pre-dressed (Honey, Benson, Binx) complete our special look we think! Why Mumbles bears are good for retail We think it's important that we can be sold separately and so to make this easier for our prospective owners, we're all individually barcoded and have smart swing tags attached to our ears. Ways to use Mumbles bears Mumbles bears are truly content little chaps and are perfect for a hundred and one different things. Happy homes that we have ended up in have included hotels (gifts left on pillows); shops (decorated with happy birthday and congratulations messages for example); sports teams (as a lucky mascot); companies (leave behinds on visits as a token of appreciation for clients). This is just a small selection of examples however - the only limit to how you can use a Mumbles bear is your imagination!

features.feature: •Velvet Bears •Light Brown or Cream bear with contrast nose
•Suitable for children of all ages
•Brown ribbon with cream spots
•Hand Wash •100% Polyester Plush Fur
•Complies with EN71 European Toy Safety regulations

3M Ultrathon Insect Repellant Lotion Pdq by 3M
Box of 12 3M UltraThon Insect Repellent with 34.34% DEET
product.product_body: Ultrathon, with patented 3M Controlled Release Technology, repels mosquitoes for up to twelve hours. Provides continuous protection for up to 12 hours. Splash and sweat resistant to protect even in the most challenging environments. Active Ingredient: DEET (34.34%). Ultrathon is slower to evaporate making it effective long after other repellents have dissipated. Stay bite-free and more importantly disease-free by repelling mosquitoes that may carry West Nile Virus and ticks that may carry Lyme disease. Also repels biting flies, chiggers and gnats. Resists perspiration, rain and water splashes.

features.feature: Time-release formula provides up to 12-hours of protection; resists rain, water splashes
Active ingredient 34.34% DEET offers a high level of protection against mosquitoes, ticks, flies
DEET (N, N-Dimethyl-metatoluamide) is the most effective insect repellent available
Lotion absorbs quickly; features a light outdoor scent
1 Box of 12 Ultrathon Insect Lotion

product.title: 3M Ultrathon SRL-12 2 Oz Insect Repellent Lotion - 3 PACK
product.product_body: TIME RELEASE PROTECTION PROVEN FORMULA SPLASH & SWEAT RESISTANT Time Release Protection means DEET is slower to evaporate and provides protection after others have dissipated - up to 12 hours of protection against mosquitoes. Ultrathon's Time Release Protection gives the user a balanced mix between concentration of DEET and long lasting protection. Our unique technology provides longer lasting protection with less DEET. Ships as a Pack of 3.

Time Release Protection means DEET is slower to evaporate and provides protection after others have dissipated - up to 12 hours of protection against mosquitoes.

product.title: 3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent Lotion, 2-Ounce pack of 6
product.product_body: 3M Ultrathon insect repellent was developed for the military to provide long lasting, time released protection against mosquitoes for up to 12 hours. Repels Ticks that may carry West Nile Virus and also mosquitoes, biting flies, chiggers, gnats, fleas and deer flies. Splash & Sweat Resistant. Unique 3M Polymer Technologh optimized to enhance the efficacy of DEET and provide time controlled release of DEET. Stable in Freeze/Thaw conditions. 5 year guarantee. Consistantly rated as a top insect repellent by independent testing labs. Tested in the harshest conditions of South America. Works longer with less DEET. Competitive products are alcohol based and when the alcohol evaporates you lose your protection. Ultrathon uses the time released technology to provide a longer lasting repellent.

product.title: 3MTM Headlight Restoration Kit, Microfibre Cloth and Wurth 400ml Clear Lacquer Spray Special
product.product_body: DIY Headlight Restoration Kit from 3M The 3M Headlight Restoration Kit is a fast and effective DIY solution for hazed or discoloured automotive lights. The drill-mounted system is easy to use and the kit contains everything you need to restore all the lights on your vehicle. Including abrasives, masking tape, a mounting system, pads and polish, this kit isn't just an incredibly cost effective solution - it also saves valuable time and effort. Investing in a DIY headlight restoration kit is a much cheaper alternative compared to enlisting the help of a professional garage, and can even eliminate the need to buy brand new lights. Complete step-by-step instructions are included so that even beginners will be able to carry out the work themselves. Helpful pictures and an online video ensure that the process is as quick, efficient and stress-free as possible. The 3M Headlight Restoration Kit is a highly recommended product that gets fantastic reviews from happy customers, who now have headlights that look as good as new. Headlight Restoration Kit - Step by Step 1. Mask around headlight using masking tape provided 2. Sand headlight using gold discs on backup pad provided using household drill until a uniform matte finished is achieved 3. Sand again using white discs & wipe off any dust 4. Restore clarity using orange pad & sachet of compound 5. Wipe off any residue or repeat step 4 if needed. Paint protection kit includes clear film to template your headlight, paint protection film to cut the part from, and a 3M Ventureshield squeegee to apply it with. Film supplied is dependent on stock and will be either Nano-Fusion, Oraguard 280 or 280F, or Suntek topcoat. We will in time provide the film pre-cut to suit your vehicles headlight, we may have the pattern already, just get in touch and ask if we have! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JVJ3agudhQY https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UEJbKLZ7RmM

features.feature: DIY headlight restoration kit, Easy drill-mounted system. Free Wurth Screenwash Additive worth £5.99 with every order.
•Improves visibility at night, •Contains all products for a full lense repair
Restores Dull/ Faded/ Discoloured Headlights, Saves time and money.
Paint Protection Film available to maintain the restoration by protecting from stone chips and road dirt.
•Restores cloudy and dull headlights, •Removes scratches and scuffs

product.title: 3MTM Headlight Restoration Kit, Paint Protection Film with Templating Film and 3M Squeegee
product.product_body: DIY Headlight Restoration Kit from 3M The 3M Headlight Restoration Kit is a fast and effective DIY solution for hazed or discoloured automotive lights. The drill-mounted system is easy to use and the kit contains everything you need to restore all the lights on your vehicle. Including abrasives, masking tape, a mounting system, pads and polish, this kit isn't just an incredibly cost effective solution - it also saves valuable time and effort. Investing in a DIY headlight restoration kit is a much cheaper alternative compared to enlisting the help of a professional garage, and can even eliminate the need to buy brand new lights. Complete step-by-step instructions are included so that even beginners will be able to carry out the work themselves. Helpful pictures and an online video ensure that the process is as quick, efficient and stress-free as possible. The 3M Headlight Restoration Kit is a highly recommended product that gets fantastic reviews from happy customers, who now have headlights that look as good as new. Headlight Restoration Kit - Step by Step 1. Mask around headlight using masking tape provided 2. Sand headlight using gold discs on backup pad provided using household drill until a uniform matte finished is achieved 3. Sand again using white discs & wipe off any dust 4. Restore clarity using orange pad & sachet of compound 5. Wipe off any residue or repeat step 4 if needed. Paint protection kit includes clear film to template your headlight, paint protection film to cut the part from, and a 3M Ventureshield squeegee to apply it with. Film supplied is dependent on stock and will be either Nano-Fusion, Oraguard 280 or 280F, or Suntek topcoat. We will in time provide the film pre-cut to suit your vehicles headlight, we may have the pattern already, just get in touch and ask if we have! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JVJ3agudhQY

features.feature: DIY headlight restoration kit, Easy drill-mounted system.
•Improves visibility at night, •Contains all products for a full lense repair
Restores Dull/ Faded/ Discoloured Headlights, Saves time and money.
Paint Protection Kit available to maintain the restoration by protecting from stone chips and road dirt.
•Restores cloudy and dull headlights, •Removes scratches and scuffs

product.title: Bike Protection Tape - 100mm x 1000mm roll of 8671HS Helicopter Tape - Strong Clear Protective Film - made by 3M
product.product_body: 3MTM Polyurethane Protective Tape 8671HS is made from an abrasion-resistant polyurethane elastomer that resists punctures, tearing, abrasion and erosion. It is formulated for resistance to ultraviolet light. 3M 8671HS tape provides a simple, easy method of protecting a surface from corrosion, abrasion and minor impact damage. It can be installed in a minimum amount of time with simple tools. It can be painted or applied over painted surfaces. 3M 8671HS tape is constructed with a long-aging, solvent-resistant, pressure-sensitive acrylic adhesive that is protected with an easy-to-release paper liner.

features.feature: Incredibly tough tape - used in aeronautical industry to protect helicopter rotor blades
Roll is 10cm wide by 100cm long - plenty to cover main parts of a bike
The tape is clear and has a peel-off white liner
3M's thickest & strongest heli tape

product.title: Wurth Ultra 2040 Lubricant, Penetrant and Water Displacer 500ml
product.product_body: Silicone free Your advantage: • Safe to use around bodyshops. Contains PTFE Your advantages: • Provides long term lubrication for locks, runners, guides and other items prone wear, etc. • Prevents squeaking e.g. door hinges. Superb capillary action Your advantages: • Penetrates into the tightest tolerances to provide lubrication. • Loosens seized and rusted parts. Displaces moisture Your advantages: • Ideal for insulating electrical systems. • Prevents corrosion. • Drives water out of electrics. Contains corrosion inhibitors Your advantage: • Provides long term protection from corrosion. Gives a shine to surfaces Your advantage: • Ideal for valeting inside and outside of vehicle. Around vehicle: • Displaces moisture from all electrical systems. • Lubricates door hinges, locks and fuel caps. • Lubricates window and seat runners. • Loosens seized nuts and bolts. • Also ideal for boats, caravans and motorcycles. Around the home: • Loosens seized and rusted parts. • Lubricates door hinges and locks. • Lubricates bicycle chains and gear assemblies. • Protects and lubricates garden tools, power tools, drill chucks etc.

features.feature: Ultra 2040 Lubricant, penetrant & water displacer
With PTFE and 360 degree valve
Loosens seized and rusted parts, Prevents squeaking
Displaces moisture from electrical systems, corrosion inhibitors
Ideal for restoring and shining plastic components.

product.title: 3M Aura 9332+C Particle Mask for Working with Insulation Materials and Hardwood Protection Level FFP3
product.product_body: The right and convenient choice for toxic particles. The secret of the 3M Aura 9322+ particle mask is the hardly noticeable breathing resistance with reliable performance filter and the three-piece design. This allows the shallow folds of the mask on the carriage in the pocket and ease of speech while wearing. The mask is particularly pleasant on the skin, thanks to the soft inner fleece. With the use of the chin strap, it can be easily positioned and seated, thanks to the special design of the nose region. The integrated nose piece with sweat padding makes it the suitable partner for eyeglass wearers. Another comfort factor is the 3M Cool Flow valve technology, which facilitates the outflow of warm, moist air from the breathing mask and prevents heat build-up. The mask is suitable for roof insulation with insulating wool, the hard woodworking, wall and ceiling repairs. They can be folded flat and is thus practically to take along in your pocket. The product conforms to the protection level FFP3 and meets the safety requirements of the European standard EN 149: 2001 and A1: 2009 FFP3 NR D.

product.title: Scotch 48mm x 12.7m Polka Dot Design Decorative Packaging Tape on an Easy Start Dispenser - Pink
product.product_body:
Bring a pop of personality to your parcels with this fun, colourful packaging tape. With good sticking power and long lasting hold, it’s ideal for wrapping lighter boxes and sealing padded envelopes for sending through the post. Want to make an impression when selling online? This tape will make your packages stand out and put a smile on the recipient’s face, which can only help your ratings! When it comes to mailing gifts, treats and birthday surprises, wrap your package with colour and style and make it extra-special. Despite its light-hearted appearance, this tape has been designed for shipping and is the same great quality material that you’d expect from traditional Scotch Packaging Tape. It is strong and sticky, providing a reliable seal without drying out, splitting or coming unstuck. The Easy Start Dispenser unwinds the tape accurately and easily, without tangling or wrinkling, to give a smooth, secure seal in seconds. No more twisted bundles of wasted tape or nasty bits stuck in your teeth - just run the dispenser along the gap to be sealed, then angle it up to cut off the tape at the required length. The dispenser itself is small, neat and easy to store – perfect for the home or office. This pack contains one roll of Scotch Decorative Packaging Tape printed with a pink polka dot design. The roll is 48mm wide and 12.7m long, and comes pre-loaded onto an Easy Start Dispenser. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 roll of tape on a dispenser

product.title: 3MTM Perfect-ItTM Polishing Back-up Pad 125 mm (M14) 09552 (1)
product.product_body: The simple hook and loop system of this back-up pad makes the attachment of compounding and polishing pads quick and easy. A nylon plate is bonded to a thick layer of foam that provides excellent impact resistance and durability no matter the job. The unique characteristics of this product also give it a high level of flexibility, which means that even moving between flat and contoured surfaces is simple and quick. A substantial amount of soft foam padding means that users can operate their polisher with the utmost confidence to achieve a better quality, professional-looking finish when it comes to polishing and paint corrections. Durable and long-lasting, they offer an incredibly cost-effective solution with superb value for money. A valuable addition to any car restoration kit. For best results, use a 3M Perfect-ItTM Polishing Back-Up Pad to attach a 3M Polishing Pad to your M14 Thread Rotary Machine Polisher.

features.feature: For attachment to m14 thread rotary machine polishers
Fits 3MTM Electric Car Polisher 240v, 1 Pack (64393)
Durable and long-lasting performance

product.title: 4 X Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Scourer Twinpack Ref HP4-2 [Pack 6]
3 X Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Scourer Twinpack Ref HP4-2 [Pack 6]
2 X Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Scourer Twinpack Ref HP4-2 [Pack 6]
3M Marine Cleaner and Wax
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax is a dual action product that removes imperfections like light oxidation, rust, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains to restore shine in half the time. This unique blend of rubbing compound and waxes is suitable for use on all fibreglass, topside paints and gel coat repairs, where it leaves behind a hard coat of wax that protects surfaces from further damage caused by sunlight, salt water and pollutants. With 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax you combine two restoration steps into one - saving you money and leaving you more time to enjoy your boat. This pack contains 1 x 500 ml bottle of 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax. For the treatment of heavier oxidation, try 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax.

features.feature: Dual action boat wax and fibreglass cleaner
Ideal for fibreglass repair, gel coat restoration and general boat detailing
Removes lighter oxidation, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains
One step restores shine and protects from further damage
*For treatment of medium - heavy oxidation, try our fibreglass restorer and wax

product.title: Oraguard 280 Tape 15cm x 3m roll
product.product_body: Provide exceptional protection from grit, stones and scratches. Protects paintwork from stone chips and light abrasions. Paint Protection Film we use mainly for vehicles, cars, boats, motorbikes, aircraft, can also be used for mobile phone screens and body protection, sat nav screens, mountain bikes, tired glass and plastics, scuffed surfaces look like new with this film applied. We supply a squeegee for application. On rear of backing sheet we place clear low tack film, you can use this to apply to bike frame, draw the part you want to cut, you can then place this on the face of the protective film and cut it to the shape you require before fitting. http://www.orafol.com/gp/europe/en/products/laminating-mounting-films-industrial-tapes-7376-details/items/oraguard-280-stone-guard-film

features.feature: Transparent and exceptionally tough. provides unparalled abrasion and erosion resistance
Will not discolour or yellow with age, keeping your, paintwork, bike frame, helicopter blades looking brand new.
Resistant to temperature extremes.
Will not peel or lift after periods of long exposure to rain.
Easy to apply and conforms around complex curves. Can be cut to shape.

product.title: Würth Masking Tape low bake 38mm x 50m
product.product_body: High temperature, low bake masking tape for use in vehicle spray booths, up to 80°C. Automotive, household and commercial brush painting, Masking of curves and angles, Attaching of masking paper. Instructions of use: •To assure residue-free removal, the tape must be removed immediately after drying of the paint or enamel •The masking tape is not UV-resistant and therefore not suitable for outdoor applications

features.feature: The tape is very well suited to painting work which requires baking.
Very good adhesion on all smooth surfaces in automotive, household and commercial brush painting applications, e.g. painted metal, glass, chrome-plated parts or rubber
This tape can be removed immediately after painting without leaving any residue
Moisture and solvent resistant, The tape is suitable for all painting work with all commonly available water, solvent and enamel based systems. Very well suited for wet sanding.

product.title: Post-it® Super Sticky Die Cut Star 150 Sheets
product.product_body:
Post-it Super Sticky Notes stick around as long as you need them to. Perfect for vertical and hard-to-stick-to surfaces, they are super-strong, super-adhesive, super-versatile - and super-stand-out. With a range of sizes and bright colours they really get your messages noticed. These notes feature a strong but repositionable adhesive - they can cling to both smooth and rough surfaces and stick for longer on walls, doors, mirrors and fridges. The adhesive won't leave marks on your walls or pages, so you can stick them wherever they’ll be noticed to keep your family, colleagues … and yourself organised! This pack contains 2 pads of star-shaped Post-it Super Sticky Notes – 1 x yellow pad and 1 x orange pad. Each pad contains 75 sheets measuring 73mm x 71mm - the perfect size for a quick reminder! Do your kids forget their lunchboxes or sports kit every morning? Why not leave them a message on the inside of the front door so they see it before they leave the house? Will your husband remember to pick up his dry cleaning on the way home? Stick a note on his laptop or briefcase so he’s got no excuse! The star shape adds a bit of fun and will really catch their attention. For messages that really stick, get organised with Super Sticky Post-it Notes!
2 star-shaped pads of Post-it Notes, each containing 75 sheets

product.title: 3MTM Fine Line Masking Tape Blue, 6 mm x 32.9 m Roll
product.product_body: A highly flexible Fine Line Masking Tape with excellent adhesion to plastic and rubber mouldings. Specially adapted for masking narrow curves, rivets and other surface details

features.feature: Uniquely constructed, vinyl backed tape gives outstanding paint line definition
Suitable up to 70 degrees celsius
Excellent adhesion to plastic and rubber mouldings
Excellent for masking narrow curves and rivets

product.product_body: Strong scouring power - more durable than conventional pads Low scratch - ideal for glassware and other delicate surfaces Multipurpose sponge for wiping surfaces and cleaning spills and scouring surface for removing encrusted food residues The 3M 2020 Nailsaver Low Scratch Sponge Scourer is suitable for general purpose cleaning. It comes in purple.

features.feature: Strong scouring power - more durable than conventional pads
Low scratch - ideal for glassware and other delicate surfaces
Multipurpose sponge for wiping surfaces and cleaning spills and scouring surface for removing encrusted food residues

product.title: Post-it® Super Sticky Notes Star Shape Cube (144)
product.product_body: Personalise your messages and make them really stand out from the crowd with our bright and cheerful star-shaped Post-it® Notes. With enough space for a short note, phone message or even a drawing, they're the tried and tested way to communicate with friends, family, colleagues - or yourself! In a vibrant blue and yellow design these notes will really make your messages stand out - perfect for important reminders around your workspace; and a great tool for teachers and parents who want to make learning that little bit more fun! The Post-it® Super Sticky Adhesive holds stronger and longer - even on vertical and rough surfaces - but removes cleanly without leaving marks on walls or pages. With Post-it® Super Sticky Notes you can be sure that your message will stick, for as long as you need it to! Each pack contains 2 pads, 1 yellow and 1 blue star-shaped paper note pad, each backed with a strip of Post-it® Super Sticky Adhesive. Each note measures approximately 73mm x 73mm. Also available as a pink heart-shaped pad, our range of fun and funky Post-it® Notes make great gifts for friends, family, teachers and colleagues.

features.feature: Star-shaped notes made from cheerful, patterned paper
Post-it® super sticky adhesive holds stronger and longer
Great for vertical surfaces
Bright neon yellow and orange to make your messages really stand out
2x 75 sheets. Each sheet measures approx. 73 mm x 73 mm

product.title: Post-it® Super Sticky Notes Star Shape Cube (48)
product.product_body: Personalise your messages and make them really stand out from the crowd with our bright and cheerful star-shaped Post-it® Notes. With enough space for a short note, phone message or even a drawing, they're the tried and tested way to communicate with friends, family, colleagues - or yourself! In a vibrant blue and yellow design these notes will really make your messages stand out - perfect for important reminders around your workspace; and a great tool for teachers and parents who want to make learning that little bit more fun! The Post-it® Super Sticky Adhesive holds stronger and longer - even on vertical and rough surfaces - but removes cleanly without leaving marks on walls or pages. With Post-it® Super Sticky Notes you can be sure that your message will stick, for as long as you need it to! Each pack contains 2 pads, 1 yellow and 1 blue star-shaped paper note pad, each backed with a strip of Post-it® Super Sticky Adhesive. Each note measures approximately 73mm x 73mm. Also available as a pink heart-shaped pad, our range of fun and funky Post-it® Notes make great gifts for friends, family, teachers and colleagues.

product.title: 3MTM Microfibre Detailing Cloth, 1 Per Pack (39016) (1)
product.product_body: The 3M Microfibre Detailing Cloth made from super soft, non-linting microfibre that quickly and effectively removes wax residue, finger marks and even light scratches from vehicle bodywork. Easy to use, it does the hard work for you and makes completing those finishing touches a breeze and is also great with 3MTM Glass Cleaner. As with all of our products, we pride ourselves on the incredibly high quality of the 3M Microfibre Detailing Cloth. Designed to be durable, hardworking and long lasting, it offers excellent value for money and comes highly recommended by automotive professionals and customers who have used it at home. If you only have one detailing cloth in your collection, this is definitely the one to choose. The 3M Microfibre Detailing Cloth performs well with all of the cleaning products in the 3M Car Care Range and is the ideal accessory for cleaning, polishing and dusting inside and out. Its super soft construction won't scratch surfaces but as with any detailing cloth, be careful to use it only on clean surfaces and shake it out regularly. Any particles that it picks up could cause scratches. Step by Step 1. Fold cloth into quarters to create a flat uniform surface. Wipe surface to remove any residue and buff to a high shine with a clean section of the cloth 2. Unfold and refold the cloth frequently to expose a clean surface in order to avoid scratching by particles which may have been picked up by the cloth 3. Because of the Detail Cloth's superior dust and dirt lifting and trapping properties, frequent washing is recommended. The cloth is hot water, chlorine bleach and dryer safe. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m32pwiKv80Q

features.feature: Super soft, non-linting microfibre cloth
Easily removes wax residue and finger marks
Ideal for paintwork, chrome, glass, dashboards, and more
Works with all products in the 3M car care range

product.title: Scotch Pouch Tape 8240, 5 in x 6 in, 500 pouches per roll (Pack of 1) by 3M Office Products
3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent Lotion
product.product_body: Ultrathon Lotion provides long lasting protection from biting insects via advanced 3M Time Release Technology, with up to 12 hour protection against mosquitoes from one application. Recommended by Ray Mears, the TV expert on bushcraft and survival, this insect repellent lotion will ensure you and your family have a high level of protection both for holidays to tropical climates and for breaks and outdoor trips closer to home. This is also the product of choice for the UK Armed Forces. Ultrathon Lotion comes in a 60 ml tube and contains 34% DEET. The Ultrathon formula contains 3M Time Release Technology, meaning the DEET is released slowly, over a longer period of time compared to conventional products. One benefit of a lower DEET content is that the product is also suitable in lower risk environments; another is a more pleasant odour for the user, since the DEET smell is not so strong. The Ultrathon formulation is also splash and sweat resistant, affording long lasting protection even when you are active, against a range of biting insects--including mosquitoes, midges, ticks, fleas, gnats and biting flies.

features.feature: 3M Ultrathon

product.product_body: High performance masking tape designed to meet demanding paint masking situations. Excellent solvent and water resistance - perfect for masking a car prior to spraying with either solvent based or water-based paint.

product.title: Würth CU 800 Copper Grease (300ml)
product.product_body: High adhesive copper grease, resistant to high temperatures, good corrosion protection properties. Temperature range from -40°C to 1200°C. Resistant to water, alkaline solutions and acids. Use: Brakes: Back sides of disc-brake pad (prevents squeaking), fastening and individual parts. Battery terminals: Contact protection, nozzles of arc welding torches (prevents formation of welding beads). Seals: Prevents baking on of solid seals. Miscellaneous: Screw connections (exhaust manifold screws, spark plug threads etc.), bearings, pivot points, joints, sliding surfaces.

features.feature: Very high resistance. Temperature range from -40°C to +1200°C.
Provides long-term protection against burning-on and seizing, cold welding, wear, corrosion and frictional corrosion.
Resistant to water, alkaline solutions and acids.
Resistant to high temperatures and pressures, highly adhesive copper lubricating, release and corrosion protection paste.
Great, long-lasting lubricating effect. Silicone-free.

product.title: 15m White Reflektif® Reflective Curtain Grade Tape (ECE 104) - Solid Style
product.product_body: Reflective tape for use on Lorry's, trucks, vans, cars, trailers, caravans and motor homes etc. it could also be used on motor bikes, cycles, invalid cars and even wheelchairs. Basically any rigid area on a vehicle (not for use on fabric curtains on trucks etc). Tape can easily be applied to the vehicle, instructions are supplied, once correctly applied you can power wash the car, van, truck, caravan etc without the risk of the tape coming off, and their is no need to specially the treat the tape for this to work, simply clean the surface of the vehicle, remove the backing paper and stick it on! Vehicle, trailer or caravan will be a lot more visible in the dark or fog with the tape applied, you can expect to see the tape reflect at over 1km away. Ideal for marking the rear of the vehicle as well as the sides, important when pulling out onto a road etc, allowing oncoming traffic to see that you are across their lane. this reflective tape is slowly becoming law on certain vehicles and in certain countries in Europe, there is information below regarding Heavy goods vehicles and directive ECE104, but there are other requirements like caravans to have reflective tape in Spain (event if you are a foreign visitor). Our tape is fully ECE 104 compliant and you can buy safe in the knowledge that it meets the required standards. Reflective tape designed for application onto vehicles and trailers (with rigid surfaces) to meet regulation ECE104. It is especially important for haulage companies who's vehicles travel into Europe as this has now become a legal requirement. You can use White or Yellow on the sides of a vehicle and yellow or red on the rear.

features.feature: Approved to ECE 104 Class C. Outstanding long distance night-time visibility
No edge sealing necessary Resistant to power washing
Easy to cut with scissors - Full installation instructions provided
3 Year Warranty - 50mm squares
Trucks, vans, trailers, and other curtain sided vehicles

product.title: Yellow Reflexite Reflective Vehicle Tape (ECE 104) 2 Metres Long 50mm Wide
product.product_body: Reflective tape for use on Lorry's, trucks, vans, cars, trailers, caravans and motor homes etc. it could also be used on motor bikes, cycles, invalid cars and even wheelchairs. Basically any rigid area on a vehicle (not for use on fabric curtains on trucks etc). Tape can easily be applied to the vehicle, instructions are supplied, once correctly applied you can power wash the car, van, truck, caravan etc without the risk of the tape coming off, and their is no need to specially the treat the tape for this to work, simply clean the surface of the vehicle, remove the backing paper and stick it on! Vehicle, trailer or caravan will be a lot more visible in the dark or fog with the tape applied, you can expect to see the tape reflect at over 1km away. Ideal for marking the rear of the vehicle as well as the sides, important when pulling out onto a road etc, allowing oncoming traffic to see that you are across their lane. this reflective tape is slowly becoming law on certain vehicles and in certain countries in Europe, there is information below regarding Heavy goods vehicles and directive ECE104, but there are other requirements like caravans to have reflective tape in Spain (event if you are a foreign visitor). Our tape is fully ECE 104 compliant and you can buy safe in the knowledge that it meets the required standards. Reflective tape designed for application onto vehicles and trailers (with rigid surfaces) to meet regulation ECE104. It is especially important for haulage companies who's vehicles travel into Europe as this has now become a legal requirement. You can use White or Yellow on the sides of a vehicle and yellow or red on the rear.

product.title: White Reflexite Reflective Vehicle Tape (ECE 104) 5 Metres Long 50mm Wide
product.product_body: Reflective tape designed for application onto vehicles and trailers (with rigid surfaces) to meet regulation ECE104. It is especially important for haulage companies who's vehicles travel into Europe as this has now become a legal requirement. You can use White or Yellow on the sides of a vehicle and yellow or red on the rear. Amendments to the UK Road Vehicles Lighting Regulations 1989 (RVLR) The Department for Transport has made a commitment to align RVLR with UNECE Regulation 48 and require conspicuity marking material to be fitted to new heavy goods vehicles and their trailers from 10 July 2011. DfT has completed amendments to the Road Vehicles Lighting Regulations 1989 which entered into force on 4 January 2010, detailing the requirements for conspicuity markings including optionally-fitted markings. Rear marker plates which have been mandatory on certain vehicles and trailers for some time in the UK are intended to serve the same function as conspicuity marking material, so DfT has made the decision not to mandate both. Optionally-fitted conspicuity markings. The amendments allow vehicles to be fitted with optional conspicuity markings, but where fitted they are required to conform to the relevant ECE Regulation 48 requirements. If compliant conspicuity markings are optionally-fitted to vehicles, then there is no requirement to fit rear marker plates to vehicles. However, the optional use of rear marking plates in addition to conspicuity markings will continue to be permitted. The RVLR have also being updated to require rear marker plates, when fitted optionally from the mandatory conspicuity marking implementation date of 10 July 2011, to comply with the latest technical specifications set out in UN ECE Regulation 70.01. This aligns with the latest requirements in UN ECE Regulation 48.

product.title: TRADITIONAL LINO PRINTING BLOCKS MOUNTED 3.2mm GREY 300x200x3.2mm (2)
product.product_body: The traditional craft of Lino cutting and printing is a popular and creative educational pastime for children and adults in schools and colleges and an enjoyable creative craft at home. Lino prints well onto most papers, card and fabric giving endless creative opportunities, the opportunity to develop new skills and an appreciation of traditional printing techniques. Students can be encouraged to make their own prints, scrapbook artefacts, greeting cards, party invitations, gift labels, posters or even great works of art! Our Lino, made especially soft for block printing, is ideal for the student and master alike. Made using natural materials such as linseed oil and wood flour, our Lino is even biodegradable. Supplied in popular sizes, this is the first choice for education, hobby and professional use, achieving rapid results without specialist material or equipment. Can be used with oil and water based inks and prints on a wide range of paper, board and fabric.

features.feature: Mounted Lino Printing Blocks
Comes pre-mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks
Manufactured in The United Kingdom!
Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.

Scotch-BriteTM Pot and Pan Brush
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. The Scotch-BriteTM Pot & Pan Brush is perfect for reaching into deeper cookware to work out crusts of crumble or greasy grill left-overs. The comfort-grip handle keeps your hands out of hot water, whilst allowing you to exert pressure on burnt-on biscuit crumbs or resilient residue. It's non-scratch composition is suitable for non-stick cookware and more delicate pots, for fast and effective cleaning.

features.feature: Non-scratch brush for washing up and cleaning cookware
Long-lasting and reusable
Fast and effective
Comfort-grip handle

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Multi Purpose Cellulose Scourer (2)
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. The versatile Scotch-BriteTM Multi-Purpose Cellulose Sponge Scourer is ideal for everyday cleaning tasks around the kitchen. Its medium-duty scouring surface is safe to use on glass, stainless steel, copper, non-stick and other delicate cookware; whilst the sponge side, made from super-absorbent cellulose, makes quick work of wiping surfaces and mopping up spills. Shaped to provide a comfortable grip, it reaches right into tight corners for a really thorough clean. The Scotch-Brite Multi-Purpose Cellulose Sponge Scourers, can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage.

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Easy Grip Scourer Non-Scratch Twin Pack (2)
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. When you have everyday chores around the kitchen, these all-purpose Scotch-BriteTM Non-Stick Sponge Scourers will allow you to clean quickly and efficiently, up to 50% faster than similar sponge scourers. The medium-duty scouring surface is safe to use on glass, plastic, stainless steel, copper and non-stick cookware and is comfortable to hold thanks to its easy-grip sponge backing. Once you've powered through the washing up, use the super absorbent sponge to wipe down surfaces and the sink. This scourer is suitable for use on most household surfaces, however you should exercise caution with extremely delicate, highly polished or painted surfaces as these may scratch. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage. This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Easy Grip Non Scratch Sponge Scourers, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water.

The medium-duty scouring surface is safe to use on glass, plastic, stainless steel, copper and non-stick cookware and is comfortable to hold thanks to its easy-grip sponge backing. Once you've powered through the washing up, use the super absorbent sponge to wipe down surfaces and the sink. This scourer is suitable for use on most household surfaces, however you should exercise caution with extremely delicate, highly polished or painted surfaces as these may scratch. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage. This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Easy Grip Non Scratch Sponge Scourers, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water.

Each pack has 2 sponge scourers

product.title: 3M Ultrathon SRL-12 Insect Repellent Lotion, 2oz
product.product_body: 3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent lotion provides protection from biting insects via 3M Time Release technology, with up to 12 hour protection against mosquitoes from one application. Ultrathon lotion comes in a 60 ml tube and contains 34 per cent DEET. The Ultrathon formula contains 3M Time Release technology, meaning the DEET is released slowly, over a longer period of time compared to conventional products. Time Release Technology - up to 12 hours protection against mosquitoes. Contains 34 per cent DEET lasting protection against mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, gnats, fleas and more. Splash and sweat resistant to ensure consistent protection through all your outdoor activities. Ultrathon products have been tested in the harshest environments in the world. Ultrathon Insect Repellent is a highly effective barrier suitable for everything from low risk areas to the most extreme conditions. Not suitable for children less than 2 years old. Does not damage nylon, cotton or wool. Squeeze into hand and apply just enough repellent to cover exposed skin. During application, avoid contact with eyes and lips and use sparingly around ears. Do not apply over cuts, wounds or irritated skin. Reapply as necessary (after swimming or depending on environmental conditions). Avoid over application of the product. Irritating to eyes. Harmful to aquatic organisms. May cause long-term adverse effects in the aquatic environment.

features.feature: Provides long lasting protection from biting insects
Incorporates advanced 3M Time Release Technology
Splash and sweat resistant
Up to 12 hrs' protection against mosquitoes
Contains only 34% DEET

technical_detail.value: Contains N, N-Diethyl-m-toluamide. If swallowed, seek medical advice immediately and show this container or label. Avoid release to the environment. Refer to special instructions/safety data sheets. Keep out of the reach of children. Avoid contact with spectacles, plastics, acetate rayon, leather, painted or varnished surfaces. Do not use under clothing.

product.title: Würth Plastic Dye Plast PT 75ml (Black)
product.product_body: Areas of application: Bumpers, synthetic leather roofs, folding roofs (including cloth), interior plastic panels, rubber parts, water pipes, foot board strips, etc. Instructions for use: Shake well before use. Moisten sponge with water and clean the surface to be treated with the rough side of the sponge. Squeeze the sponge out slightly. Apply Plastic Dye to the smooth side of the sponge and rub evenly onto the surface to be treated. Remove unwanted dye from trim and paintwork immediately. Already dried Plastic Dye can be dissolved by applying fresh moist Plastic Dye.

features.feature: For visual improvement of vehicle plastic parts.
Solvent free. Easy application. Can be applied in direct sunlight.
Dispersion-based high-quality plastic dye.

Do not store or apply at temperatures below +7°C. Attention: Plastic Dye is humidity sensitive during application. Therefore, ensure part to be treated is dry before application and remains dry until dye is cured.
Restores faded plastic to original condition.

product.title: 3MTM Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth Blue, 1 Cloth (50486)
product.product_body: The 3M Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth is the ultimate car restoration accessory when used in conjunction with 3M UltrafinaTM SE Polish. It easily removes any residue left behind from the product and is suitable for use on a wide range of surfaces including glass, metal, chrome, plastic, vinyl and leather. When used in conjunction with the SE Polish, the ultimate high gloss finish can be achieved quickly and easily. The unique super soft microtexture of this cloth means that it is non-linting and will not leave unsightly scratches on any surfaces. It's the ideal solution when it comes to perfecting any finishing touches and will leave vehicles looking good-as-new. The 3M Perfect-It III Ultra Soft Cloth is part of our range of award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, any products that have a blue bottle cap are recommended for use with blue pads and cloths. This system also ensures that the most effective results are achieved, leaving vehicles free from scratches, swirl marks and residues.

features.feature: Easily removes residue left behind by compounding

Ideal for glass, metal, chrome, plastic, vinyl and leather

product.title: JL AUDIO M700/5 MARINE AMP
product.product_body: M700/5 5-Channel Class D Marine System Amplifier, 75 W x 4 @ 4 Ω + 300 W x 1 @ 2 Ω - 14.4V M700/5 Product Spotlight The M700/5 is ideal for a complete audiophile-grade, subwoofer + four satellite system, and it fits comfortably in just about any boat's weather-tight compartments. With this incredible little amplifier, you can drive two pairs of quality component speaker systems with plenty of clean power (75 W x 4 @ 4 Ω), while also delivering a stout 300 W of power to a subwoofer system. The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexDTM switching design. The M700/5 includes a 12 dB / octave high-pass filter for one main channel pair, a 12 dB octave high-pass or bandpass filter for the other main channel pair, plus a variable slope low-pass filter for its subwoofer channel. All three filters offer continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz. This amplifier's filters can also be configured as a true 3-way crossover, with a low-pass filter for the subwoofer channel, a bandpass filter on Ch. 3 & 4, and a high-pass filter on Ch. 1 & 2. An "x10" multiplier switch on the Ch. 1 & 2 high-pass filter allows its cutoff frequency to be adjusted from 50-500 Hz or 500-5000 Hz. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately), the amplifier's subwoofer channel level or overall level can be directly controlled from a remote location. This marine amplifier features white and gray powder-coat finishes, a gasketed cover for the controls and stainless steel hardware for durability in the marine environment.

product.title: Parrot Asteroid Mini PF380004AA V2.1 Bluetooth Multimedia System WiFi / USB / Android 1.5 / 3.2 Inch Display for Apple iPod / iPhone
product.product_body: PARROT Asteriod Mini speaker phone, apps and music.Click here for larger view Parrot Asteroid Mini speaker phone, apps and music The Parrot ASTEROID Mini is a hands free multimedia system, which can be perfectly integrated into the existing audio system of any vehicle. It offers driving assistance applications (navigation, points of interest, on-line music, information, and web radio), access to all your music sources, and advanced hands-free features. Its 3.2-inch colour screen and wireless remote control make it a discrete, user-friendly, and indispensable system for everyday use. PARROT Asteriod Mini in your car.Click here for larger view Optimal hands free system Automatically synchronize your phone directory, and safely make phone calls whilst driving thanks to voice recognition without previous setting, and simultaneously manage your calls with two phones. Pure design Enjoy the comfort of the large colour display and comfortably use all the functions via the remote control that can either be used either cordlessly (battery operated) or connected by cable to the CPU (with illuminated keys). Practical apps Discover downloadable apps in the ASTEROID market:Navigation, driving assistance, points of interest, music on demand, and on-line radio. Surf the Internet - from anywhere ASTEROID Smart offers a range of opportunities to surf the Internet on the go. Use your compatible mobile phone, a 3G/4G surf stick, or hotspot. product.product_body: The 13TW5v2 low-profile subwoofer driver has received awards from around the world for its breakthrough performance capabilities in impossibly tight spaces. In this sealed Truck PowerWedgeTM subwoofer system, we harness the performance of this patented subwoofer driver to deliver amazing sub-bass performance from an enclosure that is only 7.25 in. (184 mm) deep at its base and 4.5 in. (114 mm) at the top. This enclosure design has been carefully engineered to the optimum sealed enclosure alignment for the 13TW5v2 and has been fine-tuned through extensive real-world listening. This subwoofer system is shipped wired, loaded and ready to connect via a five-way binding post terminal. Finish: Black, high-grade automotive carpet with "JL AUDIO" embroidered in silver on the front baffle. A steel mesh grille is included to protect the subwoofer driver. product.title: Ventura PB100 21000 mAh Portable Powerbank
product.product_body: The Ventura Portable Power PB100 Powerbank is designed for people who enjoy travelling, and will charge up virtually any device. The power source allows you to stay off the grid for longer, safe in the knowledge you can charge up your mobile, camera or navigation system quickly and easily. Make sure you don't run out of power on a caravan trip by buying a Ventura Portable Power PB100 Powerbank today. Careful planning is a must for those who love outdoor activities, ensuring they are contactable in emergencies or able to use GPS navigation systems in the remotest of spots, miles away from civilisation. The versatile Ventura Portable Power family are designed for life on the road. These power sources will enable you and your friends to stay off the grid for longer in the knowledge you have super quick power source on demand. Enjoy your outdoor adventure without being a slave to mains connected power. Ventura Portable Power PB100 has a strengthened aluminium casing and silicon surrounds to protect the high capacity power output and super robust adapters for superior connection. Perfect for charging smart-phones, tablets and laptops, PB100 is ideal for people who require high power, quickly, even in the most remote locations. Lithium-ion rechargeable battery. Ventura Portable Power PB100 contains a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery which stores up-to 21,000 mAh. A Lithium-ion battery is the market leading type of battery for portable devices due to its flexibility and low electrical discharge. 21,000 mAh (Milliamp hours) Milliamp hours defines the battery life on a single charge. The larger the mAh rating on the recharger the longer the unit can charge your device for. The PB100 is fully re-chargeable with any device including Ventura Solar Packs, and the extra charge up life will power laptops, tablets and kindle devices. Dual output voltage. Depending on your electrical device, you may require different voltage charges to not damage your device. Ventura portable power PB100 offers different output voltages to suit different appliances. PB100 comes with 5V and 12V-19V power outputs Re-chargeable Powerbank. Ventura Portable Power PB100 is fully re-chargeable through the AC Adaptor and via Ventura Solar Packs SPV140 and SPV280. 1 x Ventura Portable Power PB100 1 x Set of Output Connectors 1 x Multi-lingual User Manual

product.title: GOLF APPROACH S1W NOH
product.product_body: Approach S1W combines a high-sensitivity GPS receiver with a lightweight, flexible sport watch. It is ready to go right out of the box with thousands of preloaded courses covering the U.S. You can measure individual shot distances and track how far you walk on the course. Approach S1W is golf's first full-featured sports watch and golf GPS in one. Lock In Yardages & Measure Distances Approach S1W will have you dialed in like a pro by providing yardages to the front, back and middle of the green. The sunlight-viewable screen features large numbering for at-a-glance visibility. S1W also measures precise yardages for shots played from anywhere on the course. And for those who like to walk, there's the S1W odometer to tell you how far you traveled - on the course or off. No Subscriptions Needed Approach S1W is ready to go right out of the box with thousands of preloaded courses for the U.S. and Puerto Rico. Best of all - there is no need for subscriptions or additional setup - S1W is ready to tee off right out of the box. Have the Canada version and need to travel to the U.S.? No problem, you can load U.S. courses for free online. Same thing with the U.S. version - you can switch to Canadian maps for free. Sleek Everyday Watch Fitted for course playability, S1W also functions as an everyday watch. There's an alarm and rechargeable lithium ion battery, and S1W sets its time and time zone automatically. What's in the Box: Approach S1W Charging/data clip AC charging adapter Manual

product.title: Mio Cyclo 100 Cycle GPS Computer - Black
product.product_body:
Meet the Mio Cyclo 100: the new, stylish bicycle computer specially designed for every sportive cyclist who likes to keep track of his performance. The Mio Cyclo 100 sports an anti-glare 1.8" screen, simple menu structure and a customisable dashboard, which shows you the information you like to see. You are able to get started right out of the box and mount onto any bicycle in portrait or landscape mode. The compact design combined with a rugged waterproof casing (IPX7) makes the Mio Cyclo 100 suitable for every weather condition. And with the long battery life of 18 hours, you can enjoy longer distances without having to worry about recharging. The Mio Cyclo 100 is your ideal everyday training companion: challenge yourself and improve your performance with the with the personal workout partner. The device records your time, speed, distance, height, calorie consumption and your tracks with the built-in GPS. So when you get home, you can easily analyse your recorded tracks, and share your experiences online via the Mio Share desktop application. Mio Share is also your one-stop shop for managing your device and finding out the latest product information or software updates.
The Mio Cyclo 100 is an easy-to-use bicycle navigation device for anyone who enjoys cycling. With the option to have a Heart rate monitor and a cadence sensor this device will give you all the training information you need.

features.feature: GPS-enabled cycling computer
Tracks time, distance and speed
Calculates calories burned

product.title: MIO CYCLO 505 UK

product.title: Mio Cyclo 315 HC with Western Europe maps and complete with Heart Rate & Speed/Cadence sensors
product.product_body: Meet the Mio Cyclo 315HC: the lightweight, easy-to-use bicycle navigation device, designed with an anti-glare fl at screen, perfectly readable in the brightest sunlight. With cycle paths and road maps pre-installed, you can get started right out of the box. The Mio Cyclo 315HC allows you to navigate easily from point A to B or to follow your preferred routes. However, if you choose to use the unique Surprise Me feature, the Mio Cyclo 315HC will offer you three surprising bicycle routes based upon your entered time, distance or destination. This is the ideal feature for anyone who doesn't feel like downloading tracks: you just choose Surprise Me, and you can get on your bike and go. The flat, anti-glare 3" touch screen and lightweight design make the Mio Cyclo 315HC perfect for anyone who likes stylish design and wants a slimline device to fit on their lightweight bike. The turn-by-turn navigation effortlessly guides you, indicating every instruction with a clear sound alert. With a simple menu structure and clear on-screen buttons, the Mio Cyclo 315HC offers you true ease of use. With the MioShare desktop application you are able to store your data and manage your route history. The easy-to-use application allows you to download routes and enjoy new roads and areas that others find interesting. And as the Mio Cyclo 315HC is compatible with most third party platforms, you can easily upload your tracks to your preferred one. The Mio Cyclo 315HC is fully equipped for the dedicated cyclist. As well as measuring everything you need to know about your performance, it also offers you workout programs, which can be done outdoors, but also indoors when the weather is not allowing you to cycle outside. It comes with a built-in ANT+ sensor, allowing you to easily connect with a wireless heart-rate monitor, wheel- and cadence sensor. And with the Mio Cyclo 315HC, a wireless heart rate monitor and wheel and cadence sensors are included in the box.

product.title: Garmin vívoactive White Bundle
product.product_body: UK stock so has full UK/EU warranty unlike any imports which won't have any warranty at all. The Face Doesn't Lie, It's into Sports From the company that has been developing robust, dedicated wearable technology to improve training metrics for athletes for more than a decade comes the GPS smartwatch for the active lifestyle. Introducing vívoactive - the ultra-thin, lightweight smartwatch with built-in Garmin sports apps that you can wear every day to help you keep a healthy balance between work and life. From Work to Workout Play harder, work smarter, live better with vívoactive. Built-in sports apps keep you active while smart notifications allow you to stay in contact with pressing work matters - all so you can keep your life in balance. The high-resolution, colour touchscreen stays readable in direct sunlight, so you can view your stats when you step out of the office for a run. The ultra-thin profile - 8 mm - is comfortable to wear all day and can easily transition from office to golf course. You won't have to worry about vívoactive keeping up with your active days. The rechargeable battery lasts through all your activities with up to 3 weeks in watch/activity-tracking mode or up to 10 hours using GPS. Built-in Sports Apps vívoactive features built-in sports apps that track your stats - even when away from your phone. Simply tap to choose among GPS-enabled running, golfing and cycling apps plus swimming and activity tracking. https://buy.garmin.com/en-GB/GB/prod150767.html

product.title: Garmin Vivoactive GPS Smart Watch with Sports Apps - White
product.product_body:
Play harder, work smarter, live better with Garmin vivoactive, the GPS smart watch that enhances your active lifestyle. The ultra-thin, lightweight GPS smart watch with sunlight-readable, high-resolution colour touchscreen comes with built-in running, cycling, golf, swimming and activity tracking apps that follow your progress. The running feature tracks your pace, time and distance. For golfing, you can download golf course maps from over 38,000 courses worldwide, measure shot distance and support individual scorecards as well as know yardage to layups and doglegs. The cycling feature allows you to measure time, distance and speed. With the swimming feature, you can track distance, pace and stroke rate. The activity tracker counts your steps, calories burned and distance throughout the day. The move bar alert motivates you to move when you've been sitting too long. Use Garmin vivoactive on its own or pair with your smart phone (Must be within 9 metres of smart phone) to gently alert you to incoming calls, emails and texts, plus notifications from social media and other mobile apps. Garmin vivoactive automatically syncs with your smart phone at strategic times throughout the day. The rechargeable battery lasts through all your activities with up to 3 weeks in watch/activity-tracking mode or 10 hours using GPS. Customise your watch face and features with free designs, stats widgets and apps from Connect IQ, Garmin's 3rd party app developer site.
Garmin vivoactive

product.product_body: Wurth's continued success is from a commitment to only supplying products of the absolute highest possible quality. Before a product is brought into the range it is subject to rigorous quality checks. Spot checks on their product range ensure that standards do not slip. Wurth dry chain lube is a unique high performance product. Engineered to penetrate the tightest gaps and linkages to ensure total coverage of the hard wearing lubrication is coated onto all surfaces. Unlike other chain lubes, Dry Chain Lube once applied leaves no sticky or flingy residue, it's `low build` technology prevents dirt, grit and general road grime from sticking to the chain thus increasing chain and sprocket life!
