product.product_body:
Würth UK have been supplying the motorcycle aftermarket for more than 30 years and are highly regarded within the trade environment for their product quality
At the beginning of 2003 they launched a specific Motorcycle Division with, for the first time, a dedicated group of consultants specially trained for the ever-changing needs of the motorcycle market place. Staffed by motorcycle enthusiasts, customer needs are quickly identified resulting in a fast developing product range including helmet and clothing sanitisers, visor cleaner, bike cleaner, valeting range and chain lubes
TOP QUALITY PRODUCT
WURTH BRAKE AND CHAIN CLEANER
LARGE 500ml CAN
About this product
Advanced cleaner for the safe and effective removal of contaminates
such as hazardous dusts, dirt, grease and oil.
When used on brake components it will remove brake dust, fluid and
oil from discs, drums and callipers

product.title: OpticludeTM Boys & Girls Orthoptic Eye Patches - Maxi Size Pack 30 Coloured Patches
product.product_body: During the first four months of a child's life the visual pathways develop as the eye matures and receives images which are then sent to the brain. For correct development of vision the brain needs to receive equally clear and focused images from both eyes at the same time. However, if anything interferes with this development, it can result in amblyopia and reduced vision. Amblyopia is a condition that only children develop and needs to be treated in the early years in order to be corrected. The use of an eye patch - or occlusion therapy - to cover your child's stronger eye will encourage their weaker eye to start working and stimulate vision, hence helping the part of the brain that manages sight to further develop. The length of time and the number of hours per day that your child is required to wear the patch varies, so it is important to follow the specific treatment routine that is prescribed. OpticludeTM Boys & Girls Eye Patches are tried, proven and trusted through years of use by orthoptists across Europe to provide a comfortable solution to childhood amblyopia. Our Eye Patches are specially designed for children, featuring different sizes, pictures and colours to brighten up their day - and yours! This pack contains 30 oval maxi Patches, measuring 5.7cm x 8cm, in 3 different colourful patterns. They have a central pad which absorbs excess moisture and are made from a breathable, hypoallergenic and latex-free material. Easy to apply and remove, now you can make patching a pleasure. N.B.: Occlusion therapy should only be conducted under the guidance of an orthoptist or other suitably qualified healthcare professional. This product should only be used as advised by an ophthalmologist.

features.feature: For the treatment of common childhood eye conditions such as lazy eyes, squints and cross eyes
Central, absorbent pad reduces stickiness from eye secretions
Worn over the preferred eye, the eye patch encourages the weaker eye to function
Oval-size, measuring 5.7cm x 8.0 cm. 30 patches per pack in three different, colourful patterns
Breathable, hypoallergenic, latex free. Easily applied and removed with minimal skin irritation

product.title: Command Medium Antique Bronze Hooks with Strips (FC12-AB)
product.product_body: Give your bits and pieces a place to live with Command Antique Bronze Hooks. These decorative metal hooks can each hold up to 1kg in weight, making them the ideal organisational solution for your home or office. They can be applied to almost any flat, clean surface. When you want to rearrange, the hooks are easily and cleanly removed without damaging the surface underneath – no cracks, holes, damaged plaster, sticky residue or stains. Want to use a hook again? Just reattach it using a new Command Adhesive Strip – each pack includes a spare, and refill packs are available. These antique-effect hooks will complement classic home décor perfectly. The medium-sized version is ideal for hanging coats, towels and bathrobes. Many Command fans tell us that they use this type of hook to display their Christmas wreath on the front door, as the antique finish matches the rest of their door furniture. Once January rolls around, it’s easy to take down the hook without damaging the paintwork underneath, and the hook can be used year after year with replacement adhesive strips. Command products are perfect in rented accommodation where you can’t put screws in the walls or are worried about marks and stains. They hold strongly on a whole range of surfaces including paint, wood, metal and tiles, but aren’t suitable for use on wallpapered surfaces or for hanging antiques or other valuable or irreplaceable items. When you want to take one down, grasp the hook and slide it upwards to remove it from the mounting base. The hook and mounting base can be re-used with a new adhesive strip. To remove the Command Adhesive Strip from the wall, hold the plastic base gently and pull the tab straight down, slowly stretching it until the strip releases from the wall. All of these instructions are detailed on the back of the pack. Command is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: 3M Glass Cleaner - Foaming Action - Aerosol - 1 Can - 562 Ml
product.product_body: The foaming action of this glass cleaner means it will quickly clean glass but won't drip or run off the glass. That leaves you free to spray the product on all windows, leave it to work and then simply wipe off with a Microfibre Detailing Cloth. A final buff with a clean cloth will reveal the ultimate shine

product.title: 3M Littmann White Light Optics Otoscope
product.product_body: The 3M Littmann White Light Optics Otoscope delivers Littmann quality, design, and advanced LED technology. Low-reflection, bright and white light - aids more efficient diagnosis in comparison with halogen or xenon bulbs. Supplied with a Littmann branded soft Velcro fastening carry case, the pocket size Otoscope is portable, easy to handle and conveniently sized. Thanks to long LED bulb (20,000hrs) and battery service lives (50hrs) there are low maintenance costs. Whilst the service life of a xenon light source is only approx. 20 hours, LED burns for at least 20,000 hours. The LED light allows uniform illumination of the examination field as there is pure white light (5500 K). The LED illumination shows colours as they really are. Helpful for efficient diagnostics plus an almost unlimited LED service life. 5 year warranty with 3M Littmann quality and service supported by dedicated customer service and support. The Fibre Optic LED Otoscope provides 5500K pure white LED light illumination for true tissue colour. The fibre optics produces a ring of even light for an unobstructed, glare-free view. 12 disposable speculae are included with the Otoscope with affordable pack size replacements available (100, 1000) promoting infection control. 3 x Magnification with swiveling precision optics.

features.feature: Led illumination - provides 5500k pure white light for true tissue colour
Fibre optics - producing a ring of even light for an unobstructed, glare-free view
Disposable specula - (12 included) affordable pack size for replacements promoting infection control (100, 1000)
Magnification: 3x - swiveling precision optics
Whilst the service life of a xenon light source is only approx 20 hours, LED burns for at least 20,000 hours

product.title: 3M Littmann White Light Optics Diagnostics Kit
product.product_body: The 3M Littmann White Light Optics Diagnostic Tools deliver Littmann quality, design, and advanced LED technology, throughout both the Otoscope and Ophthalmoscope. Low-reflection, bright and white light - aids more efficient diagnosis in comparison with halogen or xenon bulbs. Supplied with a Littmann branded soft Velcro fastening carry case, the pocket size Diagnostic Tools are portable, easy to handle and conveniently sized. Low maintenance costs thanks to long LED bulb (20,000hrs) and battery service lives (50hrs). Whilst the service life of a xenon light source is only approx. 20 hours, LED burns for at least 20,000 hours. For uniform illumination of the examination field with pure white light (5500 K). The LED illumination shows colours as they really are. Helpful for efficient diagnostics plus an almost unlimited LED service life. 5 year warranty with 3M Littmann quality and service supported by dedicated customer service and support. The Fibre Optic LED Otoscope provides 5500K pure white LED light illumination for true tissue colour. The fibre optics produces a ring of even light for an unobstructed, glare-free view. 12 disposable speculae are included with affordable pack size replacements promoting infection control. 3 x Magnification with swiveling precision optics. The LED Ophthalmoscope provides higher contrast to support efficient diagnosis compared to halogen or xenon bulbs. There are 18 focusing lenses with a range of -20 to +20 diopters with an easily adjustable aperture wheel. Parallel optical path avoids corneal and iris reflexes. The soft brow rest is suitable for use with spectacles. 6 apertures with an easy to use aperture wheel.

APPLICATION

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Non Scratch Tub & Shower Scrubber, 1 Scrubber Per Order
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. For a beautiful bathroom, you need to pay special care and attention to your surfaces to avoid scratches or scuffs. Tight corners, tricky taps and high tiling can also make cleaning your shower a challenge. Scotch-BriteTM Non Scratch Tub & Shower Scrubbers are made from a gentle but highly effective material, for superior scuff and stain removal from your bathtub or shower. They are specially designed to conform to the curves of your bathroom suite, with a light-weight water-resistant handle, meaning you can easily reach and clean those trickier areas. They are long-lasting and reusable. Now can you can buff your bathroom to perfection, and restore it to a sparkling sanctuary!

product.title: Post-it Heart Shaped Notes Pad of 225 Sheets Pink Tones Ref 2007H
3M Heart Shaped Post-It Notes | Post It | Sticky Notes| 76mm x 76mm | 225 sheets | Pink Tones
product.product_body: For over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message or reminder. Post-it Notes are great for phone messages, shopping lists, to-do lists and instructions. Keep your cube handy by the phone to note down contact details, and then peel and stick the note into your address book until you have time to create a permanent entry. At work, school or college this cube format gives you a long-lasting stock of notes for your desk. Use them to annotate documents, books and projects, or for quick messages, reminders and revision notes. This Post-it Notes Cube contains 225 heart-shaped sheets measuring 76mm x 76mm, in various shades of pink. Post-it Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. The practical choice for everyday communication, a Post-it Note makes your message really stand out. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.

Contains 225 Sheets in Each Cube
Each Sheet is 76mm x 76mm
Great for sending a special note to that special someone!!

product.title: Scotch Super Glue Pen (505569) - 2g
product.product_body: The Scotch Super Glue Pen contains 2g of advanced formula super glue designed for bonding a wide variety of non-porous materials including wood, metal, some plastics, ceramic and more. Dispensed through a fine, push-point tip, it is ideal for precision tasks requiring only a small amount of glue. The pen is extremely easy to use and gives ultimate control over the amount of glue released onto the surface of your item – meaning less mess, a neater finish and reduced wastage. What’s more, the tip of the pen resists clogging, sucking excess glue back down to prevent it from drying out, blocking up and rendering the remainder unusable. Once you have finished the job in hand, simply wipe the pen tip with a cloth or tissue, replace the cap and push it on tightly. Store your Scotch Super Glue Pen with the tip upwards in a cool, dry place and you’ll find you can use it over and over again. This pack contains 1 Scotch Super Glue Pen. Please note that Scotch Super Glue is not suitable for use on polystyrene foam, foam rubber, polyethylene and polypropylene. Follow the directions for use on the back of the pack carefully. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: Scotch Super Glue Liquid in a Precision Applicator (SGAD-874) - 4g
product.product_body: Scotch Super Glue Liquid is advanced formula super glue that bonds securely to wood, metal, some plastics, ceramic and more. What sets it apart from the rest is the patented droplet control technology incorporated into its precision applicator – meaning you get up to 60% less mess compared to traditional metal tube super glue liquids. It is ideal for fiddly tasks where precision is essential, accurately dispensing one drop of glue at a time right where you need it. You’re far less likely to end up gluing your fingers together, or sticking something to the workbench or table! With the Scotch Super Glue Precision Applicator, you’ll also cut down on wastage. This “stay fresh”, clog-resistant bottle sucks excess liquid back down from the opening to prevent it from drying out, blocking up the top and rendering the remainder unusable. Once you have finished the job in hand, simply wipe the applicator tip with a cloth or tissue, replace the cap and screw it on tightly. Store your bottle of Scotch Super Glue Liquid with the tip upwards in a cool, dry place and you’ll find you can use it over and over again. Please note that Scotch Super Glue Liquid is not suitable for use on polystyrene foam, foam rubber, polyethylene and polypropylene. Follow the directions for use on the back of the pack carefully. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.

We produce thousands of imaginative products and we're a leader in scores of markets - from health care and highway safety to office products and abrasives and adhesives. Our success begins with our ability to apply our technologies - often in combination - to an endless array of real-world customer needs. product.title: TRADITIONAL LINO PRINTING BLOCKS MOUNTED 3.2mm GREY 75x75x3.2mm (pack of 2)
product.product_body: The traditional craft of Lino cutting and printing is a popular and creative educational pastime for children and adults in schools and colleges and an enjoyable creative craft at home. Lino prints well onto most papers, card and fabric giving endless creative opportunities, the opportunity to develop new skills and an appreciation of traditional printing techniques. Students can be encouraged to make their own prints, scrapbook artefacts, greeting cards, party invitations, gift labels, posters or even great works of art! Our Lino, made especially soft for block printing, is ideal for the student and master alike. Made using natural materials such as linseed oil and wood flour, our Lino is even biodegradable. Supplied in popular sizes, this is the first choice for education, hobby and professional use, achieving rapid results without specialist material or equipment. Can be used with oil and water based inks and prints on a wide range of paper, board and fabric.

features.feature: Mounted high-quality easy-cut lino in 3.2mm thickness
Comes pre-mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks, giving extra rigidity allowing consistent, flat prints
Manufactured in The United Kingdom!
Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.
Pack of 2

product.title: Watercolour Paper Stretcher Half Imperial
product.product_body: Ideal for watercolour classes. Stretch your watercolour paper with ease - No more gum strip! This infallible device takes the chore out of stretching watercolour paper of all weights. You will never need to buy brown paper tape again! All who have attempted watercolour painting will know the frustration of painting on un-stretched paper...even the heaviest papers can cockle and buckle under a wash, causing the paint to flow unevenly and ruining your work. Let's face it...watercolour painting can be difficult enough, so anything which makes it technically easier has to be a bonus. The cure is to pre-stretch your paper. Normally this means soaking the paper and then sticking it to your drawing board with pins or old-fashioned brown-paper tape, both very haphazard methods. Get the paper too wet and it can tear as it dries or even break the board. Get the tape too wet and it won't stick at all! Furthermore you have to let the paper dry naturally which can take several hours. As a watercolour teacher the inventor of this system needed a reliable device to stretch several sheets a day quickly and effortlessly, hence this invention. No tape, No clips, No fuss.

features.feature: Made in the UK.
No need for gummed tape.
Perfectly flat paper every time.
Waterproof, mould resistant board, lightweight, easy for travel.
Quick and simple to use, again and again, cost effective and durable.

product.title: Mastercut Carving Blocks 300x200x4mm (Pack of 2)
product.product_body: Carve your own printing stamps or experiment with artisan printmaking techniques using this amazingly easy to carve, eraser-like material. Essdee MasterCut TM is formulated for extremely easy carving making it safer and easier to use than other materials. MasterCut TM holds fine detail without cracking or crumbling and yet resists pressure making it usable in a printing press. This double-sided material can be drawn upon with a pen or pencil due to its light colour and ink receptive surface. It can be used with ink pads or block printing inks for a multitude of creative possibilities. MasterCut TM comes in retail packs of 2 pieces with instructions in 4 languages.

product.title: Karcher NT65/2 Eco (110V) Wet & Dry Vacuum
product.product_body: **NEW MODEL** The NT 65/2 Eco is a powerful twin motor wet/dry vacuum cleaner featuring Kärcher's exclusive Power Filter Clean system for constant high suction power and long periods of uninterrupted operation. Ideal for the building trade, agriculture and automotive industries, the NT 65/2 Eco is equipped with an electronic level monitor which shuts off the suction when maximum capacity is reached during wet pick-up to prevent overflow. An oil-resistant drain hose allows easy discharge of fluids into a drain while the clip system ensures simple and quick accessory changes. With 110V power supply for safe site use.

features.feature: Drain hose (oil-resistant) Auto shutdown when max. level is reached. Eco filter system
Crevice tool. Integrated power cable reception. Power filter Clean
Bumper bar. Metal suction tube, 2 x 0.5 m Push handle.
Large on-board storage area for tool and accessory storage.
Easily accessible drain hose for convenient liquid disposal.

features.feature: Displaces moisture from all electrical systems.
Loosens seized nuts, bolts and rusted parts.

Lubricates window and seat runners. Lubricates bicycle chains and gear assemblies.

product.title: 3MTM NexcareTM Maternity Support For Pregnancy (Medium)
product.product_body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C9AO7yXs8V4 3MTM Maternity Band - Providing Comfort and Support During Pregnancy As your baby develops in pregnancy, your tummy grows and may start to feel heavy. You might feel more tired and may even experience aches and pains in your abdomen and back. The NexcareTM Maternity Support is a latex-free, elasticated support belt that can help to ease some of the physical discomfort associated with pregnancy. It provides gentle but firm support underneath your bump to lift the extra weight, relieve pelvic girdle pain and reduce pressure on the lower back. Fully adjustable with an easy-to-use Velcro fastening, the Nexcare Maternity Support grows with your bump. Tension and support can be altered by simply stretching the belt a little more or less and adjusting the fastening position. This support can be used throughout pregnancy, but is particularly effective in the second trimester or for relatively smaller bumps. All parts of the Nexcare Maternity Support can be hand washed in cold or warm water with mild detergent. Not suitable for machine washing or tumble drying. The Medium size suits pre-pregnancy dress size 10 - 18. The Large size Large Suits pre-pregnancy dress size 18-28. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product.

features.feature: A maternity support band to be worn around the abdomen during pregnancy
Expands to accommodate your baby's growth
Helps to reduce pressure on your lower back and tummy
Medium Suits pre-pregnancy dress size 10-18. Large Suits pre-pregnancy dress size 18-28
Latex free, whisper-soft elastic provides gentle, yet firm support. Lifts the abdomen to achieve relief from sagging weight and leg pain.

product.title: Ducati Panigale 899 and 1199, 2012 Onwards, Paint Protection Film, Full Kit, Produced from Nano-Fusion Paint Protection Film.
product.product_body: Product Benefits Nano-Fusion Paint Protection Film is a smart investment. •Choosing Nano-Fusion PPF to protect your vehicle now means you're more likely to get a higher trade-in value in the future. •Virtually invisible, Nano-Fusion's superior clarity allows your vehicle's vivid colour to shine through. •Wherever it's installed, Nano-Fusion's outstanding strength helps shield your vehicle from road debris, bug stains, and harsh weather. •When installed by a certified professional, Nano-Fusion is backed by a limited lifetime warranty* against peeling, yellowing, bubbling or cracking. •Nano-Fusion helps eliminate the need for detailing or paint touch-ups by protecting your paint finish from chipping or staining. •Special care products aren't necessary; simply follow the manufacturer's recommendations for keeping your car clean and shiny. http://www.nanofusionfilm.com/ https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=nano+fusion+paint+protection+film

product.title: Würth Diesel Treatment AR 300ml
product.product_body: For all diesel engines with common rail and pump-nozzle technology. Add the contents of the can to the tank. There should be at least 10 litres of diesel fuel in the tank. 300ml is sufficient for 70 litres of diesel. We recommend use every 2000km (1250miles) and preventatively after every repair to the injection system and to the engine. For any further information please contact SignLine.

features.feature: Prevents deposits in the combustion chamber and injection system.
The function enhancer increases the lubricating effect of low-sulphur fuel, thus prevent surface friction and a resulting failure of the injection system.
Compatible with all modern diesel-oxidation catalytic converters.
For all diesel engines with common rail and pump-nozzle technology.
Add the contents of the can to the tank. Free of sulphuir, phosphor, metals and acids.

product.title: Würth Petrol Treatment 300ml
product.product_body: Add contents of the can to the tank, optimum dosage is 150ml for 35-40 litres. 300ml is sufficient for 70-75 litres. The product is self-mixing. An excess dosage is not harmful. For any further information please contact SignLine.

features.feature: For all petrol engines with and without catalytic converter.
Removes coating and resin deposits in fuel lines, petrol pumps, carburetters, valve tips, valaves and injectors.
Also removes oxidation residue.
Prevents water which is produced in the fuel tank by the hygroscopic characteristic of E10 fuel.
Add contents of the can to the tank.

product.title: Würth DieselCure (25 Litres)
product.product_body: Suitable for all types of diesel fuel, including biodiesel, used in trucks, the marine industry, agricultural and plant machinery. Properties •DieselcureTM is a corrosion inhibitor, it binds and neutralises acidic condensation, preventing acid formation, which causes gumming or resin deposits •Improves atomisation and the lubrication properties of diesel •Makes water content in the fuel tank combustible •Approved by MTU Friedrichshafen GMBH-Detroit Diesel Corporation Characteristics DieselcureTM conforms to all known fuel specifications. This product does not use cetane boosters, to enhance performance (short term performance enhancer). DieselcureTM eliminates water contamination in the fuel, which ultimately leads to better performance and decreased fuel emissions, for the long term.

features.feature: Reduces fuel consumption, black smoke and other harmful emissions
Cleans and protects from the fuel tank to the combustion chamber
Removes dirt deposits in injector pumps and injector nozzles
Prolongs engine life
Improves the lubricating properties of the fuel. Makes water content in the fuel tank combustible

product.title: Würth FuelCure 330ml
product.product_body: Moisture in fuel can cause many running issues, moisture and water is abrasive and can damage and wear a vehicles components as it travels through the fuel system. Suitable for both Diesel and Petrol injection engines, with or without catalyst. Fuelcure is designed to turn moisture contamination in fuel into a combustible lubricant which will not damage fuel lines, filter and components. Characteristics Fuelcure does not contain and Cetane booster to enhance performance, It will also not change the specification of the original fuel. Fuelcure eliminates the water content thus increasing engine performance and decreasing fuel emissions.

features.feature: Suitable for both Petrol and Diesel engines. Converts moisture and water in fuel to create combustible lubricant
Reduces fuel consumption. Helps to lower emissions. Increases engine performance. Inhibits corrosion.
Cures moisture contamination in fuel. 330ml is suitable for up to 100lt of fuel
For removing moisture in both Petrol and Diesel fuels, for cars, small vans, boats, motorcycles, quad bikes, small agricultural machinery and storage tanks up to 100lts.
Dissolves tar and gum build up. Can be used as a preventative product

product.product_body:
3M-Scotch ATG Transfer Tape. This tape bonds most paper; foil; film; metal; printed surfaces; glass; and sealed wood; making it ideal for matting and framing pictures; artwork; and documents; memory and scrapbooks; general crafts; and school projects. Surface must be dry and clean. Bonds instantly and strongly. Acid-Free. For use in the Scotch ATG 700 Adhesive Applicator only. This package contains one 36 yard roll of 1/2 inch wide tape. Made in USA.

product.title: Würth Heavy Duty Spray Adhesive 500ml
product.product_body: High Strength Spray Adhesive is an aerosol adhesive, which does not contain CFC's, Dichloromethane or 1.1.1 trichloromethane. It bonds a wide variety of materials giving rapid bond formation and is economical in use. • Halogen and CFC free. • Faster tack. • Foaming formula for low soak-in. • Economical in use. • Variable spray. High Strength Spray Adhesive bonds wood, concrete, stone, tiles, rubber, foam, metals, rigid plastics, polythylene, canvas fabrics, cardboard, paper and cork. High Strength Spray Adhesive is ideal for fixing polythene sheeting for enclosures prior to asbestos removal, for fixing thermal insulation and for packaging applications such as palletising or case sealing. It may be used for foam bonding, upholstery, automotive, carpets and trim and is useful for temporary bonding instead of double-sided tapes. NOT suitable for use on plasticised PVC or Expanded Polystyrene.

features.feature: Variable spray nozzle.
Three position spray pattern.
High strength. Foaming formula for low soak-in.
Halogen and CFC free. Economical in use.
Colour: light beige.

product.title: Würth Power Spray Adhesive Plus 400ml
product.product_body: Contact adhesive with high immediate adhesive strength and high heat resistance. Very high heat resistance up to 110°C. Permanent firm hold in a variety of applications.

features.feature: Poweful spray adhesive

product.title: Würth Spray Adhesive 500ml
product.product_body: A fast drying adhesive for lightweight materials. Areas of application: Permanently and quickly bonds plastic, foam, cork, foils, metal, wood, paper and polystyrene with and to each other. Especially suitable in motor vehicle sector, in plant workshops, in switch cabinet and ventilation system construction etc. Notes: Thin application of adhesive; saturate well on absorbent surfaces. Flash-off time depending on sur - face, material and temperature: 5 -10 minutes. Caution: Not suitable for adhesive bonding of soft PVC and PVC films.

features.feature: Highly temperature-resistant, Permanent firm hold for almost all applications
Fast-drying. Thanks to fast hardening, working material can already be loaded and processed further after a short time
Adjustable spraying nozzle. Optimal for use in an extremely broad range of work situations
Silicone-free

product.title: Würth Active Window Glass Cleaner 500ml (2)
product.product_body: Cleaning foam for glass and smooth surfaces, e.g. can be used on bonnets to dissolve bug splats. Extremely active cleaning foam. product.title: 3MTM Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth Yellow, 1 Cloth (50400)
product.product_body: The 3M Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth is the ultimate car restoration accessory when used in conjunction with 3M Perfect-ItTM Extra Fine Cutting Compound. It easily removes any residue left behind by the compound and is suitable for use on a wide range of surfaces including glass, metal, chrome, plastic, vinyl and leather. When used in conjunction with the Extra Fine Cutting Compound, a high gloss finish can be achieved quickly and easily. The unique super-soft microtexture of this cloth means that it is non-linting and will not leave unsightly scratches on any surfaces. It really is the ideal solution when it comes to perfecting those finishing touches, and will leave any vehicle looking brand new once again. The 3M Perfect-It III Ultra Soft Cloth is part of our range of award-winning colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, any products that have a yellow bottle cap are recommended for use with yellow pads and cloths. This system also ensures that the most effective results are achieved, leaving vehicles free from scratches, swirl marks and residue.

features.feature: Easily removes residue left behind by compounding
Unique super soft microtexture that is non-linting
Ideal for glass, metal, chrome, plastic, vinyl and leather
Won't leave scratches on surfaces

product.title: 3M Perfect-it III Ultrafina SE High Gloss Pad Blue, 50388 - for Ultrafina Polish and Polish Rosa, 2 Pad Pack
product.product_body: This high gloss pad is ideal for final polishing and is recommended for use with 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Ultrafina SE Polish or 3M™ Polish Rosa. It takes the hard work out of polishing to ensures a swirl- and hologram-free result. Easily attached to a 3M™ Back-Up Pad for ease of use, long-lasting waffle foam guarantees excellent value for money and ensures that each pad can be used time and time again. 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Ultrafina™ SE High Gloss Pads are big enough to carry out any polishing work quickly and efficiently, yet small enough to store safely as part of a kit, in toolboxes or in the workshop. With our award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes, any paint defect rectification or polishing work can be undertaken with ease and confidence. All of our polishes and compounds are colour-coded with the corresponding polishing pads to make product selection quick and easy. Any products that have a blue bottle cap are recommended for use with a blue pad in order to achieve the most effective results possible.

product.title: 3MTM Perfect-ItTM III Wool Buffing Pad, Pack of 2 Pads (01927)
product.product_body: The 3M Perfect-ItTM III Wool Buffing Pad is the ideal accessory for use with 3M Finesse-itTM Polishes. Used together, these products create a superior, high quality finish on any vehicle. Each 113mm pad is made from fine wool fibres that are stitched onto a polyester backing material, and has been prewashed to reduce traces of lint. This minimises the need to conduct a final dusting step after polishing - saving you valuable time and effort. The soft wool material is gentle enough to use on most surfaces without leaving unsightly scratches or marks behind. Favoured by automobile professionals all over the world, the pad is simple and easy to use yet always achieves the desired results. The 3M Perfect-It III Wool Buffing Pad incorporates the3M HookitTM Attachment System. This hook and loop mechanism is designed to provide easy attachment, removal and centering of the pad to its corresponding back-up pad, ensuring safe, easy and effective polishing with minimal downtime.

features.feature: Buffing pad with 3M Hookit attachment system
Stitched onto polyester backing material for durability
Ideal for use with 3M polishes
Prewashed to reduce lint

product.product_body: This pad works hard to deliver an aggressive cutting action that removes scratches and swirl marks from both refinished and original paintwork. It is highly recommended for use with a machine polisher and 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Fast Cut+ Compound 50417. 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Compounding Pads are easily attached to 3M™ Back Up Pads. The long lasting foam ensures that they can be used time and time again to offer excellent value for money. Large enough to carry out any compounding work quickly and efficiently, they are also compact enough to store as part of a kit, in toolboxes or in the workshop. Available in packs of 2, this product is part of our range of award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, products with a green bottle cap are recommended for use with green compounding pads. This system also ensures that the most effective results possible, leaving vehicles free from scratches and swirl marks.

product.title: 3M Perfect-it III Polishing Pad Yellow, 50488 - for Extra Fine Compound, 2 Pad Pack
product.product_body: This pad has been designed to remove light scratches, swirl marks and defects from both refinished and original paintwork. For the most desirable results, it is recommended for use with a machine polisher and 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Extra Fine Compound 80349. 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Polishing Pads for Extra Fine Compound are easily attached to 3M™ Back Up Pads with a hook and loop system. The long lasting foam ensures that they can be used time and time again, delivering excellent value for money. Big enough to carry out any compounding work quickly and efficiently, they are also small enough to store safely as part of a kit, in toolboxes or in the workshop. Available in packs of 2, these pads are part of our range of award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, any products that have a yellow bottle cap are recommended for use with yellow compounding pads. This system also ensures that the most effective results are achieved, leaving vehicles free from scratches and swirl marks.

product.title: 3MTM Electric Car Polisher 240v, 1 Pack (64393)
product.product_body: The new 3M Electric Car Polisher is engineered to work hand-in-hand with 3M Compounds, pads and accessories - the choice of many professional bodyshops. Ready to use and with an innovative body design that keeps the pad contamination free, this polisher has an impressive power to weight ratio for improved comfort and performance. The powerful 1100 watt motor combined with the progressive start-up feature and ergonomic handle provides greater operator comfort and superb performance. For maximum results, use this tool in combination with the 3M Colour Coded Paint Rectification System. Please note, the electric polisher does not come with a back-up pad, you can buy one here http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B015OC0J86

features.feature: A powerful 1,100 watt motor for better handling and quicker throughput
Lightweight electric car polisher with ergonomic handle and grip areas for greater operator comfort and reduced vibration
Progressive start-up for spreading compound
Variable speed for increased control

product.title: 3MTM Marine ImperialTM Compound & Finishing Material, Boat Polish (06044), 950 ml
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. Compounding removes the scratch pattern left by abrasives in previous sanding processes, as well as cleaning up oxidisation, waterline marks and other stains and blemishes. Designed for us on gel coats, 3M Marine ImperialTM Compound & Finishing Material is a one-step boat polish with a fast cut that leaves a premium, high gloss finish without swirl marks. It is easy to apply - by hand or using a mechanical buffer - and easy to clean up. This pack contains 1 x 950 ml bottle of 3M Marine ImperialTM Compound & Finishing Material. For best results apply using a rotary polisher with a wool pad, at 2000RPM or less. Can also be applied by hand. Always wipe the surface before compounding then start with medium pressure, reducing to lighter pressure towards the end to clean up.

features.feature: One step boat polish
Removes scratches, oxidisation, stains, blemishes and swirl marks
Easy to apply, easy to clean up
Fast cut leaves a high gloss finish
1 bottle containing 950 ml

product.title: 3MTM Marine High Gloss Gelcoat Compound 4.3kg pail M06025
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. Compounding removes the scratch pattern left by abrasives in previous sanding processes, as well as cleaning up oxidisation, waterline marks and other stains and blemishes. Designed for use on gel coats, 3M Marine High Gloss Gel Coat Compound quickly removes P800 dual action or P1000 wet sanding scratches to leave a high gloss finish. Its unique formulation contains no wax or silicone and reduces slinging whilst buffing for a superior, swirl- and hologram-free result. This pack contains 1 x 4.3kg pail of 3M Marine High Gloss Gel Coat Compound. For best results apply using a rotary polisher at 2000RPM or less. Always wipe the surface before compounding then start with medium pressure, reducing to lighter pressure towards the end to clean up. product.title: 3MTM Marine Finesse-it IITM Finishing Material, 473 ml, M09048
product.product_body: Getting a perfect finish on your gel coat is imperative in the creation of moulds and general hull finishing. Our professional grade products offer optimum performance across the variety of gel coats found in the marine industry. Designed for use on topside paint and gel coats, 3M Finesse-itTMII Finishing Material is a high quality boat polish that removes scratches, light to medium oxidisation and haze or swirl marks that are left as a result of compounding. Use it as a final finishing step after 3M Marine Compounds to achieve a smooth, high gloss, wet look finish. Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. product.product_body: Hand Cleaner Special for removing highly adhesive dirt such as lacquer, resin, adhesive, paint, bitumen etc. Application Squeeze a small amount of hand cleaner onto palm of hand and rub thoroughly into area of contamination without adding water. After the dirt has loosened add a little water and continue rubbing. Finally rinse off with running water. Caution: If hand cleaner gets into eyes rinse with plenty of water.

If synthetic-resin paints or two-component paints are used, prime with a thin layer of paint.

product.title: Wurth Ultra 2040 Lubricant, Penetrant and Water Displacer 500ml
product.product_body: Wurth Ultra 2040 lubrication oil is used extensively by trade professionals instead of GT85 or WD40. Not only does it loosen seized and rusted part, it also penetrates and lubricates with PTFE for long lasting lubrication. Wurth Ultra 2040 is also fitted with a clever 360degree valve which allows you to spray upside down unlike GT85 or WD40 and thus allowing to reach those awkward places. Displaces moisture and cleans. Ideal Lubrication oil for both lubing and cleaning components, great for restoring and shining parts. Large 500ml Spray Can.

product.title: Wurth CU800 Copper Corrosion Protectant 300ml
product.product_body: Wurth CU800 Copper Corrosion Protectant is a lubricant, parting paste and corrosion ptrotecting copper paste for protecting the backs of your brake pads, fixing points and individual components such as battery terminals, solid selas and articulated joints etc. Resistant to high temperatures and pressures, highly adhesive copper lubricating, release and corrosion protection spray. Very high resistance. Temperature range from -40°C to 1200°C. Resistant to water, alkaline solutions and acids. Extremely adhesive. Long lasting lubricating effect. Provides long term protection against burning together and seizing, cold welding, wear, corrosion and frictional corrosion. Silicone free. 300ml Spray Can

features.feature: BRAKES: DISC BRAKE PAD REVERSE SIDE (PREVENTS SQUEALING), FASTENERS, PIVOT POINTS, AND SELF ADJUSTING MECHANISMS.

WELDING EQUIPMENT: NOZZLES OF GAS WELDING GUNS (PREVENTS BUILD UP OF DEPOSITS).
OTHERS: SCREWED CONNECTIONS, EXHAUST MANIFOLD STUDS/NUTS, SPARK PLUG THREADS, BEARINGS, PIVOTS, LINKS AND SLIDING SURFACES.

product.title: 3M E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs Adult (XA007703656) - 1 pair
product.product_body:
3M E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs are made from soft, supple material that is preformed to fit the ear – there is no need to roll them down before use. Their unique, triple flange design reduces the amount of water that enters the ear canal during swimming, showering, bathing and other similar activities; a long stem helps make it easier to insert and remove them. E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs are easy to clean after use and are supplied in an attractive case for easy, hygienic storage in your swimming bag or bathroom cabinet. What’s more, they are extremely durable and can be reused time and again to prevent discomfort caused by water trapped in the ear canal. This pack contains one pair of adult-sized, skin-coloured E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs and a storage case. A smaller size (Aquafit Junior) is available for children (not suitable for children under the age of 36 months) or those with a smaller ear canal. To ensure optimum performance, follow the fitting instructions on the pack carefully. Please note that if used underwater, Aquafit earplugs can be worn to a maximum depth of 1 metre. Do not use this product for diving. E-A-R and Aquafit are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 x pair of earplugs

Reduce the amount of water entering the ear canal during swimming, showering and bathing
Comfortable and hygienic
Soft, supple and ultra-durable

product.title: Scotch Single Use Super Glue No-Run Gel (SGAD-929) - 4 tubes of 0.5g per pack
product.product_body: Scotch Super Glue No-Run Gel is advanced formula super glue that bonds securely to wood, metal, some plastics, ceramic and more. Designed to give the user greater control than a liquid super glue, this no-run gel reduces the risk of seepage and dries within seconds to give a strong, long-lasting hold. This pack is a useful addition to your toolbox or kitchen drawer – it includes 4 tubes of Scotch Super Glue, each containing enough for a single application. The tubes are all supplied with their own fine applicator tip – helping you to deliver a small amount of glue precisely where you need it and cutting down on mess and wastage. There’s no need to worry about it drying out after opening – once you have used a tube, discard it safely. Keep the remaining tubes, along with their directions for use, somewhere cool and dry ready for the next time. This pack contains 4 x 0.5g single-use tubes of Scotch Super Glue No-Run Gel and 4 x precision applicator tips. Please note that Scotch Super Glue is not suitable for use on polystyrene foam, foam rubber, polyethylene and polypropylene. Follow the directions for use on the back of the pack carefully. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.

Scotch-BriteTM Kitchen Duo Scourer Twin Pack (1)
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-BriteTM has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. The Scotch-BriteTM Kitchen Duo non-scratch sponge scourer makes scrubbing household surfaces quick and easy. Suitable for use all over the home, it will make light work of cleaning burnt-on food from your pots and pans or stubborn residue from the bathroom sink. The soft silver side is gentle enough for your most delicate surfaces, whilst the coloured side will cut through dirt and grease fast and effectively to leave your home gleaming. Kind to hands and comfortable to hold - even without rubber gloves - its thick inner sponge means that it is flexible enough to wrap around the contours of awkward shapes and squeeze into tight corners to make tricky cleaning jobs a doddle. Unlike traditional scouring pads, the Kitchen Duo is easy to rinse and wring out and will clean effectively for longer. Thanks to its powerful performance, you'll also find you need less chemical cleaning fluid - so it's economical and kinder to the environment too.

features.feature: Dual-purpose kitchen scourers
Coloured side scours through grease quickly and effectively
Superior scouring technology for sinks and surfaces
Silver side gently cleans delicate surfaces

product.title: 3MTM Stainless Steel Cleaner - Aerosol Can
product.product_body: When you have steel or metal surfaces that need a deep clean and a brilliant streak-free shine, polish up your act with 3M Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish. With a pleasant citrus aroma, this high performance product cleans, polishes and restores a glossy sheen to stainless steel and other metal surfaces. Once applied, it leaves behind a light, protective film that restores sheen, helps to hide blemishes and resists fingerprints and streaking. Safe to use in food preparation areas, it is ideal for commercial kitchens and food processing areas. Other applications include cleaning and polishing architectural metal components such as elevators, escalators and hand rails; drinking water fountain backsplashes; and restaurant and food processing equipment. Unlike some chemical cleaning fluids, 3M Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish is solvent-free, water-based and non-flammable with a pleasant citrus fragrance. A little goes a long way, clinging to the surface with a small spray pattern that reduces waste. This product is suitable for use on stainless steel, chrome, aluminium, laminated plastics, enamel, Plexiglas and ceramics. For best results, use with a Scotch-BriteTM Microfibre Cleaning Cloth. This pack contains 1 aerosol can containing 600 ml of 3M Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish. Scotch-Brite Microfibre Cleaning Cloths sold separately.

features.feature: Cleans and polishes metal surfaces in one step
Leaves a light, non-greasy film that protects and resists marking
Safe to use in food preparation areas
Water-based with a pleasant fragrance
Does not contain harmful chemicals. 1 aerosol can containing 600 ml

product.title: Opticlude Orthoptic Eye Patches (Junior Size,20 Pack)
product.product_body: For the treatment of common childhood eye conditions such as lazy eyes, squints and cross eyes. Tried, proven and trusted through years of use by Orthoptists across Europe, 3M Opticlude Orthoptic Eye Patches provide a comfortable solution to childhood strabismus and amblyopia. Worn over the preferred eye, the eye patch encourages the weaker eye to function. Breathable, hypoallergenic and latex free. Opticlude is easily applied and removed with minimal skin irritation. A central, absorbent pad also reduces stickiness from eye secretions as well. Opticlude Junior size: 5.7 x 8.0 cm oval includes 20 eye patches with cartoon rub offs.

product.title: Opticlude Orthoptic Eye Patches, Size 5.7 x 8.2 cm, 20 Pack
product.product_body: Tried, proven and trusted through years of use by orthoptists across Europe, Opticlude eye patches provide a comfortable solution to a sensitive problem. 3M Opticlude Orthoptic Eye Patches are used for treating childhood strabismus and amblyopia, more commonly referred to as "lazy eye". Worn over the preferred eye, the eye patch encourages the weaker eye to function. Featuring a hypoallergenic 3M Micropore Tape backing, Opticlude eye patches can be applied and removed easily with minimal skin trauma, whilst the unique pressure sensitive adhesive secures the patch throughout the occlusion period. The non-adherent pad is absorbent and prevents lacrimal secretions adhering the pad to the surrounding skin, whilst the Micropore tape backing allows the skin to breathe normally. In addition the thin lightweight design needs no shaping, folding or cutting.

product.title: 3M P60 SandBlaster Coarse Dual Angle Sanding Sponge for Paint Stripping - (Pack of 1)
product.product_body:
This SandBlaster Dual Angle Sanding Sponge in coarse P60 grit is the ideal choice for challenging tasks such as removing layers of old paint or varnish, or eliminating ingrained marks and blemishes from wood and metal. It is designed for use on detailed surfaces or tricky angles, where you need greater conformability or a sharper angled product. The sponge is easy and comfortable to hold, as well as flexible enough to get into those awkward, hard-to-reach corners. It can be used either wet or dry, and is washable and reusable. When you are faced with the task of stripping old paint, SandBlaster abrasives can make the job of sanding less work, whilst providing superior quality results. They can be used on a wide range of surfaces including wood, metal, plastic, filler and fibreglass, and have a special coating to resist clogging. When dust builds up, simply knock it off the abrasive surface and carry on! The SandBlaster Dual Angle Sanding Sponge is made of durable, washable foam that is coated evenly with mineral: the result is a long-lasting, reusable sanding sponge that cuts up to three times faster and delivers a more consistent finish when compared to conventional abrasives of comparable grits. The pack supplied here contains a single 3M SandBlaster Dual Angle Sanding Sponge that measures 118mm x 82mm x 27mm and is coated with coarse P60 grit aluminium oxide mineral. SandBlaster Sanding Sponge: Less work. Cuts fast. Lasts long. 3M and SandBlaster are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 x 1 pack containing

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Grout Scrubber 8 Pack
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. Grime and dirt can easily collect in the grout lines of your bathroom, trapping germs and making mould a potential risk. Tight corners, tricky taps and high tiling can also make thorough cleaning a challenge. Scotch-Brite Grout Scrubbers are made from a gentle but highly effective material, for superior non-scratch scrubbing. They are specially designed to thoroughly clean the grout lines in your tub or shower, with a light-weight water-resistant handle that helps you reach and clean those trickier areas. They are long-lasting and reusable. Now can you can buff your bathroom to perfection, and restore it to a sparkling sanctuary!

Whether it's crusty casserole dishes or greasy grills, they are tough enough to clean the grimiest of your kitchen cookware, hob or oven components. product.title: Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider Refill Rolls x 2 - Acid Free / Photo Safe Tape, 6 boxes, 12 Rolls in Total
product.product_body: ATG Tape Refills - Home Crafts Made Easy Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider and Refill Rolls. These rolls fit easily into the glider to allow for a quick, controlled application of adhesive in neat, thin lines, giving you a mess-free, professional finish. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, our General Purpose Tape covers all your crafting needs. Using the Advanced Tape Glider makes your projects quicker, cleaner and more satisfying. Rather than traditional glue, which can seep and wrinkle, the tape leaves flat, neat lines. The adhesive liner is removed as you stick, too, saving your time and patience! Strong and durable, our General Purpose Tape is great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out, yellow or peel and can be used on all sorts of textiles - an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox.

features.feature: Ideal for photo-mounting, scrapbooking and card-making
Dimensions (w x l) 6.3Mm x 32.9 m. 2 rolls per pack. 6 Packs
Creates thin, neat adhesive lines
Quick And Mess-Free Application

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Non Scratch Tub & Shower Scrubber, 6 Scrubbers Per Order
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. For a beautiful bathroom, you need to pay special care and attention to your surfaces to avoid scratches or scuffs. Tight corners, tricky taps and high tiling can also make cleaning your shower a challenge. Scotch-BriteTM Non Scratch Tub & Shower Scrubbers are made from a gentle but highly effective material, for superior scuff and stain removal from your bathtub or shower. They are specially designed to conform to the curves of your bathroom suite, with a light-weight water-resistant handle, meaning you can easily reach and clean those trickier areas. They are long-lasting and reusable. Now can you can buff your bathroom to perfection, and restore it to a sparkling sanctuary!

features.feature: Shaped sponge scrubber with handle
Non-scratch technology
Sponge designed to conform to the curves of your tub
Long-lasting and reusable
Light weight handle enables you to reach tricky corners and angles

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Flat Scourer, 3 Pads in Each Pack (2 Packs)
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Flat Scourer pads are stubborn and resilient - just like the grease or residue they will tackle, with minimum effort! Tough on grime and dirt, these large and ultra-flexible pads provide unrivalled scouring power but are flexible enough to grip contours and get right into tight corners. Whether it's crusty casserole dishes or greasy grills, they are tough enough to clean the grimiest of your kitchen cookware, hob or oven components. They are also ideal for cleaning garden tools - removing soil and corrosion to help restore your equipment and keep it in good working order. This pack contains 3 Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Flat Scourer Pads. Please note that these pads are highly effective scouring tools that are not recommended for cleaning glass, plastic, porcelain, non-stick cookware or polished, brushed or satin-finished surfaces.

features.feature: Tough, efficient scourers for heavy-duty cleaning
1 pack of 3 scourers
Make quick work of grease and burnt-on food
Ideal for cleaning stubborn residues from pots, pans ovens and grills

product.title: 3M SandBlaster 02580UK Coarse P80 115mm x 2.5m Sandpaper Roll with Paint Stripping
product.product_body:
When you are faced with the task of stripping old paint, SandBlaster abrasives can make the job of sanding less work, whilst providing superior quality results. The 2.5m roll is compact and great for tool boxes: it’s easy to cut or tear pieces off for hand sanding or use with an electrical sander. Sandblaster can be used on a wide range of surfaces including wood, metal, plastic, filler and fibreglass, and has a special coating to resist clogging. When dust builds up, simply knock it off the abrasive surface and carry on! SandBlaster Sandpaper is coated evenly with mineral and features an advanced backing material that resists tearing: the result is a long-lasting, durable sandpaper that cuts up to three times faster, stays sharp and delivers a more consistent finish when compared to conventional alternatives of comparable grits. SandBlaster Sandpaper in coarse P80 grit is the ideal choice for challenging tasks such as removing layers of old paint or varnish, or eliminating ingrained marks and blemishes from wood and metal. This pack contains 1 roll of long-lasting sandpaper which measures 115mm wide x 2.5m long. To make hand sanding easier, why not try the 3M Rubber Sanding Block? Simply attach a piece of Sandblaster Sandpaper to the heavyweight block for an improved grip, extra power and better sanding control. SandBlaster Sandpaper: Less work. Cuts fast. Lasts long. SandBlaster is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 x 1 roll of 3M SandBlaster Sandpaper

product.title: 3M Panel & Solvent Wipes 370 mm x 290 mm. Roll of 400 (34567)
product.product_body: These single use dry wipes are a useful accessory for any home or garage. Used with solvents and other cleaning liquids, they clean and degrease automotive panels and other surfaces quickly and effectively. Easily dispensed, especially when used in conjunction with the 3M Panel or Polishing Wipe Dispenser, they can also be used for other heavy duty cleaning tasks. 3M Panel & Solvent Wipes are highly absorbent and super strong - even when wet - with reduced risk of tearing. With minimal cloth disintegration, they make for a quick and efficient clean, leaving you with more time to get on with other jobs. Highly recommended by automotive industry professionals, these wipes can be used for a number of cleaning and maintenance jobs including degreasing metal panels and removing solvents and other liquids. They can be safely used on stainless steel, chrome, aluminium, plastics, enamel and glass. 3M Panel & Solvent Wipes make a valuable addition to any cleaning kit and with 400 extra strong wipes per box, they also offer excellent value for money.

features.feature: Excellent absorbency
Single use only
Super strength
Minimal cloth disintegration

product.title: 3MTM Marine Fibreglass Cleaner and Wax, 473 ml Bottle (09009E).
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax is a dual action product that removes imperfections like light oxidation, rust, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains to restore shine in half the time. This unique blend of rubbing compound and waxes is suitable for use on all fibreglass, topside paints and gel coat repairs, where it leaves behind a hard coat of wax that protects surfaces from further damage caused by sunlight, salt water and pollutants. With 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax you combine two restoration steps into one - saving you money and leaving you more time to enjoy your boat. This pack contains 1 x 1 litre bottle of 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax. For the treatment of heavier oxidation, try 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax.

features.feature: Dual action boat wax and fibreglass cleaner
One step restores shine and protects from further damage
Ideal for fibreglass repair, gel coat restoration and general boat detailing
For treatment of medium - heavy oxidation, try our fibreglass restorer and wax
Removes lighter oxidation, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains

product.title: 3MTM Double Coated Tape 9088, 6 Rolls of 12mm wide
product.product_body: 3M Double-Sided tapes are suitable on a wide range of surfaces, including stainless steel, rubber, polycarbonate, felt, foam and non-woven parts, making them ideal for sign makers and shop fitters, for point-of-sale and printers. product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design 2 Packs of 2 Pads
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. When you need to shift stubborn grease or burnt-on food, Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design will quickly scour and clean, working up to 50% faster than similar sponge scourers and with twice the efficiency. Their easy-grip design makes them comfortable to hold, whilst their coarse scouring surface makes cleaning a breeze. For worry-free washing up, these pads have a unique design which protects your nails, reducing the need for gloves and the likelihood of broken nails. Once you've powered through the pots, use the super absorbent sponge to wipe down surfaces and the sink. Thanks to their heavy duty cleaning power, these scourers are not suitable for non-stick, delicate or highly polished surfaces. This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Scourers with Nailsaver Design, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage.

features.feature: Heavy duty sponge scourers with a unique ridge to protect finger nails
Make quick work of grease and burnt-on food
Ideal for cleaning stubborn residues from pots, pans ovens and grills
Superior foam sponge helps dry surfaces quickly
Long-lasting and reusable. 2 packs of 2 sponge scourers

product.product_body: Our unique Watercolour Paper Stretching kit is the easy way to stretch and dry watercolour paper prior to painting. No need for taping and cutting. This kit includes a lightweight waterproof board, 4 clamps and instructions. * No need for gummed tape * Perfectly flat paper every time * Quick and simple to use, again and again * Retains the paper's natural or deckle edge * Waterproof, mould resistant board * Lightweight making it easy for travel * Cost effective and durable

product.title: Scotch Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive, 59ml
product.product_body:
Every home needs some tacky, fast glue in its craft supplies, and fans of the Scotch Brand Arts & Craft Range tell us that this versatile adhesive is hard to beat! Super strong and fast-drying, Scotch Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive is supplied in a tube with a narrow-tipped applicator that produces a fine, controlled stream of glue. This makes it ideal for detailed or precise crafts like card-making, where you can rely on it to hold fast despite repeated handling. Its thicker consistency means it will not wrinkle paper or seep under edges when pressing two surfaces together; it stays exactly where you apply it without creating messy “strings”; and it won’t run. It’s also strong enough to perform on trickier surfaces and hard-to-attach items such as fabric, ribbons and decorative embellishments. Because it dries so quickly, you’ll find that you only need to hold things in place for a few seconds before they are secure. In fact, it’s a great option for any project or repair where you’re short of time and can’t wait around for adhesive to dry. Here’s a top tip for parents – do your children sometimes wait until the very last minute before telling you about homework projects? Scotch Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive dries on paper in less than 5 minutes and on other materials in up to 30 minutes. Next time you need to create a model of the solar system before breakfast, this fast glue could be just the thing! The tube in this pack contains 59ml of glue. Check out the rest of the Scotch Brand Arts & Craft Range – there’s something to help you get great results in all your favourite crafts! Try Scotch Photo Splits or Scotch Photo Corners for arranging photographs or scrapbooking; or one of the other adhesive products specially designed for crafters – Scotch Craft Stick, Scotch Scrapbooking Tape and Scotch Scrapbooker’s Glue. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
New Scotch ® Glue & Adhesive Mixed Pack For Card Making & Scrapbooking. All 3 products ACID FREE and PHOTO SAFE. Newly available from the USA. This 3-item pack consists of 1 x Scotch® Craft Glue Stick 40g, 1 x 59ml Bottle Scotch ® Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive and 1 x Scotch ® 2-Way Glue Applicator - sponge tip / precision tip 47ml Scotch ® Craft Glue Stick: Perfect for mounting paper, documents and memorabillia. Long lasting adhesive, non-toxic. Scotch ® Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive. Ideal for paper, metal, plastic and other hard-to-attach items. Precision application, non - stringing. Dries in under 5 minutes to a transparent gloss finish. Won't wrinkle or bleed through. Bonds paper to paper in less than 1 minute. PVC free glue and bottle. Non-toxic. Scotch ® 2-Way Glue Applicator - sponge tip / precision tip. Cover a large area OR make the slightest dab. Permanent adhesive, dries clear. Wide and fine points handle a range of application needs. Precision tip minimizes mess. PVC free adhesive and applicator. Sets in 5 minutes when applied in a thin, uniform coat. Non - toxic.

product.title: Post-it 76x76 mm Stripes Design Z-notes in a Decorative Dispenser - Neon Yellow/Orange
product.product_body:
For over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message. In the office, at home or in the classroom, Post-it Z-Notes are great for quick notes and reminders around your workspace and on your papers. Designed for easy, one-handed use, Post-it Z-Notes are concertina-folded so pop up one after another - it's easy to just peel and write. This bright dispenser will bring fun and colour to your workspace or kitchen, and is filled with 200 orange and neon yellow Post-it Z-Notes in the square 76mm x 76mm size. Its clever, suction cup base grips the desk surface to enable you to grab a note one-handed, but can be easily moved around when required. Post-it Z-Notes Dispensers are available in a range of colours and styles – to reflect a professional office environment or the fun side of your personality! Whichever you choose, a Post-it Z-Notes Dispenser makes it super-quick to grab a Post-it Note one-handed – perfect when you need to make a note during a phone call, leave a message or capture an idea quickly. For messages that really stick, get organised with Post-it Z-Notes! Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 dispenser containing 200 sheets of Post-it Notes

product.title: Post-it Apple Dispenser
product.product_body: A Post-it Z-Notes Dispenser makes it super-quick to grab a Post-it Note one-handed – perfect when you need to make a note during a phone call, leave a message or capture an idea quickly. This glossy, red, apple-shaped dispenser will add colour and personality to your desk or workspace and makes a great gift for kids, students, teachers, friends and colleagues. This dispenser is supplied with one starter pad of Post-it Z-Notes in neon yellow, and is quick and easy to refill with other 76mm x 76mm pads from the Post-it Z-Notes range. In the office, at home or in the classroom, Post-it Z-Notes are great for quick messages and reminders around your workspace and on your papers. Designed for easy, one-handed use, they are fan-folded so pop up one after another - it's easy to just peel and write. The apple-shaped dispenser is part of a range of fun, colourful Post-it Z-Notes dispensers that also includes a heart-shaped and a handbag-shaped option. Please be aware that Post-it Z-Notes Dispensers are only suitable for use with Post-it Z-Notes and will not function with original Post-it Notes. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: Post-it Table Top Meeting Chart 563R - 20 Self-Adhesive Sheets 508 x 584mm
product.product_body: Flipcharts with a difference! Get real action from your meetings by keeping all your charts visible all of the time. A Post-it Meeting Chart makes it easy to make your point, capture ideas or solve problems in group discussions. These meeting room essentials feature a Post-it Super Sticky adhesive strip along the top of every sheet so you can stick and reposition them around the room. They are ideal for training courses, brainstorming activities, meetings and presentations. Jot down thoughts, ideas, action points, checklists, agendas and minutes, then peel off the page and stick it to the wall for everyone to see whilst you continue on to the next sheet. You won’t need to worry about finding tape, drawing pins or adhesive putty. At the end of your meeting, simply peel off the used sheets to leave the room in exactly the same condition as when you started. Post-it Super Sticky Meeting Charts are made from premium plain white paper with a special coating that eliminates marker bleed-through, meaning that you can write on them on the pad or on the wall without the risk of staining the underlying pages or your wall surface. They pull off the pad easily with no awkward backing paper to remove, and have the holding power to stick securely to most vertical surfaces. When your meeting is over, they remove cleanly without tearing, enabling you to take them back to your desk ready to write up your notes. This pack contains 1 pad of Post-it Super Sticky Meeting Charts. Each flipchart pad measures 51cm x 69cm and contains 20 sheets. The pads have been conveniently designed to fold out into a self-contained easel that can be used on a table top – perfect for smaller spaces, or occasions where you need to carry the pad from room to room. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: Post-it Super Sticky 50.8mm x 50.8mm Full Adhesive Notes Pad - Assorted Colours (Pack of 8, 25 Notes Per Pad)
product.product_body:
For over 30 years, Post-it Notes have given us a clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. They have helped us communicate, kept us organised and made life easier at home and in the office. With Post-it Full Adhesive Notes, you’ll find a host of new uses for them - whether you’re busy keeping your family on a hectic schedule, staying organised in the office, or working on the go. Post-it Full Adhesive Notes have a larger area of Super Sticky adhesive that covers all but one edge of each sheet – meaning they have more holding power and stay put for longer, whilst still removing cleanly when required. The two rounded corners on the non-adhesive edge are less likely to curl or become dog-eared over time, and make it quick and easy to find and peel each sheet off the pad. The result is a note that sticks securely and lies flat for a more reliable hold and a neat, professional look. Post-it Full Adhesive Notes are the ideal solution for high traffic areas or items that are handled frequently, such as long term project documents, instruction manuals and operating procedures. Their increased holding power means they stick better to walls, doors, fridges, purses and briefcases so you can be sure that your message gets through. Organising on the move? The pads hold securely inside folders, diaries, notebooks and portfolios, and this smaller size will fit perfectly on the back of a smartphone or inside a wallet. Simply peel away the last two sheets from the pad and stick it anywhere you might need a note – great when you’re working on the train or with clients, hot-desking, or just packing a lot into your day! Mobile, versatile and reliable: with Post-it Full Adhesive Notes you’ll always have a note within reach, wherever you are. This pack contains 8 pads of Post-it Full Adhesive Notes in assorted colours. Each pad measures 50.8mm x 50.8mm and contains 25 notes. Post-it Full Adhesive Notes are also available in a larger size. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.
8 pads of Post-it Full Adhesive Notes

product.title: Post-it Super Sticky 76mm x 76mm Full Adhesive Notes Pad - Assorted Colours (Pack of 4, 25 Notes Per Pad)
product.product_body:
For over 30 years, Post-it Notes have given us a clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. They have helped us communicate, kept us organised and made life easier at home and in the office. With Post-it Full Adhesive Notes, you’ll find a host of new uses for them - whether you’re busy keeping your family on a hectic schedule, staying organised in the office, or working on the go. Post-it Full Adhesive Notes have a larger area of Super Sticky adhesive that covers all but one edge of each sheet – meaning they have more holding power and stay put for longer, whilst still removing cleanly when required. The two rounded corners on the non-adhesive edge are less likely to curl or become dog-eared over time, and make it quick and easy to find and peel each sheet off the pad. The result is a note that sticks securely and lies flat for a more reliable hold and a neat, professional look. Post-it Full Adhesive Notes are the ideal solution for high traffic areas or items that are handled frequently, such as long term project documents, instruction manuals and operating procedures. Their increased holding power means they stick better to walls, doors, fridges, purses and briefcases so you can be sure that your message gets through. Organising on the move? These pads hold securely inside folders, diaries, notebooks and portfolios. Simply peel away the last two sheets from the pad and stick it anywhere you might need a note – great when you’re working on the train or with clients, hot-desking, or just packing a lot into your day! Mobile, versatile and reliable: with Post-it Full Adhesive Notes you’ll always have a note within reach, wherever you are. This pack contains 4 pads of Post-it Full Adhesive Notes in assorted colours. Each pad measures 76mm x 76mm and contains 25 notes. Post-it Full Adhesive Notes are also available in a smaller size. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.
4 pads of Post-it Full Adhesive Notes

product.title: Post-it Colour Notes, Joy, 76mm x 127mm (655-12FLJO) - 1 pack of 12 pads, 100 sheets per pad
product.product_body:
For over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message or reminder. How are you feeling today? These Post-it Notes in a range of joyful pinks, oranges and purples will put a smile on your face and give your family, friends and colleagues a cheerful pick-me-up. Has your daughter got first-day-of-term blues? A little pink note in her lunchbox might be just the thing to keep her going until the end of the day. Got something to celebrate? Leave a “well done” note on homework, art projects and even reports at work – everyone likes a little recognition sometimes! However you use them, the vibrant splash of colour is sure to get your message across. This pack contains 12 pads of Post-it Notes in colours from the Joy palette – 4 Pastel Pink, 2 Neon Orange, 2 Neon Pink, 2 Ultra Fuschia and 2 Violet. Each pad contains 100 sheets measuring 76mm x 127mm: this rectangular size is perfect for longer messages and lists. Post-it Colour Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. Try the other Post-it Colour Notes to match your mood: spread some sunshine with the Energy palette, or bring peace, calm and creativity with the Dream and Balance ranges. Post-it Colour Notes – a colour for every you! Post-it is a registered trademark of 3M Company.
1 pack of 12 pads of Post-it Notes. Each pad measures 76mm x 127mm and contains 100 sheets.
