Add an element of fun into exam preparation by using them to organise and colour-code your revision notes, or jot down ideas for a project or piece of coursework. Leave little messages around the house for loved ones, or in the office to highlight important documents for the boss to read! However you use them, a vibrant splash of colour is sure to get your message across. This pack contains 6 pads of Post-it Notes in colours from the Energy palette – 2 Neon Yellow, 1 Ultra Blue, 1 Neon Orange, 1 Ultra Fuschia and 1 Neon Green. Each pad contains 100 sheets measuring 76mm x 127mm: this rectangular size is perfect for longer messages and lists. Post-it Colour Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. Try the other Post-it Colour Notes to match your mood: spread some sunshine with the Joy palette, or bring peace, calm and creativity with the Dream and Balance ranges. Post-it Colour Notes – a colour for every you! Post-it is a registered trademark of 3M Company.
1 pack of 6 pads of Post-it Notes. Each pad measures 76mm x 127mm and contains 100 sheets.

product.title: Post-it Set includes 76mm x 76mm Z-Notes - Canary Yellow (Pack of 3, 20 Sheets Per Pad)/ Laptop Z-Notes Dispensers - Pink/ Grey/ Green (Pack of 3)
product.product_body:
For over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message. In the office, at home or in the classroom, Post-it Z-Notes are great for quick notes and reminders around your workspace and on your papers. Designed for easy, one-handed use, Post-it Z-Notes are fan-folded so pop up one after another - it's easy to just peel and write. These portable dispensers have a self-adhesive backing, enabling you to stick them just about anywhere! At work, school or college they are ideal for use on the lid of your laptop, on the cover of a notebook or inside a folder so you always have a Post-it to hand when you need one. At home, why not stick one on the fridge door? If the phone rings whilst you are busy cooking dinner you won’t have to drop everything to hunt down a scrap of paper! When you want to remove your portable dispenser, you’ll find it easy to peel off cleanly - it won’t leave behind any sticky residue. The pack supplied here contains 1 x pink, 1 x grey and 1 x green portable dispenser plus 3 pads of Post-it Z-Notes measuring 76mm x 76mm. These pads contain 20 sheets each, to fit the laptop note dispenser. Looking for a more permanent option for your desk or kitchen counter? Post-it Z-Notes Dispensers are available in a range of colours and styles – to reflect a professional office environment or the fun side of your personality! Whichever you choose, a Post-it Z-Notes Dispenser makes it super-quick to grab a Post-it Note one-handed – perfect when you need to make a note during a phone call, leave a message or capture an idea quickly. For messages that really stick, get organised with Post-it Z-Notes! Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 pack, containing 1 x pink, 1 x grey and 1 x green dispenser and 3 refill pads of Post-it Z-Notes (3 dispensers and 3 refill pads in total)

product.title: 3M 230mm x 280mm Wetordry Sandpaper Sheets Assorted Grits - (Pack of 1)
product.product_body:
3M Wetordry Sandpaper is a high quality abrasive paper that is ideal for sanding between coats, fine finishing or polishing metal, varnish and painted surfaces. The silicon carbide mineral is bonded to its backing paper with waterproof resin, meaning that it can be used wet to reduce heat build-up and dust levels. If the paper becomes clogged, simply rinse it in clean water and re-use. The result is wet and dry sandpaper that gives an improved rate of cut, increased life, flexibility and a uniform, consistent finish. The pack supplied here contains an assortment of fine grades to give you a range of choices for different applications or stages of your project. Inside the pack are 4 sheets measuring 230mm x 280mm: 1 x P240 (fine), 2 x P400 (very fine), 1 x P600 (ultra fine). 3M Wetordry Sandpaper can be used on metal, varnish and painted surfaces. Applications include sanding metal surfaces prior to applying primer or paint; sanding between coats of paint or varnish; fine finishing; polishing; burnishing old finishes and feathering fine edges. 3M and Wetordry are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 x 1 pack containing 4 sheets of 3M Wetordry Sandpaper

product.title: 3M P600 230mm x 280mm Wetordry Ultra Fine Sandpaper Sheets - (Pack of 1)
product.product_body:
3M Wetordry Sandpaper is a high quality abrasive paper that is ideal for sanding between coats, fine finishing or polishing metal, varnish and painted surfaces. The silicon carbide mineral is bonded to its backing paper with waterproof resin, meaning that it can be used wet to reduce heat build-up and dust levels. If the paper becomes clogged, simply rinse it in clean water and re-use. The result is wetordry sandpaper that gives an improved rate of cut, increased life, flexibility and a uniform, consistent finish. The pack supplied here contains 4 sheets of Ultra Fine P600 grit Wetordry Sandpaper – ideal for fine finishing, polishing car bodywork and achieving an ultra smooth surface. Each sheet measures 230mm x 280mm. 3M Wetordry Sandpaper can be used on metal, varnish and painted surfaces. Applications include sanding metal surfaces prior to applying primer or paint; sanding between coats of paint or varnish; fine finishing; polishing; burnishing old finishes and feathering fine edges. 3M and Wetordry are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 x 1 pack containing 4 sheets of 3M Wetordry Sandpaper

product.title: 3M Hand-MaskerTM Masking Systems Film Kit M3000 Filled
product.product_body: The Handmasker masking film kit is all you need to apply Scotch® masking products. Perfect for the professional finish you require. Includes a free instruction DVD with every kit. Refill with 3M masking films & papers; available in 24"", 48"", 72"" & 99"". Replacement 12"" blade also available. Additional Information From Our US Website: Save Time with Trusted 3MTM Hand-MaskerTM Masking System. Productivity directly impacts profitability which is why so many professional painters rely on the 3MTM Hand-MaskerTM Masking System. Combining trusted, time saving products into one simple solution is key because it allows a single painter to quickly and easily mask a job that would otherwise require a two- or three-person crew. The system consists of the Hand-MaskerTM M3000 dispenser, 3MTM masking films, and Scotch® masking tapes, all optimized to work together. The 3MTM Hand-MaskerTM M3000 Dispenser is a versatile tool for heavy-duty masking, covering, and protecting. It dispenses 3MTM masking film while simultaneously applying Scotch® masking tape. The system can be loaded with a wide variety of Scotch® branded tapes and 3MTM masking films. The result is a simple, high-quality masking solution easily adaptable to multiple masking applications and surfaces, including windows, doors, arches, and bagging a room. Applies tape to Masking Film Plus/Contractor's Plastic and to the surface in one easy step. Accommodates various widths of tapes from 3/4, 1, 1 ½ to 2 inches. Tracking pin guides tape and ensures consistently straight masking. Backlash arm evenly dispenses tape and film together.

features.feature: Applies Scotch-BlueTM masking tape pre-attached to masking film for complete area protection
Ideal for masking windows and doors, particularly when spray painting.
Thoroughly seals off the whole masked area protecting from over spray & splashes
Perfect for decorating kitchens or bathrooms, where there may be large fixed items to protect from
Includes M3000 application tool plus starter quantity of Scotch-BlueTM tape and masking film.

product.product_body: With a few steps to the right sanding pattern: fast, flexible, economical. The 3M Sand Blaster Flexible abrasive papers make sanding easy and provide good grinding results: The basic requirement for the right painting. The 3M Cubitron abrasive grain perennial enables efficient and powerful machining and leads to a fine and uniform sanding pattern. Straight edges and curves, the flexible carrier material shows its merits and also prevents heat transfer. 3M Sand Blaster Flexible abrasive papers last long because they clog less and are washable. For a gentle and uniform operation, the use of the associated sanding blocks is recommended.

product.title: ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Original Multi-Surface, 38mm x 55m (2090-36A) - 1 roll
product.product_body:
ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape gives you the opportunity to achieve a high quality, decorator’s finish to your project – without having to call in the professionals! Traditional masking tape products can leave messy edges and sticky, torn pieces of tape to ruin the effect of your hard work: ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape features a crepe backing, meaning that it sticks smoothly and securely, even to curved or uneven surfaces. It is UV/sunlight resistant so is ideal for use on window frames, and can be removed cleanly up to 14 days later with no residue or surface damage, even when used outdoors. Versatile ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Original Multi-Surface is perfect for everyone from DIY painters to commercial and residential professionals. It delivers sharp paint lines and is suitable for use on a wide variety of painted or lightly textured surfaces that are properly bonded - including walls, trim, skirting boards, glass, metal hardware and curved surfaces. This pack contains 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape Original Multi Surface. The roll is 38mm wide and 55m long. This wider tape is ideal for use with rollers or for fixing dust sheets to skirting. ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape is also available in an advanced version (ScotchBlue Edge-Lock Advanced Multi Surface 2093EL or ScotchBlue Edge-Lock Advanced Delicate Surface 2080EL), which features Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector. This 3M proprietary technology repels paint away from the edge of the tape to give you super sharp lines with no bleed-through or seepage underneath. ScotchBlue and Edge-Lock are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 x 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter's Tape

product.title: Scotch® 1625 Electrical contact cleaner, 400 ml
product.product_body: Scotch 1625 electrical contact cleaner gently loosens dirt, light oxide layers and impurities. It is electrically neutral and completely residue free, making for an ideal spray cleaner. Uses include switches, relays, r.c.d. protection, instrumentation, time switches, metal cleaning, computer heads, light-duty contacts for video and magnetic heads.

product.title: Scotch® 1609 Silicone Spray, 400 ml
product.product_body: Scotch® 1609 is a general use product for preventative maintenance, protection and lubrication. It lubricates moving parts, without becoming resinous and provides long lasting protection against moisture and corrosion.

features.feature: Effective over a wide temperature range (-32°c to + 177°c) maximising its potential Usage.
Can be used in the lubrication of electrical equipment, locks, hinges, other moving parts.
Scotch 1609 is neutral towards paints, plastic, rubber, foamed materials, wood and fabrics
allowing for wider application.

product.title: Scotch® 1602 Insulation Spray, 400 ml
product.product_body: 3M Scotch 1602 is a coloured (Red) insulating and covering paint based on alkyd resin. It 'hardens' into a flexible and resistant film, with excellent adhesion to most common surfaces such as metal, glass, plastic, wood, etc.

features.feature: Scotch® 1602 is resistant to uv-rays, acids, oil and alkalis.
Used as a protective coating on electrical connections, switches, switchgear, terminal boards, elect
Moisture and weatherproof.
Also suitable as a flexible covering on construction drawings and similar items.
High dielectric strength, making for a better quality insulator.

product.title: 3MTM PL150 Handheld Label Printer - Pack 1
product.product_body: The 3M PL150 Handheld Label Printer designed with the same features as the computer keyboard layout (QWERTY). With one- touch formatting keys the 3M PL150 allows for quick and easy creation of wire/cable wraps Code 39 and Code 128 barcodes, fixed length labels, and more which meet the ANSI & ISO colour standards. The 3M PL150 is perfect for a wide range of industrial labelling jobs onsite, at home and in the office.

features.feature: "favourites" and "custom" keys to eliminate repeated steps.
Now print labels that meet ansi & iso colour standard
One touch formatting keys for quick labelling of wraps, flags , code 39, code128, barcodes and more.
Prints 2 lines of text in 3 sizes. Prints 6/9/12 & 19 mm labels. Integrated Rubber Bumpers
Large character LCD display. Prints labels that stick and stay stuck. ng lasting- li-ion battery & durable design

product.title: 3M PL200W Portable Label Printer
product.product_body: The sturdy 3M PL200 portable label printer is perfect for professional labelling of cables, wires, terminal blocks, patch panels and switch boxes in harsh conditions. It wins people over with its simple and intuitive handling. A built-in memory allows easy access to around 100 logos and 122 symbols. The large, backlit display is easy to read and view the entire label files for editing. Direct access keys for common applications simplify the creation of labels through automatic set-up of size, distance, format, and vertical and fixed length. Through the use of advanced thermal transfer technology, the smooth processing of various marking tapes is made possible with high durability. The 3M PL200 label printer has been designed for efficient use in your workplace. For labels up to 19mm wide. Delivery includes: 3M PL200, user manual on CD-ROM, quick start guide, cartridge with 19mm flexible nylon tape white.

features.feature: Internal memory for 100 logos and 122 symbols
100 pre-programmed industry terms and symbols
Large backlit display and intuitive interface
Direct access buttons for the most common applications
Intelligent screen warnings

product.product_body: The 3M Smart Pen for Tablets and Smart Phones brings the familiar pen feel to your touchscreen surface with easy' smooth draw and precise icon selection. The compact pen tip provides superior touch accuracy which enables faster texting and emailing. Available in black and grey' the 3M Smart Pen's highly sensitive capacitive tip makes it ideal for the many of the popular capacitive touchscreen devices. With more than 25 years of experience manufacturing capacitive touchscreens, 3M understands the technology and the unique needs that touch-enabled tablet and smart phone users demand from a touch pen or stylus. As a result, the 3M Smart Pen has been purpose built to optimize the interaction between the touch device and pen while enhancing the user experience. No power or software required.

product.title: 3M FR530 55x35cm Adjustable Foot Rest - Charcoal Black
product.product_body:
Sitting at a desk for long periods can take its toll, causing aches and pains that affect your health and impact on your productivity. Arranging your physical workspace correctly can go a long way towards resolving these issues, enabling you to work comfortably and effectively throughout the day. The 3M FR530 Adjustable Foot Rest can help to reduce strain and fatigue on the legs, back and neck by helping you achieve an ergonomically correct posture whilst sitting at your desk. Its extra-wide platform provides plenty of space for both feet and is large enough to allow you to shift position comfortably. The tilt is easily adjusted and controlled through pressure with the feet; the height of the platform can also be altered if required. With its sturdy, heavy duty steel construction, this foot rest will significantly outlast its plastic equivalents and comes with a 5 year warranty. It is heavy enough to stay put, even on carpet, and is covered with 3M Safety Walk textured, slip-resistant material that is comfortable underfoot yet prevents feet from sliding - even if you like to work barefoot or in your socks! There is no self-assembly required – set up is as easy as opening the box, positioning it under your desk and using your feet to set it to the perfect angle. 3M and Safety Walk are trademarks of 3M Company.
Adjustable foot rest

product.title: M-1000 Automatic Electronic Tape Dispensing Machine
product.product_body: An automatic electronic tape dispenser for use with 7mm to 50mm wide rolls of tape with a 76mm core. You can set the length of tape required or press the button to advance the tape and press the scissor button to cut at required length.

features.feature: Electronic Tape Dispenser. Adult use only, not suitable for children.
Load the roll, feed into cutter, set length of tape and off you go.
Feeds tape through and cuts at desired length, when that length piece it taken out the machine automatically feeds and cuts the next bit ready for you to take when you are ready.
Great for keeping hands free for wrapping or holding something in place until taped into position.
Set length in cm's or mm's, from 20mm to 999mm. Supplied fitted with UK Plug.

product.title: FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Replacement Filter, Box of 4 Large, FAPF-03
product.product_body: Replacement Filter For FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Room Air Purifier Large - FAP-03 This replacement air purifier filter is suitable for the FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Room Air Purifier Large (FAP-03). Thanks to the quality materials and high filtering performance of this product, it is simply the best when it comes to filters for air purifier humidifiers. As well as boasting a 99.9% removal rate when it comes to pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores, this FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Replacement Filter also offers an unrivalled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rates and value for money. The filter works by effectively capturing particles that are commonly found around the home including dust, pet dander, cigarette smoke, other smoke and even particles that carry odours and viruses. Securely trapped in the filter, these disruptive particles are no longer floating around the house which means that any potential causes of discomfort - which may result in breathing difficulties, itchy eyes, irritated skin and many of the other symptoms of allergies - are eliminated. With an allergy UK seal of approval when used in conjunction with FiltreteTM Air Purifiers, this product can effectively help to alleviate the symptoms of allergies and hay fever or simply provide a cleaner living environment. * 99.9% effective at removing particles from the air which passes through the purifier. 3M Recommends filter change after 3 months of continuous use: To ensure particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning. To ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained; that's why washing the filters wouldn't work. Replacing the filter is important for maintaining the effectiveness of your FiltreteTM Room Air Purifier

features.feature: The best air purifier filters - highest filtering performance.
Unrivaled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rate and value for money
99.9% effective removal of pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores
Includes 4 x electrostatic filter - for use in the fap-03
Offers high filtering performance. Allergy UK seal of approval.

product.title: Fine Quality British Scraperboard Plain Black 610x502mm (pack 10)
product.product_body: Fine Quality Scraperboard is heavily coated with china clay, giving a smooth surface which is then overprinted with black ink. A sharp scraper tool engraves a line through the surface ink to expose the white beneath. It offers an artistic medium which is clear and precise. Used by illustrators and professional artists around the world, its super-smooth surface lets you to work in extremely fine detail. It can also be used as an ideal airbrush medium. Engraving is as easy as drawing with a pencil, and with much the same action. The board provides an extreme level of contrast not possible with other media. Scraperboard can be subsequently coloured and reworked to provide many interesting possibilities. Commercial artists value it for the sparkle it can give to the most mundane subjects, it guarantees perfect reproduction on the poorest of papers.

features.feature: British Fine Quality Scraperboard

product.title: 3M Heart Shaped Post-It Notes | Post It | Sticky Notes| 76mm x 76mm | 225 sheets | Pink Tones
product.product_body: For over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message or reminder. Post-it Notes are great for phone messages, shopping lists, to-do lists and instructions. Keep your cube handy by the phone to note down contact details, and then peel and stick the note into your address book until you have time to create a permanent entry. At work, school or college this cube format gives you a long-lasting stock of notes for your desk. Use them to annotate documents, books and projects, or for quick messages, reminders and revision notes. This Post-it Notes Cube contains 225 heart-shaped sheets measuring 76mm x 76mm, in various shades of pink. Post-it Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. The practical choice for everyday communication, a Post-it Note makes your message really stand out. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.

features.feature: 3M Heart Shaped Post-It Notes - A fun way to leave a message or make a note
Heart Shaped Notes in 3 Different Shades of Pink
Contains 225 Sheets in Each Cube
Each Sheet is 76mm x 76mm
Great for sending a special note to that special someone!!

product.title: Scotch Book Repair Tape, 50.8mm x 13.7m, 1 roll
product.product_body:
Trust Scotch Book Repair Tape to help you mend books, magazines, folders and more, giving you many more years of enjoyment. This tough, crystal clear, self-adhesive tape is strong and reliable - perfect for use at home, in the office and at school. Use it to repair or reinforce the spine, edges, covers and pages of books, magazines, journals, binders and even record sleeves, preserving your most useful and treasured items for years to come. Pliable and conformable, this tape will adhere to even the most awkward corners and folds to give a secure, long-lasting seal that flexes with cover or page movements. The acid-free adhesive is safe to use on photographs and sensitive papers, and will not yellow, dry out or split over time. Scotch Book Repair Tape is great for those favourite paperbacks that you come back to time and again, or lend out to friends, only for the cover to start to separate or pages come loose. Use this tape along the length of the spine and fold it around to protect the seam that joins the front and back covers. Run lengths of tape inside the spine to reattach loose pages, and even to repair ones that may have torn. Children’s books are notoriously difficult to keep in a good condition, but Scotch Book Repair Tape will help you mend their all-time favourites, and reinforce the corners and edges of new purchases to make them sturdier. Because the tape is so clear, you could also use it to fix labels to the spines of your books, folders and binders – great for the office, libraries, nurseries, schools, students and the super-organised! Scotch Book Repair Tape is easy to use. It unwinds smoothly and gives you the chance to position and reposition the strip carefully before pressing down to seal it permanently. This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch Book Repair Tape, measuring 50.8mm wide by 13.7m long. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 roll of Scotch Book Repair tape

product.title: Scotch® Filament Packing Tape 8915 Blue, 24mm x 55m
product.product_body: Our super-resilient Scotch® Filament Packing Tape is reinforced with single-direction glass filaments to ensure that once it's in place, whatever you've stuck or bundled together won't budge. Great for packing, repairing or DIY, our durable, reliable tape can be used in both the home and office. Scotch Filament Packing Tape will not stretch along its length, so you can be sure it will hold even large, heavy items exactly where you place them - ideal for DIY and repairs. It can also be used to keep tools and items securely together in the shed or store room, preventing items falling out when you open the door. You'll also find our tape invaluable during house and office moves. It can be used for keeping loose items together - such as computers with their accessories - or to keep drawers and cupboard doors from opening in transit. When it's time to remove the tape, it will leave no adhesive residue behind, even on PVC or stainless steel surfaces. Make daily tasks easier with Scotch - the high-quality, high-performance brand you can trust.

Ideal for packing, bundling and securing heavy materials

product.title: Scotch GiftWrap Tape, Dispensered Roll 19mm x 16.5m - 1 roll
product.product_body:
When you have taken the time to choose a special gift, make your present look perfect with Scotch GiftWrap Tape. It features a unique satin finish that has low reflectivity and almost disappears on most gift wrap papers for a seamless join and professional finish. It is quick and easy to unwind and cut using the child-friendly plastic dispenser supplied, and sticks securely to ensure your presents remain under wraps! Whilst designed to perform on gift wrap papers, Scotch GiftWrap Tape can also come in handy at home and school for general mending, sealing, mounting and craft activities where you need a discreet finish. The adhesive is photo safe and long-ageing: it won’t damage photographs. This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch GiftWrap Tape. The roll measures 19mm wide by 16.5m long and is supplied on a handy, refillable dispenser. The easy-to-use dispenser unwinds the tape smoothly and cuts cleanly and evenly, resisting splits and tears. The dispenser can take any roll up to 33m long on a 1 inch core. Larger, weighted dispensers are also available to enable one-handed tape dispensing and make wrapping easier! There is a wide range of colours, shapes and formats to choose from to fit with your workspace or lifestyle. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 dispensered roll of Scotch GiftWrap Tape

product.title: Scotch Magic Rabbit Tape Dispenser (Pink) with 1 roll of Scotch Magic Tape, 19mm x 15m (C29-P)
product.product_body:
Personalise your desk with this modern, compact designer tape dispenser. Its quirky rabbit shape and matt pink and white finish will enhance both the look and the practicality of your workspace, making life a whole lot easier and more stylish when it comes to finding and using your Scotch Magic tape. The Scotch Magic Rabbit Tape Dispenser has a weighted base to enable you to unwind and tear off tape with one hand, but is small and compact enough to sit unobtrusively on your desk or other work surface, ready to use when you need it. When your tape runs out, it’s quick and easy to refill the dispenser with Scotch Magic Tape up to 33 metres long. The mandrel mechanism is attached to the dispenser so you won’t run the risk of losing it every time you need to change your roll of tape. This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape included in the pack. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matt surface which can be written on; it won’t yellow with age and it won’t ghost on photocopies. Value packs containing multiple rolls are also available, so you’ll always have a supply for your Scotch Tape Dispenser! Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 x tape dispenser ;1 x roll of Scotch Magic Tape

product.product_body:
Personalise your desk with this modern, compact designer tape dispenser. Its quirky rabbit shape and matt grey and white finish will enhance both the look and the practicality of your workspace, making life a whole lot easier and more stylish when it comes to finding and using your Scotch Magic tape. The Scotch Magic Rabbit Tape Dispenser has a weighted base to enable you to unwind and tear off tape with one hand, but is small and compact enough to sit unobtrusively on your desk or other work surface, ready to use when you need it. This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape included in the pack. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. product.title: Scotch Magic Tape 900 Natural Fibre Film 19mm x 33m (Pack of 3)
product.product_body:
Scotch Magic Tape is the essential tape for home, school and office. This strong, general purpose tape looks opaque on the roll, but is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matte surface which doesn’t reflect light and therefore won’t draw attention to itself, giving you a neat and seamless look. It can be written on with pen, pencil or marker, so is great for annotating documents or making labels. It won’t dry out or ‘yellow’ with age, and its low reflectivity means that it won’t ghost on photocopies – perfect when you need to attach photos, graphics, or other small items to backing pages in order to photocopy them. It is photo-safe and ideal for all general purpose home, office and school tasks such as document mending, sealing envelopes, school projects, scrapbooks and crafts. Thanks to its gentle adhesive, you can stick then re-stick each piece as your project demands, then jot a helpful note with a pen or pencil on top when you're done. Scotch Magic Tape – A Greener Choice is a more eco-friendly tape than traditional alternatives, but offers the same great performance. It is made from more than 53% plant-based materials, including a plant-based, solvent-free adhesive. The core is made from 100% recycled cardboard, and rolls are packaged in boxes made from more than 83% recycled cardboard. This pack consists of 1 box, containing 3 rolls of tape. Each roll measures 19mm wide by 33m long. Scotch Magic Tape can easily be torn by hand, but a wide range of dispensers are available in a variety of colours, shapes and formats to fit with your workspace or lifestyle. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 box, containing 3 rolls of Scotch Magic Tape - A Greener Choice

product.title: Scotch Decorative Packaging Tape on Easy Start Dispenser, Black and White Criss Cross Design, 48mm x 12.7m (141-PRTD2)
product.product_body:
Bring a pop of personality to your parcels with this fun and fashionable packaging tape. With good sticking power and long lasting hold, it’s ideal for wrapping lighter boxes and sealing padded envelopes for sending through the post. Want to make an impression when selling online? This tape will make your packages stand out and put a smile on the recipient’s face, which can only help your ratings! When it comes to mailing gifts, treats and birthday surprises, wrap your package with colour and style and make it extra-special. Despite its light-hearted appearance, this tape has been designed for shipping and is the same great quality material that you’d expect from traditional Scotch Packaging Tape. It is strong and sticky, providing a reliable seal without drying out, splitting or coming unstuck. The Easy Start Dispenser unwinds the tape accurately and easily, without tangling or wrinkling, to give a smooth, secure seal in seconds. No more twisted bundles of wasted tape or nasty bits stuck in your teeth - just run the dispenser along the gap to be sealed, then angle it up to cut off the tape at the required length. The dispenser itself is small, neat and easy to store – perfect for the home or office. This pack contains one roll of Scotch Decorative Packaging Tape printed with a black and white criss cross design. The roll is 48mm wide and 12.7m long, and comes pre-loaded onto an Easy Start Dispenser. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 roll of tape on a dispenser

product.title: Scotch Packaging Tape on an Easy Start Dispenser, Brown, 48mm x 20.3m (C5020EU) - 1 pack
product.product_body: The general purpose, brown packing tape, still as strong and sticky as ever but now even easier to use as it comes pre-loaded onto a neat Easy Start Dispenser. This general purpose packing tape is ideal for medium duty tasks, like sealing rough parcels, cardboard boxes and cartons for mailing. It provides a reliable seal without drying out, splitting or coming unstuck. The Easy Start Dispenser unwinds the tape accurately and easily, without tangling or wrinkling, to give a smooth, secure seal in seconds. No more twisted bundles of wasted tape or nasty bits stuck in your teeth - just run the dispenser along the gap to be sealed, then angle it up to cut off the tape at the required length! Use it when packing boxes ready to move house or return to college, when you need a strong, reliable tape that is quick and easy to use. The dispenser itself is small, neat and easy to store – perfect for the home or office. This pack contains one roll of Scotch Original Brown Packaging Tape, measuring 50mm wide and 20m long, and comes pre-loaded onto an Easy Start Dispenser. Scotch Packaging Tape on an Easy Start dispenser also comes in Extra Resistant, a versatile clear tape option for closing and sealing boxes as well as label protection and laminating. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: 3M 1900 Duct Tape; 50mm x 50m Black
product.product_body:
3M 1900 Duct Tape 3MTM Duct Tape 1900 is a conformable cloth duct tape, made with a polyethylene coated cloth scrim and synthetic rubber adhesive. Duct Tape 1900 is a good choice for non-critical applications. Duct tape 1900 can be used for many purposes: masking, marking, light duty sealing and holding, bundling. Easy tear, low profile, Polyethylene backing provides moisture resistance to tape applications, synthetic rubber adhesive sticks well to many surfaces. Good curve masking and wrapping irregular surfaces, easy handling, can be used in combination with humidity, conformable, individually wrapped roll for easy identification and to keep the roll clean until ready for use.
• Silver polyethylene backing over a cloth scrim resists moisture for reliable tape performance in moist or humid environments • Synthetic rubber pressure sensitive adhesive sticks on contact to metal, glass, plastic, concrete, and other surfaces in non-critical applications • Surface readily accepts writing with markers for temporary labelling • Tape tears easily by hand from the roll • Individually wrapped roll for easy identification and to keep the roll clean until ready for use
Sold as a single 50mm x 50m roll; the product will be shipped by Royal Mail Second Class Post, and should be delivered within 3-5 working days. Orders submitted and paid before noon on weekdays, will be shipped the same day.

product.title: Scotch Pop-up Tape Dispenser For Gift Wrap
product.product_body: We've all been there when we're gift wrapping - lots of bits of tape across the edge of the table... or getting bits stuck in our teeth as we use them as scissors! There's also the hassle of long strips sticking to themselves or worse - to the wrong place on the paper! Scotch® Tape Strips can change all that. Pre-cut Scotch® Tape Strips pop up one by one from a handy wrist dispenser - leaving both hands free to wrap. And our SatinTM tape is designed to disappear on most gift wraps. Make Christmas easy this year with Scotch® Tape Strips.

product.title: Scotch Magic Tape Dispenser by Karim Rashid (Black) with 1 roll of Scotch Magic Tape, 19mm x 7.5m (C36-B-EU)
product.product_body:
Personalise your desk with this modern, sleek tape dispenser by world-renowned product designer Karim Rashid. Its smooth pebble shape and glossy black finish will enhance both the look and the practicality of your workspace, making life a whole lot easier and more stylish when it comes to finding and using your Scotch Magic tape. The Scotch Tape Dispenser by Karim Rashid has a weighted base to enable you to unwind and tear off tape with one hand, but is small and compact enough to sit unobtrusively on your desk or other work surface, ready to use when you need it. When your tape runs out, it’s quick and easy to refill the dispenser with Scotch Magic Tape up to 33 metres long. This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape included in the pack. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matt surface which can be written on; it won’t yellow with age and it won’t ghost on photocopies. Value packs containing multiple rolls are also available, so you’ll always have a supply for your Scotch Tape Dispenser! Scotch and Magic are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 tape dispenser and 1 roll of Scotch Magic Tape

product.title: Scotch Magic Tape Sandal Shoe Dispenser (Turquoise) with 1 Roll of Scotch Magic Tape, 19mm x 8.9m (C30-SANDAL)
product.product_body:
Personalise your workspace with this bright, funky tape dispenser in the shape of a turquoise high-heeled sandal! A great gift for students, colleagues and friends, this handy desktop essential will make life a whole lot easier and more stylish when it comes to finding and using their Scotch Magic tape. Scotch Magic Tape dispensers keep your tape within easy reach – great when you’re wrapping presents, sealing envelopes or mending documents and books. This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape measuring 19mm wide by 8.9m long - when it runs out, it’s quick and easy to refill with a roll of Scotch Magic Tape up to 33 metres long. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matt surface which can be written on in pen or pencil; it won’t yellow with age and it won’t ghost on photocopies. Value packs containing multiple rolls are also available, so you’ll always have a supply for your Scotch Tape Dispenser! Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 tape dispenser and 1 roll of Scotch Magic tape

product.title: Scotch Expressions Tape, Blue, 19mm x 7.62mm, C214-BLU, 1 Roll
product.product_body:
Decorate and personalise your craft projects, gift wrapping, home-made cards, stationery and more with this bright and exciting Scotch Expressions Tape. It’s the Scotch Tape you know and trust, in a range of vibrant colours that will really stand out from the crowd! Scotch Magic Tape has always been the essential tape for home, school and office. Scotch Expressions Tape offers many of the same benefits, but with an added burst of fun and personality! Its elegant, matt finish is sleek and contemporary, and can be written on in pen, pencil or marker – great for adding notes and comments to scrapbooks and albums, or for labelling personal items like notebooks, folders and pencil tins. The tried and tested adhesive holds strongly for as long as you need it to and won’t dry out with age, but is easy to remove and even reposition. This makes it a useful addition to your kids’ craft supplies, helping them get their colourful creations and school projects just right. Use it with plain or patterned gift wrap to create a truly unique present, or to seal birthday cards and letters. Because it is photo-safe and removable, it can also help make a colourful display of photos and postcards that can be taken down and rearranged whenever the mood takes you! This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch Expressions Tape in Blue, measuring 19mm wide by 7.62m long. Also available in Pink and Purple. Scotch Expressions Tape fits Scotch Desktop and Handheld Tape Dispensers, which make it super-quick and easy to unwind and cut off tape as you need it. Scotch and Magic are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 roll of tape

product.title: Scotch Satin Tape Strip Refills Ref 90-ST
product.product_body:
Make wrapping at Christmas and birthdays easy with Scotch Pop Up Tape! Wrapping can be stressful time with bits of tape everywhere, and never having enough hands. Scotch Pop Up Tape Strips can change all that. These clever little pre-cut strips of tape pop up one by one from the Scotch Pop Up Tape Dispenser - leaving both hands free to wrap. The tape features a unique satin finish that has low reflectivity and almost disappears on most gift wrap papers for a seamless join. It makes special gifts and parcels look fantastic, and sticks securely to ensure your presents remain under wraps! Scotch Pop Up Tape Refill Packs are designed for use with Scotch Pop Up Tape Dispensers. This pack of refills contains 3 pads and each pad contains 75 pre-cut strips of tape, measuring 19mm x 50mm (225 strips in total.) Scotch Pop Up Tape Dispensers are available in two formats: the Handband Dispenser is mounted on an elasticated strap to wear around the wrist or hand; the DeskGrip Dispenser has a unique gripper base that sticks to smooth horizontal surfaces without adhesive – great for use on a desk or table. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.
1 pack of Scotch Pop-Up Tape Refills; 3 pads of refills per pack

product.title: Scotch-Brite Non Scratch Design Sponge Scourer Twin Pack (Pack of 5)
product.product_body: Take the hard graft out of housework with the range of high performance cleaning products from Scotch-Brite. For years, 3M have listened to customers and taken on their cleaning challenges in an effort to make life easier. All Scotch-Brite household products have been developed with those pain points in mind, giving you the right tools to speed through your chores with gleaming results all over the house. A Scotch-Brite Non-Scratch Sponge Scourer adds a pop of cheerful colour to your sink area. Despite their light-hearted appearance, these sponge scourers are made from super-absorbent cellulose that makes quick work of wiping surfaces and mopping up spills. Shaped to provide a comfortable grip, they can reach into tight corners for a really thorough clean and have a light duty scouring surface that is safe to use on non-stick cookware, glass, plastic and delicate surfaces. This item includes 5 packs, each containing 2 Scotch-Brite Non-Scratch Design Sponge Scourers (10 in total). Each pack includes 1 x blue sponge and 1 x purple sponge, with a different design on the scouring surface of each. Keep a stock under the sink, share others with friends or family and enjoy the Scotch-Brite feeling of clean for less. When they need a wash, pop your Scotch-Brite Non-Scratch Sponge Scourers in the dishwasher or sanitise them in boiling water. It is recommended that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage. Not for aquarium use. Scotch-Brite is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: 3M Scotch ATG Advanced Tape Glider Kit Pink Plus 2 Refill Rolls, i.e. 2 rolls in the kit plus 2 extra rolls
product.product_body: The Scotch® Pink ATG - The Photo Safe Sticky Tape Glider Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider Kit. The finger trigger allows for a quick, controlled application of adhesive in neat, thin lines, while the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience! With this handy kit, you get two rolls of photo-safe acid-free tape too, which gives giving you everything you need for mess-free, professional-finish crafting. You'll love how the Advanced Tape Glider cuts out the mess and lets you show off your creative side. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, this clever kit will make your projects quicker, cleaner and more satisfying. Rather than traditional glue, which can seep through paper and cause wrinkling, the tape leaves flat, neat lines that stick to all sorts of crafting surfaces. Our Acid-Free Adhesive Transfer Tape is perfect for mounting photographs onto card or updating scrapbooks or albums. It won't discolour or damage your photos and it's strong and durable - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out and make your photos slip from the page. Popular with craft bloggers and professional stationery makers, this kit is an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox. Strong and durable, our General Purpose Tape is great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out, yellow or peel and can be used on all sorts of textiles - an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox. For use only with 6 mm rolls of tape.

features.feature: Ideal for scrapbooking, card-making, photo albums and stationery
Accurate hand dispenser for Scotch® ATG adhesive transfer tapes
Safe, quick and easy to use with no messy clean-up
Creates thin, neat adhesive lines
1 Scotch advanced tape glider in pink and 2 rolls of acid-free tape per pack, plus 2 rolls of general purpose.

product.title: Monitor Stand, 350mm wide, 250mm deep, 250mm tall, Various Colours Available (Red)
product.product_body: A bespoke item designed and manufactured by SignLine as we couldn't find a suitable monitor stand available anywhere else. The cast acrylics used give a nice gloss finish, the monitor is at eye level and the compartments give plenty of storage space to help keep your desk tidy. The stand is supplied in flat pack form, I have glued one together and another 3 have been slotted together, a tube of super glue is included which you can use to adhere the stand together if you prefer but it is best to assemble a few times to be sure you are happy doing that before adhering. A small amount of super glue can be placed into a channel at a time before placing the sections in. Assemble as shown in the photo's, the top is last to go on and locks all the sections together.

features.feature: Made in the UK using High Quality 5mm Cast Acrylic by Perspex.
Sized to give a good height position for your monitor, most stands are not tall enough.
Available in Various colours, please request any required colour that is not listed and we will list it if available.
From desk surface to top of monitors in sample photos is 700mm.
350mm wide x 250mm platform, 250mm in height. Storage areas are 148mm wide by 245mm tall and 235mm deep.

The stand is supplied in flat pack form, I have glued one together and another 3 have been slotted together, a tube of super glue is included which you can use to adhere the stand together if you prefer but it is best to assemble a few times to be sure you are happy doing that before adhering. A small amount of super glue can be placed into a channel at a time before placing the sections in. Assemble as shown in the photo's, the top is last to go on and locks all the sections together.

features.feature: Made in the UK using High Quality 5mm Cast Acrylic by Perspex.
Sized to give a good height position for your monitor, most stands are not tall enough.
Available in Various colours, please request any required colour that is not listed and we will list it if available.
From desk surface to top of monitors in sample photos is 700mm.
350mm wide x 250mm platform, 250mm in height. Storage areas are 148mm wide by 245mm tall and 235mm deep.

product.title: Silverline 151212 Chainsaw File - 4.0 mm/5/32-inch
product.product_body:
Round file designed for sharpening chainsaw chains quickly and accurately. Attached guide plate holds file at correct depth, clear markings for easy angle alignment.
Recognised and trusted throughout the UK and Europe, Silverline’s comprehensive range of tools meet both current and future demands. These products utilise the better technology, ensuring Silverline customers get better tools. The Silverline range includes over 5000 hand and power tools for use in the home, garden and workshop. Subjected to thorough testing, Silverline delivers tools that comply with the better standards in quality and safety. Through continuous monitoring and improvement of their suppliers, they provide tools that are approved and certified with long guarantees, so you can be sure you’re investing in the best tools on the market today. Silverline cares about the environment. As their products are sourced from factories around the world, they run continuous improvement programmes to ensure they only deliver quality tools that comply with the very latest environmental standards. Silverline is committed to supporting human rights and upholding moral and ethical standards. They monitor their supply chain closely through a controlled programme of factory audits and assessments. To pass their audit, all suppliers must actively comply with all relevant local and international legislation and demonstrate a good, safe and healthy working environment.

product.title: PEARLESCENT PREMIUM LINO PRINTING INKS 300ml Tubes - Pearlescent Violet
product.product_body: Viscous, water based printing inks specially formulated to give a smooth flow resulting in excellent coverage and printing properties. This non permanent ink has been formulated using high quality specialist raw materials to give enhanced tack and transfer for superior printability and performance. The drying time has also been optimised to give a good balance of 'on tray working time' at typical ambient conditions. All tubes are 300ml.

product.title: MOUNTED SOFTCUT PRINTING BLOCKS - 300x200x3mm (Pack of 10)
product.product_body: SoftCut is designed as an alternative to Lino. Formulated for very easy cutting, it holds fine detail without crumbling and yet stands hard against the pressures of printing presses. Can be drawn on with pencil, due to its near white surface. Finely smooth on one side, textured on the other, SoftCut is both double sided and flexible. Mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks, giving extra rigidity allowing the user to achieve consistent, flat prints.

features.feature: Mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks, giving extra rigidity allowing the user to achieve consistent, flat prints.
Formulated for very easy cutting, it holds fine detail without crumbling and yet stands hard against the pressures of printing presses.
SoftCut is both double sided and flexible.
Manufactured in The United Kingdom!
Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.

product.title: SOFTCUT PRINTING BLOCKS - 300x200x3mm (pack 10)
product.product_body: SoftCutTM is manufactured by us to be the best alternative to Lino - designed to extend the block printing experience to a greater range of people. SoftCutTM is formulated for very easy cutting. It holds fine detail without crumbling and yet stands hard against the pressures of printing presses, this new material can be drawn on in pencil, due to its near white surface. Finely smooth on one side, textured on the other, SoftCutTM is both double sided and flexible. Also available in 45mm diameter discs, which when combined with our specially developed Baren, can be used to create your own stamps. Moulded in a clean environment, fully compliant with both EN 71 and the European Directive for Phthalates.

features.feature: Softcut, the latest innovation in block cutting and printing!
Super-smooth surface makes cutting easy, cutters simply glide through with minimum effort. The finished softcut block can be displayed as a work of art in its own right.
Softcut prints well on most papers, card and fabric, and can even print on curved surfaces due to its flexibility.

product.product_body:
This Smooth surface Printfoam is 10mm thick allowing deeper and more detailed impressions and is ideal for use as a fun and safe introduction to block printing for younger users. Impressions can be made in the foam blocks using either pointed or even relatively blunt objects (a pencil or wooden lollypop stick).
1 x 10 Sheets Printfoam

product.title: 3M NexcareTM Steri-Strip® First Aid Skin Closures
product.product_body: These alow allergy Steri-StripTM skin closures are highly effective for closing deeper wounds and reducing scarring. Use them to close the edges of cuts, reduce bleeding and prevent cuts from reopening. Important: Steri-Strip® skin closures are not an alternative to stitches. If the wound is deep and bleeding continuously, seek medical assistance immediately.

features.feature: Advanced protection for deeper cuts
Easy to apply and remove
Low allergy
Effective for closing deeper wounds and reducing scarring.
Contains 5 x 3mm x 75mm and 3 x 6mm x 75mm sized strips

product.product_body:
HDT-A meets the longitudinal sealing requirements of VDE 0278 part 3 and is, therefore, ideal for sealing underground or exposed inline joints and terminations.
HDT-A is specially designed medium wall tubing, which provides tough and flexible insulation and is ideal for the protection of cable joints and terminations. HDT-A is lined with a specially designed adhesive, which is applied during the tubing's extrusion process. This achieves a very smooth adhesive layer, which ensures excellent sealing properties. MDT-A meets the requirements of VDE 0278 part 3.

features.feature: Suitable for underground cable joint applications. Supplied in 1 metre pieces
HDT-A is supplied with a specially designed hot melt adhesive layer.
Thick wall polyolefin tubing is a tough and weather ability suited for exposed applications.
Shrink ratio up to 4 : 1, 12mm - 3mm

Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design 2 Packs of 2 Pads
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. When you need to shift stubborn grease or burnt-on food, Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design will quickly scour and clean, working up to 50% faster than similar sponge scourers and with twice the efficiency. Their easy-grip design makes them comfortable to hold, whilst their coarse scouring surface makes cleaning a breeze. For worry-free washing up, these pads have a unique design which protects your nails, reducing the need for gloves and the likelihood of broken nails. Once you've powered through the pots, use the super absorbent sponge to wipe down surfaces and the sink. Thanks to their heavy duty cleaning power, these scourers are not suitable for non-stick, delicate or highly polished surfaces. This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Scourers with Nailsaver Design, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage.

features.feature: Heavy duty sponge scourers with a unique ridge to protect finger nails
Make quick work of grease and burnt-on food
Ideal for cleaning stubborn residues from pots, pans ovens and grills
Superior foam sponge helps dry surfaces quickly
Long-lasting and reusable. 2 packs of 2 sponge scourers

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Mini Lint Roller Coloured Handles
product.product_body: Scotch-BriteTM Mini Lint Roller Coloured Handles. Fluff, pet-hair and dust are part of everyday life, but they can make your clothes, furniture or car look dirty or unkempt. Scotch-BriteTM Lint Rollers have been developed with "sticky" technology to quickly lift lint, fluff, pet-hair, dust and other dry residue from car seats, upholstery and even your clothes without damaging fabric. Hold the lint roller by the ergonomically-designed handle and pass the roll across the fabric you wish to clean. When the top-sheet is covered with fluff and appears to have reduced stickiness, tear it off at the perforation to reveal a new sticky sheet beneath. Save the label to wrap around the outside of your lint roller and you'll stop it from sticking to everything else in your drawer or picking up dirt when you're not using it. A must-have for pet owners, they are also great to keep handy in the car, in your desk or by the front door for a quick spruce up of your clothing before you leave. This mini size is perfectly proportioned for keeping in your briefcase, glove box or handbag - for a neat neckline or a spotless suit on-the-go. This item is a mini lint roller with a comfortably-designed handle and perforated "sticky" sheets. It offers superior adhesion and is quick and easy to use - this is how we roll!

features.feature: Sticky sheets for superior adhesion
Comfortable, ergonomically designed handle
Super sticky technology
Perfect for keeping in a glove box, briefcase or handbag
Travel-size lint roller - a mini version of the famous Scotch-Brite original!

Simply roll the strip across clothes, fabric, furniture, drapes, bedding and more, to remove pet hair, dust and debris. 30 sheets per roll Tears cleanly down to the last sheet. Perfect for on-the-go, in your desk drawer at work, or in your car.

product.product_body: Futuro offers a wide variety of quality products to support your active life. Each and every product is designed for comfort and fit combined with a natural appearance. Designed to provide firm and comfortable support. Designed to help support the knee cap (patella). Absorbent fabric helps pull perspiration away from skin. Helps relieve tired, aching muscles and joints. Reversible for right or left knee. The design of their quality spiral lift knee support reached out and embraced the weak and sore muscles above and below, supporting them like a firm, invisible hand. Not only does this product offer firm support, its design permits movement without slipping or rolling. It is easily reversible for left or right knee.

features.feature: Designed to provide comfortable, firm support and supports the knee cap (patella)

product.title: Futuro Comfort Lift Adjustable Beige Knee Support Medium 1 Pack
product.product_body:
Whether it's jogging one more mile, golfing the extra nine holes, or simply being able to keep active around the house when carrying an injury, Futuro braces and supports can help to give you the support, compression and confidence to keep going. Developed by trusted healthcare brand 3M in conjunction with a panel of medical experts, the range offers superb comfort, support and fit for a variety of joint problems and conditions. The knee is one of the largest joints in the human body, and one of the most complex. With its incredible three-dimensional range of motion, it can often be a source of pain due to injury, aging, surgery or physical inactivity. The Futuro Comfort Lift Knee Support provides relief and compression to knees that need it, helping to ease the discomfort of sprains, strains, arthritis and swelling without restricting normal movement. Made from breathable, dual-stretch knitted material, it incorporates a comfort panel to reduce ‘bunching’ behind the knee and is sleek enough to fit discreetly under clothing – enabling you to keep up with your busy schedule and walk through your day with confidence. This pack contains one Futuro Comfort Lift Knee Support in beige, size Medium. It is reversible and can be worn on either the left or the right knee, providing a mild level of support. The Medium size will fit knees with a diameter of 36.8-43.2cm (measure around the kneecap whilst in a standing position). Caution: This product contains natural rubber latex which may cause allergic reactions. Futuro is a trademark of 3M Company.
This product is designed to offer a mild level of support.

features.feature: Mild support for sprains, strains, arthritis and swelling
Breathable, dual-stretch material for all-day comfort
Sleek sleeve design follows natural shape of knee and is discreet under clothing
Easy to put on and take off
Fits left or right knees measuring 36.8-43.2cm in diameter

product.title: Futuro Comfort Lift Adjustable Beige Knee Support - Medium (36.8 cm - 43.2 cm)
product.product_body:
This discreet knee support bandage can help ease sprains, strains, arthritis and swelling while fitting discreetly under clothing and can be used on the left or right knee. It is one of Futuro's supports and braces from 3M--the makers of 3M Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, Micropore First Aid Tape, Littmann Stethoscopes and many other leading healthcare brands. Futuro is among the most trusted names in supports with a strong heritage and is the number-one-selling brand globally. Futuro has been manufacturing joint and knee bandages in the USA since 1917 when the first arch brace was invented. A panel of experts including engineers, physicians and medical professionals are at the centre of the continuous product development of Futuro products, each product being specifically designed to provide the comfort, support and proper fit needed to continue living an active life and speed recovery from injuries. Compared to other support products available, Futuro is confident that if you choose a Futuro product you will feel the difference of extra comfort in use, owing to the design of each product and the added benefit of adjustable products for a tailored fit. Depending on the injury you have and the compression level required, Futuro can help you choose the right product from their range.
This support is designed to offer a mild level of support.

features.feature: Support level: mild
Breathable dual-stretch, power-knit material for all day comfort
Sleek sleeve design follows natural shape of knee and is discreet under clothing
Use for sprains, strains, arthritis and swelling
Size 14.5 inches to 17 inches / 36.8 cm to 43.2 cm (measure around the kneecap while in standing position)

product.product_body:

It features adjustable straps, open kneecap design and side ventilation for breathability and reduced bunching behind the knee. It is one of Futuro's supports and braces from 3M--the makers of 3M Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, Micropore First Aid Tape, Littmann Stethoscopes and many other leading healthcare brands. Futuro is among the most trusted names in supports with a strong heritage and is the number-one-selling brand globally. Futuro has been manufacturing joint and knee bandages in the USA since 1917 when the first arch brace was invented. A panel of experts including engineers, physicians and medical professionals are at the centre of the continuous product development of Futuro products, each product being specifically designed to provide the comfort, support and the proper fit needed to continue living an active life and speed recovery from injuries. Compared to other support products available, Futuro is confident that if you choose a Futuro product you will feel the difference of extra comfort in use, owing to the design of each product and the added benefit of adjustable products for a tailored fit. Depending on the injury you have and the compression level required, Futuro can help you choose the right product from their range.
This support is designed to offer a moderate level of support.

product.title: Nexcare Coldhot Maternity Compress
product.product_body: Nexcare ColdHot Therapy products are gel-filled compresses with dual purpose: they can provide either flexible ice or soothing heat as a drug-free way to treat pain and inflammation locally. The non-toxic gel is encased in a strong, reliable plastic envelope, which is shaped like a horseshoe to leave the nipple area free and flexible enough to mould to your breast and sit comfortably inside your nursing bra. The compresses are hand washable and reusable, and are supplied with soft fabric protective covers. A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or warmed up by placing in hot water. Cold therapy can be an effective way to relieve breast congestion and alleviate pain in the case of mastitis or inflammation; when used warm, the compresses can help to stimulate milk flow, unblock ducts and soothe the discomfort of engorgement. They may also be used as an aid to reduce post-operative swelling and discomfort following breast surgery: Please consult your doctor before purchasing for this purpose. This pack contains 2 x maternity compresses, each with its own soft fabric protective cover. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product. Nexcare ColdHot Gel Compresses are also available in different formats for treating joints and other areas of the body. Nexcare and ColdHot are trademarks of 3M Company.

features.feature: Reusable cool/warm gel compresses for breastfeeding mothers
Ease discomfort caused by engorgement, blocked ducts and inflammation
Natural, immediate pain relief without drugs
Slip comfortably inside your bra
Pack contains 2 compresses, each with a soft fabric protective cover

product.title: Nexcare Neckwarmer Refill
product.product_body: The neck can be a focal point of tension and stress, often causing pain to spread to the head and the rest of the body. Applying soothing heat is one of the oldest known, natural ways to treat muscular tension, relieving pain and promoting relaxation in the affected area. This pack contains 6 heat pads for use with the Nexcare Neck Warmer (not supplied) - a comfortable, easy-to-use collar that provides medication-free relief from aches and pains in the neck and shoulders. Simply remove one of the heat pads from its packet and shake it for a few seconds – no microwave or hot water required! Contact with the air will activate the heat pad, which will then continue to give off warmth for up to 7 hours. Slip the pad into the pocket of your neck warmer and position it directly over the back of the neck. Should you only need to use the neck warmer for a short period of time, the heat pad can be removed and stored in an airtight plastic bag, ready to use at a later date. Nexcare Neck Warmers are available from Amazon and larger pharmacies. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product for the first time. Nexcare is a trademark of 3M Company.

features.feature: Six heat pads for use with the Nexcare Neck Warmer (not included)
A natural heat remedy for aching shoulders and neck
Comfortable, safe and easy to use
No microwave or hot water required
One heat pad provides up to 7 hours warmth

product.product_body: The neck can be a focal point of tension and stress, often causing pain to spread to the head and the rest of the body. The Nexcare Neck Warmer is a comfortable, easy-to-use collar that provides medication-free relief from aches and pains in the neck and shoulders. It radiates warmth to reduce muscular tension caused by stress and poor body positioning, promoting a sense of comfort and relaxation. Once in place, it sits snugly and discreetly so can be used whenever and wherever you want, both indoors and outside. This pack includes 4 heat pads for use with your Nexcare Neck Warmer. product.title: Nexcare ColdHot Back and Abdomen Belt S/M
product.product_body: Nexcare Cold Hot Therapy products are gel-filled compresses with dual purpose: they can provide either flexible ice or comforting heat as a drug-free way to treat pain locally. A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or freezer, or warmed up in the microwave or by placing in hot water. Choose cold therapy to treat acute injuries and relieve the pain of musculoskeletal injury (the cold will help to reduce the swelling, inflammation and pain); or heat to ease pain and reduce muscle spasm associated with chronic back pain, period pain and rheumatoid arthritis. Nexcare Cold Hot Gel Compresses are hand washable and reusable. This pack includes a simple-to-use, adjustable belt that holds the compress in place against the back or abdomen and gives light support. Simply cool or warm up your compress as per the instructions in the box, slip it into the pocket of the belt and secure the belt firmly in place. The belt is composed of several layers of fabric, including 3M’s patented Thinsulate insulation material. This helps keep the compress at a constant temperature for longer, giving you prolonged periods of pain relief before you need to re-cool or reheat it. Please note that cold therapy should be applied for a maximum of 20 minutes, before removing the compress for another 20 minutes and then reapplying. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product. Nexcare, Cold Hot and Thinsulate are trademarks of 3M Company.

features.feature: Reusable cold/hot gel compress with adjustable belt
Natural, drug-free relief from back and abdominal pain
Use cold to reduce swelling and inflammation, or warm to soothe muscular ache
Belt contains Thinsulate insulation fabric that helps to retain temperature for longer
Small/Medium size fits waist measurement up to 100cm

product.title: 3m Nexcare Coldhot Therapy Gel Maxi Pack
product.product_body: When you are suffering from localised pain and aches, sometimes you need relief on the spot. The NexcareTM ColdHot Therapy Gel Maxi Pack is a drug-free remedy which provides targeted soothing, for comfort where you need it the most. Nexcare ColdHot Therapy products are gel-filled compresses with dual purpose: they can provide either flexible ice or comforting heat as a drug-free way to treat pain locally. The non-toxic gel is encased in a strong, reliable plastic envelope which is flexible enough to wrap around joints or mould to a particular area of the body, even when frozen. The compresses are hand washable and reusable, and are supplied with a soft fabric protective cover. A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or freezer, or warmed up in the microwave or by placing in hot water. Nexcare ColdHot Gel Compresses can provide effective relief from the pain of sports and soft tissue injuries, rheumatoid arthritis, inflammation, muscle tension, headaches, period pain, back pain and muscle stiffness or spasm. This compress measures 20cm x 30cm and is ideal for use on larger areas of the body such as the thighs, shoulders, back and abdomen. Simply cool or warm it as per the instructions in the box, slip it into the protective cover and hold it in place for as long as is comfortable. Please note that cold therapy should be applied for a maximum of 20 minutes, before removing the compress for another 20 minutes and then reapplying. If used for heat therapy, the compress will generally need re-warming after around 30 minutes. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product. A smaller sized (25.5cm x 10cm) Nexcare ColdHot Comfort Gel Compress is also available.

features.feature: A reusable large size gel compress that can be used hot or cold
A comforting alternative to medicine or pain-killers
Use cold to reduce inflammation or swelling. Use warm or hot to relieve aches and pains, or soothe muscular tension
Compress measures 20 x 30cm and comes with a soft fabric protective cover
Easy to apply position against the body for soothing relief, on the spot

A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or freezer, or warmed up in the microwave or by placing in hot water. Nexcare Cold Hot Gel Compresses can provide effective relief from the pain of sports and soft tissue injuries, rheumatoid arthritis, inflammation, muscle tension, headaches, period pain, back pain and muscle stiffness or spasm. This compress measures 26.5cm x 10cm and is the ideal size for ankles, knees, elbows and the face or head. Simply cool or warm it as per the instructions in the box, slip it into the protective cover and use the elasticated strap to secure it in place for as long as is comfortable. Please note that cold therapy should be applied for a maximum of 20 minutes, before removing the compress for another 20 minutes and then reapplying. product.title: Post-it® Super Sticky Die Cut Star 150 Sheets
product.product_body:
Post-it Super Sticky Notes stick around as long as you need them to. Perfect for vertical and hard-to-stick-to surfaces, they are super-strong, super-adhesive, super-versatile - and super-stand-out. With a range of sizes and bright colours they really get your messages noticed. These notes feature a strong but repositionable adhesive - they can cling to both smooth and rough surfaces and stick for longer on walls, doors, mirrors and fridges. The adhesive won't leave marks on your walls or pages, so you can stick them wherever they’ll be noticed to keep your family, colleagues … and yourself organised! This pack contains 2 pads of star-shaped Post-it Super Sticky Notes – 1 x yellow pad and 1 x orange pad. Each pad contains 75 sheets measuring 73mm x 71mm - the perfect size for a quick reminder! Do your kids forget their lunchboxes or sports kit every morning? Why not leave them a message on the inside of the front door so they see it before they leave the house? Will your husband remember to pick up his dry cleaning on the way home? Stick a note on his laptop or briefcase so he’s got no excuse! The star shape adds a bit of fun and will really catch their attention. For messages that really stick, get organised with Super Sticky Post-it Notes!
2 star-shaped pads of Post-it Notes, each containing 75 sheets

product.title: TRADITIONAL LINO PRINTING BLOCKS MOUNTED 3.2mm GREY 300x300x3.2mm (pack of 10)
product.product_body: The traditional craft of Lino cutting and printing is a popular and creative educational pastime for children and adults in schools and colleges and an enjoyable creative craft at home. Lino prints well onto most papers, card and fabric giving endless creative opportunities, the opportunity to develop new skills and an appreciation of traditional printing techniques. Students can be encouraged to make their own prints, scrapbook artefacts, greeting cards, party invitations, gift labels, posters or even great works of art! Our Lino, made especially soft for block printing, is ideal for the student and master alike. Made using natural materials such as linseed oil and wood flour, our Lino is even biodegradable. Supplied in popular sizes, this is the first choice for education, hobby and professional use, achieving rapid results without specialist material or equipment. Can be used with oil and water based inks and prints on a wide range of paper, board and fabric.

Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.

product.title: Standard Lino Roller 300mm
product.product_body: Our sturdy hard rubber roller is perfect for printmaking and a default choice for education and purchasing authorities worldwide. The rigid body and steel brackets give strength to the durable 70 shore EPDM rubber roller enabling heavy use, out-performing natural rubber. Suitable for use with both water based and oil based ink, and also resistant to solvents. The handle is manufactured from durable polypropylene with a hanging slot. The roller has self lubricating nylon bearings, EPDM rubber surface, aluminium core and a continuous steel shaft. It is designed so that wet rollers can be turned over with the handle doubling as a stand for cleaner working. These versatile rollers can be used for a variety of purposes other than block printing, including scrapbooking, laminating and even industrial processes like the application of window films and vehicle graphics.

features.feature: Easy-clean polypropylene handle
Hanging hole
Built in rest
Rigid frame
Nylon self-lubricating

product.product_body: A fast drying and long lasting lubricant spray from 3M. Contains no petroleum oils. Lubricates doors, hinges, drawers, windows and gardening equipment. Assists rubber mould release and can be used cutting tables and tools in industrial applications. Non-staining. See the Technical Data Sheet For 3M Silicone Lubricant Spray. IMPORTANT: We recommend that you test products prior to use to ensure suitability. 3M can accept no responsibility for accidents resulting from the misuse of 3M products so if you need any guidance regarding applications or product selection, please call the 3M Tapes & Adhesives helpdesk on 0870 6080050.
