product.title: Scotch Easy Clean Adhesive Removal Pen
product.product_body: Make adhesive residue or marker graffiti disappear with the stroke of a pen and without making a mess. In minutes, adhesive residues melt away with a swipe of a cloth or scraper. 3M's Scotch® Easy Clean Pen is photo safe and easy to use and control.

features.feature: Citrus based adhesive remover
Convenient pen size dispenser with precise felt tip applicator
Great for the removal of adhesive residue, labels, marker, crayon, grase and grime
Suitable for use on desks, lockers, dishes, walls, metal, leather and glass surfaces
Net weight 8.2grams (0.29oz)

product.title: 3MTM Citrus Cleaner Adhesive Remover Spray 500 ml, 12 Cans.
product.product_body: Adhesive Remover Spray - Eliminate Sticky Residue The strong citrus adhesive removal spray can be used to effectively remove grease, tar and adhesive residue. It is quick and easy to apply and perfect for use in the garage in bike, motorcycle, car and even boat maintenance. This spray can be used on projects large and small from cleaning concrete and printing presses to removing sticky residue left behind from sticky labels and tape. See Technical Data Sheet for 3M Citrus Cleaner Adhesive Remover Spray IMPORTANT: We recommend that you test products prior to use to ensure suitability. 3M can accept no responsibility for accidents resulting from the misuse of 3M products so if you need any guidance regarding applications or product selection, please call the 3M Tapes & Adhesives helpdesk.

features.feature: Super powerful adhesive remover spray cleaner can effectively remove grease, tar and adhesive residue
Aerosol spray can allows quick and easy application
Adhesive remover spray which can also be used to clean and degrease metal parts, motors, tools, printing presses and concrete
Pleasant citrus smell.
Clean annoying residue from sticky labels

product.title: 3M INDCLNRA Citrus Base Cleaner, 500 mL
product.product_body: Our 3M Citrus Base Cleaner helps soften and loosen grease, oil and grime. It is a citrus oil based cleaner that emulsifies when flushed with water and it contains no petroleum distillates. You can use this highly effective aerosol cleaner to clean and degrease metal parts, motors, tools, printing presses, concrete, or almost any dirty or greasy surface. After using this heavy-duty degreaser/cleaner, just wipe away with a shop towel. 3M Citris Base Cleaner also preps surfaces to help improve adhesive bonding. 3M aerosol chemicals contain no methylene chloride, chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs), or 1,1,1-trichloroethane (methyl chloroform). Not for sale or use in California. Consult local air quality rules before use. In thousands of factories and plants, 3M aerosol chemicals are used every day to save time and effort. Lubricating, cleaning, inhibiting rust, and other tough jobs become easy with the convenience and effectiveness of our formulated chemicals. Cleaners can also be used to prep surfaces and help improve adhesive bonding by removing dirt, grease and other contaminants, leaving a clean substrate. The compact cans fit in a tool box and readily go to any job site and help reduce storage space.

features.feature: Contains no chlorinated or petroleum based solvents
Cleans gently and leaves a pleasant citrus scent
Fresh citrus scent helps maintain a satisfactory work environment
Removes grease, oil, ink and most adhesives without harsh chemicals or hours of soaking
Can help prepare surfaces for adhesive bonding

product.title: REINIGUNGSKNETE 200G 3MPERFECT IT III
product.product_body: 3M Perfect-it TM III clay bar Application: modeling clay to remove contaminants on paint surfaces (eg, rust, tree resins, and insects). Content: 200 g Packaging unit: 6

product.title: 3M PERFECT IT III CLEANER CLAY 200g
product.product_body:
3M offers a wide range of paint rectification products designed to help bodyshops and amateur enthusiasts achieve the perfect finish quickly and efficiently. We know how important people's cars are to them and that they will do anything to keep them looking great, which is why we developed 3M Perfect-ItTM III Cleaner Clay.
A great solution for denibbing and other paint rectification applications, this detailing clay will safely remove paint overspray and other contaminants from vehicle surfaces, including chrome, glass and paint, without scratching or marring.
This product is moderately aggressive, which means that whilst it will not damage surfaces, it is strong enough to remove residues that have been imbedded in the paintwork. Vehicles are left smooth and ready for a more effective application of wax.

features.feature: Removes defects from paint such as tree sap, paint overspray and bonded contamination
Will not cause scratching or marring
Moderate aggression for removing contaminants bedded into paint
Leaves paint surface smooth for better waxing

product.title: Nexcare Elastic Pregnancy Belly/Bump Support
product.product_body: Nexcare Maternity Support is an adjustable support belt designed to afford the support you need during pregnancy, helping to spread the weight evenly and reduce pain experienced in the back and abdomen. The support lifts the abdomen to bring relief from increased weight and helps to reduce the severity of pain in the lower back as well as pelvic girdle pain. Improves postures due to stabilisation of the abdomen and back. With 8 out of 10 women complaining of backache during pregnancy it is a common problem that can be addressed with the Nexcare Maternity Support. Product comes with easy to follow instructions on the pack. Nexcare Products from 3M--the makers of 3M Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, Micropore First Aid Tape, Littmann Stethescopes and many other leading healthcare brands.

product.product_body:
Uniquely shaped Nexcare Aqua waterproof plasters are designed for a better seal around the wound, providing 360 degree protection. Based on a unique technology from 3M's healthcare division, the plasters are made from a very light, film-like material that provides tremendous waterproof properties and is less likely to be caught on objects due to its low profile. product.title: 3MTM NexcareTM Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, x 8 in each pack, 2 Packs.
product.product_body: When you have a deeper wound or cut to the skin, you need something more than a plaster to promote healing and protect against infection. NexcareTM Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures are highly effective for closing deeper wounds, such as cuts or surgery scars. These advanced Skin Closures will reduce bleeding and prevent cuts from re-opening, allowing the skin's natural healing process to take place more efficiently. Nexcare Steri-Strip Skin Closures are easy to apply and remove, and will provide immediate closure and protection for deeper wounds. They are low-allergy, meaning that they are highly tolerated by most people and have long-lasting staying power. The pack contains 5 strips of 3mm x 75 mm and 3 strips of 6 mm x 75 mm. Important: Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures are not an alternative to stitches. If the wound is deep and bleeding continuously, seek medical assistance immediately.

features.feature: Advanced protection for deeper cuts
Easy to apply and remove
Low allergy
Effective for closing deeper wounds and reducing scarring
Contains 5 x 3mm x 75mm and 3 x 6mm x 75mm sized strips in each pack

product.title: Command Forever Classic Small Metal Hook, Antique Bronze by 3M Command
Command Forever Classic Medium Metal Hook, Antique Bronze by 3M Command
Command Medium Antique Bronze Hooks with Strips (FC12-AB)
product.product_body: Give your bits and pieces a place to live with Command Antique Bronze Hooks. These decorative metal hooks can each hold up to 1kg in weight, making them the ideal organisational solution for your home or office. They can be applied to almost any flat, clean surface. When you want to rearrange, the hooks are easily and cleanly removed without damaging the surface underneath – no cracks, holes, damaged plaster, sticky residue or stains. Want to use a hook again? Just reattach it using a new Command Adhesive Strip – each pack includes a spare, and refill packs are available. These antique-effect hooks will complement classic home décor perfectly. The medium-sized version is ideal for hanging coats, towels and bathrobes. Many Command fans tell us that they use this type of hook to display their Christmas wreath on the front door, as the antique finish matches the rest of their door furniture. Once January rolls around, it’s easy to take down the hook without damaging the paintwork underneath, and the hook can be used year after year with replacement adhesive strips. Command products are perfect in rented accommodation where you can’t put screws in the walls or are worried about marks and stains. They hold strongly on a whole range of surfaces including paint, wood, metal and tiles, but aren’t suitable for use on wallpapered surfaces or for hanging antiques or other valuable or irreplaceable items. When you want to take one down, grasp the hook and slide it upwards to remove it from the mounting base. The hook and mounting base can be re-used with a new adhesive strip. To remove the Command Adhesive Strip from the wall, hold the plastic base gently and pull the tab straight down, slowly stretching it until the strip releases from the wall. All of these instructions are detailed on the back of the pack. Command is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: 3M 1410r Vetrap Bandaging Tape, 10 cm x 4.5 m, Box of 18 Rolls, Red
product.product_body:
3M Vetrap bandaging tape is the original cohesive wrap for equine and small animals, providing a great combination of softness, strength and conformability. Vetrap tape adheres to itself without adhesive so no additional fasteners are necessary. It conforms snugly around contours that are most difficult to bandage and accommodates movement without loosening. Preferred by veterinary professionals; it allows skin to breathe through its cool, lightweight, porous material and absorbs virtually no moisture. Use it as a hoof wrap, for rundown protection or dressing secural, to support sprains and fractures and as a tail wrap. Available in a wide choice of colours Vetrap is a must for the first aid kit. For support and protection, stick with Vetrap tape.
Vetrap bandaging tape x 18

features.feature: The original cohesive wrap
Sticks to itself, not to hair or skin
Soft and conformable for a better fit
Protects horse's legs from rundown
Protects wounds and holds sterile dressings in place

product.title: 3MTM ScotchgardTM Resilient Floor Protector - 3.8Ltr Pouch/Pouches (1)
product.product_body: Make stripping a thing of the past with the new 3MTM ScotchgardTM Resilient Floor Protector, with its easy application system it provides a quick and simple method for protecting your vinyl floor. Scotchgard Resilient Floor Protector is not a floor finish, it's a proprietary, non yellowing, low odour hybrid formulation that protects and enhances your floors natural appearance. Just two coats produce a clean, bright appearance that's up to twice more resistant to abrasion than traditional floor finishes. Recommended for use with the 3MTM Easy Shine Applicator Kit; suitable for Vinyl Tile and Sheet flooring. - No more stripping - easy and fast to apply - Tough long-lasting protection - Just 2 coats for initial application; 1 coat for future applications - Hardens 40% faster, also reducing the risk of early damage - Low odour - Twice as resistant to abrasion than traditional floor finishes*

product.title: 3M Protective Eyewear 1880
product.product_body: Can easily be worn over prescription glasses. Exposure to blood, body fluids, flying debris and contaminated materials could impair your vision during surgical procedures and damage your eyes.The adjustable anatomical design of the 3MTM Eyewear incorporates clear panoramic lenses to provide freedom of vision. Combined with the ability to wear them over prescription glasses and their lightweight construction, you can be confident that you are comfortably protected. Health care environments where safety glasses may be required include: * Operating rooms * Casting rooms * Labour and delivery rooms * Emergency rooms * Intensive Care Units * (Central) Sterilisation departments (CSSD) * Laboratories and microbiological processing * Mortuary 3MTM Protective Eyewear 1880 is easy to clean for reuse; wash them under running water with detergent and dry with a soft cloth. They can also be disinfected in accordance with infection control protocols. IMPORTANT- 3MTM Protective Eyewear 1880 WILL NOT PROTECT against nuclear radiation, X-rays, laser beams and low temperature infra-red (IR) radiation emitted by low temperature sources. 3MTM Eyewear 1880 is CE marked and fulfils the requirements of Annex II of the Directive.

product.title: Lino Cutter No 10 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 10 Cutter. Same as number nine but with a wider "vee" shape and a more rounded base to produce lines up to 3.5mm wide. As a number nine cutter, a very easy action.

features.feature: Wider "vee" shape and a more rounded base to produce lines up to 3.5mm wide
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 9 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 9 Cutter. A deep "vee" cutter for narrow lines gives good results in lino but care needed not to go too deep, has a very easy action in tougher materials.

features.feature: A deep "vee" cutter for narrow lines
Very easy action in tougher materials
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 8 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 8 Cutter. A wide and deep cutter able to cut up to 6mm wide. Care is needed not to go too deep but a favourite tool of the experienced lino cutter for bold pieces of work.

features.feature: A wide and deep cutter able to cut up to 6mm wide
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 7 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 7 Cutter. A flat bottomed wide cutter with safety edges each side. Use the unground sides to prevent shaving the edge of a previously cut line and to remove a 3mm (0.120") wide flat trough or tidy up unwanted cut lines in the design background.

features.feature: A flat bottomed wide cutter with safety edges each side
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 6 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 6 Cutter. A flat radius cutter for shallow, wide cuts or for shaving at a side wall to reduce the printed area and leave a strong shallow angle. A clever trick is to use this cutter vertically spun between the fingers to cut a 4mm circle in SoftCutTM (or less with practice) which is useful for the centre of eyes, with either the centre part left to print or the centre removed.

features.feature: A flat radius cutter for shallow, wide cuts
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 5 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 5 Cutter. A thin line marking tool for making the first lines to define the design before using other cutters to remove the unwanted background. It can be pushed or dragged across the surface and turned very easily to describe curves and wavy lines. Cut deep into the lino or SoftCutTM to define the limit of material removal particularly useful with SoftCutTM as the material can cling at the end of a cut.

features.feature: A thin line marking tool for making the first lines to define the design before using other cutters
Can be pushed or dragged across the surface and turned very easily to describe curves and wavy lines

product.title: Lino Cutter No 4 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 4 Cutter. A wide, rounded bottom "vee" cutter for lines 3mm wide with 45˚ walls for strength of print surface particularly important for fragile detail and unsupported straight lines such as a narrow tree branch with large open spaces each side in lino. A fast remover of material.

product.title: Lino Cutter No 3 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 3 Cutter. A tight, round cutter able to cut a 2mm deep sided line where needed. Great in straight lines, but more difficult to turn. Great in SoftCutTM but cut too deep in lino and the upright walls of the cut can leave little support and weaken the top surface. With practice, it's useful for cutting small circles by using a swivel motion.

Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 1 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 1 Cutter For fine lines and cross hatching. Use at a steep angle and push forward with light pressure being sure not to go deep. Never try to plunge any cutter deeper than the ground sides of the point. With practice, a line of 0.5mm (0.020") or less is possible in SoftCutTM material and a little wider in Lino. Care is needed when inking up over lines this fine as it is easy to push the ink into shallow lines with a soft brayer (lino roller).

features.feature: No. 1 Cutter For fine lines and cross hatching
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab3 Kids 7-inch Tablet
product.product_body: With a bright, easy-to-use interface and kid-friendly app store, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids is the ideal tablet for your kids' digital playing and learning time. Preloaded with top-ranked apps for kids, the lightweight Galaxy Tab 3 Kids also features a built-in camera and parental controls for access and time limits. It transforms from kid to standard mode so you can enjoy the same familiar features as a regular Galaxy Tab 3. The Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids features a kid-centric interface with bright colours and animated characters to make playing and learning more fun for your little one. Each app appears as a card that your child can select by simply tapping. Kids can personalise their play by adding their name, choosing a character to guide them, and changing the background. The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids has a brilliant 7-inch display, with HD 1024x600 resolution, so text is clearer and colours are brighter. The powerful 1.2 GHz dual-core processor makes it ideal for downloading apps and games, and watching your favorite movies. Samsung's Kids' Store is filled with top apps for learning and playing. The kid-friendly apps are organised by category, so your kids can browse apps based on their preferences. Instead of buying, kids add each app to a wish list that can be accessed through parental controls, letting you choose which ones to purchase. Not only will you have full control over what apps your kids buy and explore, you can also choose your own Google Play apps to add to the Kids Mode by simply checking off those apps in Application Manager. Add Skype if you want to let them video chat with Grandma, or add video apps like Netflix. The built-in camera is specially designed for kids to take pictures and shoot videos. They can use the 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera for silly faces, or flip it around to capture their surroundings with the 3-megapixel rear camera. Virtual stickers let them play pretend and dress up their pictures with different features and accessories. Kids Gallery and Kids Video store all their photos and videos so they can revisit their favorite shots. Parental control mode lets you access their work in your gallery and share with other relatives. The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids includes features just for parents, so you can hand over the tablet with peace of mind. A secure password entry gives you access to parental controls that let you set time restrictions on their usage, control what they view, and choose which apps you want to purchase. The lightweight, 7-inch design makes the Galaxy Tab 3 Kids ideal for little hands. It weighs less than 1lb, so it's easy for little ones to hold in their car seat or for you to carry in your purse or nappy bag. The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids allows you to easily switch from Kids Mode to standard mode, giving you access to the same interface and features of the regular Galaxy Tab 3. Both modes can coexist, so you can switch back and forth without losing content. This makes it easy for parents to stream videos and music, read e-books, or browse up to 750,000 apps from Google Play before switching back to Kids Mode. This tablet comes installed with Android 4.1.2, Jelly Bean, contains a 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, and has a 7-inch display with 1024x600 resolution, a 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera, and a 3-megapixel rear-facing camera. It also comes with 8GB of internal memory and features a microSD card slot (microSD card sold separately) that allows you to add up to 32GB of additional memory. The tablet measures 7.4 by 4.37 by 0.39 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.67lbs including the battery. Galaxy Tablet

product.title: CNC Cut Lettering On Locators, 5mm Cast Acrylic, All of EU Origin (1200mm)
product.product_body: Your one stop shop for all your cnc cut lettering and logo's. You contact us and tell us your requirements, text, font, colour etc, we send you scale designs for approval and make any changes, we advise you what you need to order to get what you require, you order it, we cut it, pack it and send it, you install it using our fitting templates and instructions! All lettering has locator studs on rear, we supply the cups to suit, you tape drawing into place, drill and fix cups, then push the studs on rear of letetrs into cups, done job.

features.feature: Cast acrylic lettering. Complete with locator studs bonded to rear and fixing cups to suit.
Includes paper fitting template. Choice of 1000's of fonts, this can be liased before ordering/production. Choice of 50+ colours, this can be liased before ordering/production.

All lettering has locator studs on rear, we supply the cups to suit, you tape drawing into place, drill and fix cups, then push the studs on rear of letetrs into cups, done job.

features.feature: Cast acrylic lettering. Complete with locator studs bonded to rear and fixing cups to suit.

product.title: Ink Tray 240 x 200mm
product.product_body: New rigid polypropylene easy-clean tray is 243mm x 202mm and a useful 16mm deep. Complete with Euro hanger for planogram merchandising or convenient storage at home, this tray is for use with roller sizes up to 200mm. Ideal for mixing paint, PVA and other water based materials, its slightly angled walls make it useful for all types of crafts that have 'runaway' items such as bead-making.

product.title: Brand New Scotch ATG700 Adhesive Applicator-For .5" & .75" Tape
product.product_body: 3M-Scotch ATG 700 Adhesive Applicator. It applies a thin strong adhesive that bonds instantly. The adhesive goes on easily while removing and rewinding the liner. Perfect for: multi-opening mats; small wooden frames and much more! Features: covered gears to minimize applicator jams; transparent cover that shows remaining tape; and it holds up to 60 yards of Scotch Adhesive Transfer tape (not included). This package contains one Adhesive Applicator (9x 8-1/2x1-1/2in) and instructions for use. This applicator uses 1/2in or 3/4in wide ATG transfer tape only. Imported.

product.title: Safety Hand Guard
product.product_body: This device is an essential safety measure in multi student environments. The natural instinct is to drive a cutting gouge towards the restraining hand holding the work piece, so we have created a guard that covers the smallest to the more dexterous larger hand, in one item. The guard is held either at the corner of the relief block or on top of the carving material close to the area to be cut. Any slippage is caught in the upright walls of the guard protecting the user from harm. An ergonomic, left or right handed, one piece moulding at a price that makes its inclusion in your tool box and school room a must.

features.feature: Essential safety measure
Left or right handed

product.title: Lino Cutting & Printing Kit
product.product_body: This comprehensive kit includes a wide selection of tools and materials for Lino cutting and printing. You can experiment with artisan printing techniques and compare traditional lino and the new SoftCutTM materials, which add new possibilities for beginners and experienced users alike. The 6 different lino cutters allow varied carving styles, whilst the safety cutter and hand guard ensure safe working for younger or less experienced users. The 3-in-1 Baren is a tool for transfering ink from your lino block to paper, but can also be used as a desk tidy for your cutters and as a stamping tool when used with the included self-adhesive SoftCutTM discs. You can make many prints with the water based ink whilst keeping your work space clean with the handy ink tray. This educational and fun kit is ideal for making unique greeting cards, gifts, posters or even great works of art! Recommended age: 12 and upwards with adult supervision. Contents: 5 x Lino Cutters, Styles 1 to 5 1 x Safety Lino Cutter, Style A 1 x Lino Cutter Handle 1 x Aluminium Ferrule 2 x Linoleum Blocks 7" x 5" / 178 x 127mm 2 x SoftCutTM Blocks 6" x 4" / 150 x 100mm 1 x Practice Piece 1 x Ink Roller (Brayer) 4"/100mm 1 x Ink Tray 9.4" x 7.87" / 240 x 200mm 1 x Safety Hand Guard 1 x Baren Cap 1 x Baren Base 1 x 100ml / 3.3 US fl oz Tube of water based ink 2 x 45mm SoftCutTM Printing Stamps. 1 x Instructions

features.feature: Comprehensive kit includes a wide selection of tools and materials for Lino cutting and printing
6 different lino cutters allow varied carving styles
Safety cutter and hand guard ensure safe working for younger or less
Educational and fun kit is ideal for making unique greeting cards, gifts, posters or even great works of art!
Recommended age: 12 and upwards with adult supervision.

product.title: 3 in 1 Lino cutter & stamp carving kit (10 Cutters & 5 Stamps)
product.product_body: This innovative and versatile stamp carving kit allows you to carve your own SoftCutTM Printing Stamps using Lino cutting tools and techniques for a unique result. Simply pop one of the included printing stamps into the included disc holder, and use the lino cutters and handle to carve your design. The disc holder allows safe and easy manipulation of the printing stamp. Once finished, assemble the Baren by combining the base, lid and handle together. Peel back the protective paper from the printing stamp and apply to the base of the Baren. Ink can be applied using a roller, or by utilising a traditional ink pad. The base of the Baren also doubles as a storage unit for the cutters keeping them safe after use. 10 different cutters and 5 printing stamps.

features.feature: New kit for making your own stamps by carving discs of softcut lino
Carve your design into the discs of softcut material
Great for making Cards, Gifts and all kinds of artwork

product.title: 3M SandBlaster Sandpaper Abrasive Sheets Assorted P60, P100 &P180 Pk 3
product.product_body:
When you have sanding and prep work to do, 3M offers a wide range of high performance sandpapers, flexible abrasives, sanding sponges and tools. Select the best sanding tool for the task and you will have less work on your hands, with supreme results. SandBlasterTM Sandpaper is coated with mineral and features an advanced, durable backing material that resists tearing, for a satisfying day's work.
3M SandBlasterTM Sandpaper can be used on a wide range of surfaces including paint, wood, metal, plastic, filler and fibreglass. This evenly coated sandpaper resists clogging and tearing - when dust builds up, simply knock it off the abrasive surface and carry on! These sheets of sandpaper can be used by hand, or with sanding blocks or machine sanders. When compared to conventional alternatives of comparable grits, SandBlaster Sandpaper cuts up to three times faster, stays sharp and delivers a smoother, long-lasting finish.
This pack contains 3 different grades of SandBlaster Sandpaper, each cut into a long-lasting sheet which measures 230 mm x 280 mm. The coarse grit P60 sheet is perfect for paint-stripping; the medium grit P100 sheet is your go-to for levelling bare surfaces; and the fine grit P180 sheet is ideal for a smooth finish or between coats of paint or varnish. To make hand sanding easier, why not try the 3M Rubber Sanding Block? Simply attach a piece of SandBlaster Sandpaper to the heavyweight block for an improved grip, extra power and better sanding control.
Material: Aluminium Oxide. It is recommended that a suitable respirator and safety goggles/glasses are worn during sanding. Sanding lead based paints can be hazardous.
SandBlaster Sandpaper: Less work. Cuts fast. Lasts long.

features.feature: SandBlaster sandpaper for high performance sanding on any surface
Cuts up to 3 times faster, lasts up to 3 times longer
For hand sanding or use with sanding blocks or machine sanders. Resists clogging.
1 pack of 3 sheets 230 mm x 280 mm (1 x coarse grit p60 , 1 x medium grit p100, 1 x fine grit p180)

product.title: 3M Sandblaster 60-080 High-Performance Sandpaper P80/Coarse for Paint Removal 230 x 280 mm Pack of 3
product.product_body:
When you have sanding and prep work to do, 3M offers a wide range of high performance sandpapers, flexible abrasives, sanding sponges and tools. Select the best sanding tool for the task and you will have less work on your hands, with supreme results. SandBlasterTM Sandpaper is coated with mineral and features an advanced, durable backing material that resists tearing, for a satisfying day's work.
SandBlasterTM Sandpaper Coarse Grit is a heavy duty sandpaper for stripping surfaces including paint, wood, metal, plastic and fibreglass. It can also be used for removing ingrained marks and blemishes from wood and metal. This evenly coated sandpaper resists clogging and tearing - when dust builds up, simply knock it off the abrasive surface and carry on! These sheets of sandpaper can be used by hand, or with sanding blocks or orbital sanders. When compared to conventional alternatives of comparable grits, SandBlaster Sandpaper cuts up to three times faster, stays sharp and delivers a smoother, long-lasting finish.
This pack contains 3 sheets of SandBlaster Sandpaper P80 Coarse Grit, each of which measures 230 mm x 280 mm. Designed for sanding flat areas such as table tops or walls, the sheets are ideal for hand sanding or can be easily cut into smaller pieces for use with an electrical sander. To make hand sanding easier, why not try the 3M Rubber Sanding Block? Simply attach a piece of SandBlaster Sandpaper to the heavyweight block for an improved grip, extra power and better sanding control.
Material: Aluminium Oxide. It is recommended that a suitable respirator and safety goggles/glasses are worn during sanding. Sanding lead based paints can be hazardous.
SandBlaster Sandpaper: Less work. Cuts fast. Lasts long.

product.title: 3M Scotch 2328 Automotive Masking Tape 24mm x 50m
product.product_body: Excellent surface adhesion minimises the chances of the tape peeling off during the job. Clean tape 'lift off' - leaves no residue behind. Edge of tape has high tear resistance to minimise the chances of ripping during the job and paint bleed through. Includes 1 roll of masking tape. From 3M, inventors of the first masking tapes and global leaders in the automotive bodyshop market. Ideal for masking a car prior to paint spraying. Has excellent adhesion and will remove cleanly and easily from the surface. Available in varying widths.

features.feature: Specifically designed for automotive body shop use
100% safe on ALL paints
Will not lift
Leaves no residue
Best quality masking tape on the market

product.title: 2x Rolls 3m 2328 Car Trim Protection Masking Tape 48mm x 50m
product.product_body:
This is the detailers and spray painters tape of choice, a superior and high performance tape. The best available tape for critical line initial masking. Will not lift despite repeated baking, and leaves no residue on paint, glass, plastics or rubber. Equally effective on solvent or water-based paint systems - for which it's rubber-derived adhesive was specifically developed for exceptional water resistance.
2x Rolls, Roll size: 50m x 48mm
Features:
*Excellent surface adhesion minimises the chances of the tape peeling off during the job.
*Clean tape 'lift off' - leaves no residue behind.
*Edge of tape has high tear resistance to minimise the chances of ripping during the job and paint bleed through.
*From 3M, inventors of the first masking tapes and global leaders in the automotive bodyshop market.

product.title: 3MTM ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape 904 1 Roll (6mm x 25m)
product.product_body: If you're keen on craft and card-making and like to work mess-free, you'll love our range of adhesive tapes. For use with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, they make for cleaner, more accurate crafting. Simply insert your chosen tape into the ATG Gun, press the trigger and away you go. Our general purpose Adhesive Transfer Tape is perfect for bonding to paper and card. It creates thinner bond lines with a uniform thickness, giving you a more professional finish. Whether you're sticking paper, card, tissue, cloth, glitter or sequins, this tape works for so many hobby and craft needs! Ideal for detailed embellishments on cards, invitations and other stationery, it also makes adding inserts quicker and more efficient, without the seeping or wrinkling you can get with traditional glue. Strong and durable, it holds even heavy card and lasts well - great when you're making keepsakes and gifts that people want to treasure or frame. Say goodbye to fiddly double-sided tape - when used with the Scotch ATG Adhesive Tape Applicator Gun, the liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

product.title: 3MTM ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape 969 19 mm x 33 m 1 Roll
product.product_body:
If you're keen on craft and textile design and like to work mess-free, you'll love our range of adhesive tapes. For use with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, they make for cleaner, more accurate projects. Simply insert your chosen tape into the Applicator Gun, press the trigger and away you go.
Our Adhesive Transfer Tape for plastics, rubbers, leather and textiles is a more heavy-duty adhesive suitable for bonding and mounting fabrics, plastics and more weighty textiles. When used with the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, the 19 mm adhesive tape creates thin, uniform bond lines for clean, accurate sticking that holds securely.
Whether you're creating a wall collage for a school project, or ditching the sewing machine and customising your fabrics the easy way, using the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun makes things so much simpler. The adhesive comes out in neat, clean lines with no seeping or wrinkling, and none of the safety issues of a hot glue gun.
Strong and durable, it holds well even on heavier textiles, so there's no worrying about your creation falling apart or fabric peeling off when it dries. Even better, when using the ATG Gun, there's no fiddling around with backing tape as the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

features.feature: Great for craft, card-making, projects and textile design
Adheres plastic, rubber and leather
Quick and mess-free application
For use with Scotch® ATG - adhesive transfer tape applicator gun

Strong and durable, it holds well and you can be assured it will last - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out and make your photos slip from the page. Even better, when using the ATG Gun, there's no fiddling around, as the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

product.title: Scotch® ATG Applicator Gun Adaptor for 6 mm (1/4") width ATG tape
product.product_body: Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun. So simple to use, it features a finger trigger that allows you to release a straight, controlled application of adhesive tape while automatically removing the backing liner, so no fiddling afterwards. For more accurate creations using thinner, 6 mm width Adhesive Transfer Tape, you'll need to affix this ATG Applicator Gun Adaptor. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, it's time to show off your creative flair. And when it's detailed crafting that requires thinner adhesive tape, all you need to do is slot this adaptor into your ATG gun, choose your 6 mm wide tape and away you go. Popular with craft bloggers and professional stationery makers, the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun and Adaptor make intricate and delicate designs less fiddly, for quicker, cleaner and more satisfying projects. ATG Applicator Gun and Adhesive Tape NOT included.

product.product_body: ATG Tape Refills - Home Crafts Made Easy Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider and Refill Rolls. These rolls fit easily into the glider to allow for a quick, controlled application of adhesive in neat, thin lines, giving you a mess-free, professional finish. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, our General Purpose Tape covers all your crafting needs. Using the Advanced Tape Glider makes your projects quicker, cleaner and more satisfying. Rather than traditional glue, which can seep and wrinkle, the tape leaves flat, neat lines. The adhesive liner is removed as you stick, too, saving your time and patience! Strong and durable, our General Purpose Tape is great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out, yellow or peel and can be used on all sorts of textiles - an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox. For use with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider, sold separately.

product.title: ALUMINIUM CRAFT ROLLER (50mm)
product.product_body: With its hard polished surface, these Bright Surface Aluminium rollers are used to roll out many hobby or difficult materials, including silicon rubber, air hardening clays and simple Plasticine, leaving the other hand free to control the varying processes. Designed for high levels of applied pressure, this clean roller is more universal in use and more resistant to chemical attack than acrylic plastic.

Bright Surface Aluminium rollers are used to roll out many hobby or difficult materials

product.title: SOFT RUBBER LINO INK ROLLER (50mm)
product.product_body: A soft compound EPDM at 40 shore. Resistant to printers chemicals and not ffected by exposure to daylight, this is a long life product. This brayer is designed to give a more compliant coverage than hard rubber material. More forgiving on uneven surfaces , proving to be a favourite with certain printing methods but needing extra care in storage to prevent indentation to its soft surface. Especially developed for relief printing. These high quality rollers, with their distinctive blue handles, have a higher ink capacity. They are made to the same exacting standards as our standard rollers, but have a soft, 40 shore rubber surface for the easy, smooth and fine application of ink. Manufactured from durable polypropylene with self lubricating nylon bearings, robust constuction, EPDM rubber, hanging slot, aluminium core and a continuous steel shaft. These versatile rollers can be used for a variety of purposes other than lino-printing.

features.feature: Made in the United Kingdom!
Double handles on sizes 7 & 8
Easy-clean polypropylene handle
Hanging hole. Built in rest. Rigid frame.
Nylon self-lubricating bearings.

product.title: DELUXE INK ROLLER/BRAYER 300mm
product.product_body: These high quality deluxe rollers, with their distinctive black handles, have a higher ink capacity. They are made to the same exacting standards as our standard rollers, but have a full-ground, concentric rolling surface for the smooth and fine application of ink. Manufactured from durable polypropylene with self lubricating nylon bearings, robust constuction, EPDM rubber, hanging slot, aluminium core and a continuous steel shaft. These versatile rollers can be used for a variety of purposes other than lino-printing. With a hand-ground surface of over 122mm (4.5"), this perfectly smooth heavy-weight roller holds a greater quantity of ink than our standard range allowing greater coverage and perfect results every time. A hand-ground concentric EPDM rubber surface is a medium hard 60 shore and gives excellent pickup and deposit of all types of ink. This tool is the choice for the artisan printmaker with good recovery to indentation, and resistance to common printing chemicals. Perfect for printmaking, applying self adhesive film/vinyl, wood engraving and woodcut.

features.feature: Made in the United Kingdom!
Double handles on sizes 7 & 8

Nylon self-lubricating bearings.

product.product_body:
Avery Dennison® MPI 2000 Opaque Series are white polymeric self-adhesive vinyl films, recommended for a wide range of applications on flat and slightly curved substrates.
These films are suitable for use on a variety of super wide format inkjet printers using solvent, eco/mild solvent, UV-curing, and latex inks. - See more at: http://graphics.averydennison.eu/en/home/products/digital-imaging-media/polymeric-calendered/mpi-2000-series/mpi-2000-opaque-series.html#sthash.VAfFUyUY.dpuf

Excellent durability and outdoor performance. 80 micron glossy white polymeric vinyl

product.title: Bellelli B-Travel Bike Trailer With Urban Stroller Kit, Current Version
product.product_body:
IMPROVEMENTS IN THE NEW B-TAXI VERSION
Wheels have been moved back. The wheels are now better vertically lined up with the children's baricenter, thus improving the weights distribution and reducing the weight burdening on the bike. This change brings many positive effects, such as a better handiness and a higher stability during the braking and the movement in curve.
The safety belts have been attached to the frame- before they were sewn on the sitting/back textile . This evolution considerably increases the safety of the system which is directly attached to the plastic base and to the steel arch holding the cover.
Parking brake We have introduced a brake that can easily be operated on by foot. The baby trailer is much more stable and safe both when parked and when babies accede and get off.
Closing system modified. We have introduced a second safety mechanism on both sides of the baby trailer, reducing the risk of possible wrong operations of parents.
Homologation The baby trailer will soon get the certification according the most recent European norm EN15918. It will be one of the first baby trailers on the market being certified according to this norm.
Cover The accessibility has been improved thanks to the new textile, more airy and bright. Back case We have added a piece of textile to better cover the case and protect it from bad weather.
Stroller function The baby trailer can be also used as stroller: we have developed a kit (included) composed by a front wheel (with locking and unlocking system very easy, simple and fast) and a handle, to allow the easily shift to this other function.

features.feature: Exclusive, patented plastic base, protects against rocks and mud, exclusively patented by bellelli.
5 point harness, for 1 or 2 children. Wide openings on front and roof
Mult-layer canopy: retractable sunshade, protective mesh and transparent weather cover
20'' wheels with quick release system. Easy to use parking brake Large rear pocket.
Quickly and easily foldable Urban Stroller conversion kit, with 12'' swivelling wheel and handle.

product.product_body: 3M Scotch 35 Tape is a superb quality colour coding tape with excellent electrical insulating properties. The tape functions specifically well at colder temperatures and with its elasticated memory properties it dramatically outperforms cheaper alternatives. Scotch 35 vinyl electrical colour coding tape is used in phase identification, colour coding leads and piping systems and for marking safety areas. This tape is abrasion and weather-resistant, with excellent mechanical and electrical insulation properties that wraps smoothly and holds tight over a wide range of temperatures. This insulating tape has a 6 mil thickness.

product.title: 3M Remote Control for MP410 Projector
product.product_body:
The 3M™ Remote Control for MP410 (Model: RC410) allows you to control most functions of the projector, including file list navigation and video playback. Operating remotely keeps people focused on the presentation and not your projector. Complete and confident wireless control from anywhere in the room. Available for the 3M™ Mobile Projector MP410 only.
3M™ Remote Control for MP410 (Model: RC410) w/battery installed Instruction Manual

product.title: 3M MP160 Pocket Projector
product.product_body: Share your favourite movies, make business presentations, or project photo slideshows virtually anywhere with the 3M PocketProjector MP160. Ideal for mobile professionals and proud parents alike, this palm-sized, versatile projector lets you display crisp images of up to 80 inches from the digital content on your laptop, digital camera, DVD player, smartphone, gaming console, and more. Two hours of battery life and a consistent light output ensure dependable, professional projections and presentations every time. With the PocketProjector MP160, you won't have to gather around a small phone screen or a difficult-to-read laptop in order to share your digital content. And you can keep your cumbersome office projector back at the office where it belongs. Weighing a mere 300 grams and measuring a compact 150x65x30.5 mm (L x W x H), this versatile projector can be carried comfortably in a bag or pocket and fits in the palm of your hand. It connects to a wide range of devices via the included VGA and composite video cables for native high-resolution projections of up to 800 by 600 pixels. The MP160 can also support SVGA, XGA and WXGA resolution in a 4:3 aspect ratio. The MP160 allows you to instantly project your media content with plug and play simplicity. The MP160 is not only ideal for business presentations, but it is also handy for family gatherings or movies with friends. All you need is a flat surface to project videos, photo slideshows, web sites, and more from your smartphone, laptop, digital camera, DVD player, or other digital device. The MP160 arrives with VGA and composite video cables to ensure you can quickly begin sharing your media. The MP160 can also be connected to Apple products via an adapter cable (sold separately). Boasting twice the lumens of its predecessor, the MP160's display remains consistently bright--even when you're running the device on its lithium-ion polymer battery. A full two hours of battery life increases the projector's versatility, and even when those batteries are getting low you can always rely on the MP160 to maintain the same level of brightness. The MP160 comes equipped with two built-in 3/4-watt speakers that produce robust sound for enjoying music, movies, and videos. It also features audio out, so you can take advantage of headphones or additional speakers via a generic 3.5mm audio jack. The device's intuitive buttons couldn't be easier to operate, a simple on/off function, volume controls with mute option, and a battery life indicator. The MP160 also features a flip stand intuitively built in to the base of the unit, offering a stable height adjustment, while the universal 6.35mm tripod socket allows the user to manipulate height with the 3M tripod supplied, or utilise compatible tripods and security locks. The MP160 is compatible with DVD players, digital camcorders, digital cameras, gaming consoles, laptops, tablets, PCs, smartphones and portable media players. Based on smartphone capability, the MP160 can make the small screen of your phone large and easy to show to groups. Be sure to test with your phones, as some manufacturers block content out of phones, while older devices (such as previous generations of BlackBerry) do not have a video- or TV-out and can therefore not be connected to the MP160. The 3M PocketProjector MP160 is backed by a one-year limited warranty. MP160 Projector, Lithium-Ion Polymer Battery, Mains Charger with AC Adapter (UK, US, EU, AUS), VGA Cable, Composite Video Cable, 3 x RCA Female to Female Adapters, Tripod, Soft Carry Pouch, Quick Start Guide, Product Safety Guide.

product.title: Scotch 19mm x 7.5m Dog Dispenser with 1 Roll of Scotch Magic Tape
product.product_body:
Personalise your workspace and be the centre of attention with this fun-design tape dispenser in the shape of a cute little dog! A great gift for children over 5 years of age, students, colleagues and friends, this handy desktop essential will make life a whole lot easier when it comes to finding and using their Scotch Magic Tape and will create lots of amusement too! Scotch Magic Tape dispensers keep your tape within easy reach - great when you're wrapping presents, sealing envelopes or mending documents and books. This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape measuring 19mm wide by 7.5m long - when it runs out, it's quick and easy to refill with a roll of Scotch Magic Tape up to 33 metres long. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matt surface which can be written on in pen or pencil; it won't yellow with age and it won't ghost on photocopies. Value packs containing multiple rolls are also available, so you'll always have a supply for your Scotch Tape Dispenser! Scotch and Magic are trademarks of 3M Company.

product.title: Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape 908 - Acid-Free 12 mm x 55 m
product.product_body:
If you're keen on craft and scrapbooking and like to work mess-free, you'll love our range of adhesive tapes. For use with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, they make for cleaner, more accurate crafting. Simply insert your chosen tape into the ATG Gun, press the trigger and away you go.
Our Acid-Free Adhesive Transfer Tape is just what you need if you're mounting photographs onto card or updating scrapbooks or albums. This tape has been designed so that you don't have to worry about damaging your precious snapshots, as it leaves no discoloration and won't cause fading. The adhesive tape creates thin bond lines with a uniform thickness, for clean, accurate sticking. This tape size offers a slightly wider adhesive line compared to the 12 mm x 55 mm roll.
Whether you're attaching your photographs to paper, card or albums, using the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun makes things so much quicker and neater, and the tape doesn't create the seeping or wrinkling that you can get with traditional glue.
Strong and durable, it holds well and you can be assured it will last - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out and make your photos slip from the page. Even better, when using the ATG Gun, there's no fiddling around, as the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

features.feature: Ideal for photo-mounting, scrapbooking and card-making
Acid-free tape prevents fading of photographs
Quick and mess-free application
For use with ScotchÂ® ATG adhesive transfer tape applicator gun
Compatible With ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun

product.title: 3M Scotch Pink Advanced Tape Glider & Tape-.25"X36 Yards 2/Pkg
product.product_body: The Scotch® Pink ATG - The Photo Safe Sticky Tape Glider Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider Kit. The finger trigger allows for a quick, controlled application of adhesive in neat, thin lines, while the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience! With this handy kit, you get two rolls of photo-safe acid-free tape too, which gives giving you everything you need for mess-free, professional-finish crafting. You'll love how the Advanced Tape Glider cuts out the mess and lets you show off your creative side. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, this clever kit will make your projects quicker, cleaner and more satisfying. Rather than traditional glue, which can seep through paper and cause wrinkling, the tape leaves flat, neat lines that stick to all sorts of crafting surfaces. Our Acid-Free Adhesive Transfer Tape is perfect for mounting photographs onto card or updating scrapbooks or albums. It won't discolour or damage your photos and it's strong and durable - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out and make your photos slip from the page. Popular with craft bloggers and professional stationery makers, this kit is an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox. For use only with 6 mm rolls of tape.

features.feature: Ideal for scrapbooking, card-making, photo albums and stationery
Accurate hand dispenser for Scotch® ATG adhesive transfer tapes
Safe, quick and easy to use with no messy clean-up Creates thin, neat adhesive lines
1 Scotch advanced tape glider in pink and 2 rolls of acid-free tape per pack

product.title: 3M Tyre Restorer
product.product_body:
Tyres are a tell-tale sign of the age and condition of your car. If they look dull and grey, the appearance of your entire vehicle suffers. 3MTM Tyre Restorer will instantly take miles off your tyres by restoring them to their natural, deep black colour.
There's no better way to finish off your car cleaning regime than with 3M Tyre Restorer. Its mess-free formula is quick and easy to use, giving tyres a long-lasting, natural shine without slinging. With touch-ups required less frequently, this is an extremely cost effective solution not only for tyres - but for vinyl mouldings and rubber bumpers too.
Supplied in a spray bottle, 3M Tyre Restorer is simple to use. Any leftover residue can be quickly wiped up with a 3M Microfibre Detailing Cloth without the risk of staining. It's also the perfect partner for 3MTM Wheel and Tyre Cleaner: when combined, these two products can give tyres a completely new look and showroom quality finish.

features.feature: Restores a long lasting shine to tyres
Easy-to-use spray bottle
Produces a natural, deep black, non-glossy finish

3M 50970 473 ml Scratch and Swirl Remover
product.product_body: 3M polishing compounds are used and trusted by bodyshop and automotive professionals every day all over the world. Now, that industry leading technology has been adapted for the home user so that they too can benefit from this and achieve effective scratch removal. It can be applied by hand or by machine and is an ideal way to prepare your paintwork prior to wax application. Rather than fill in scratches and hide them, 3M Scratch Remover contains fine mineral abrasives to gently polish out and remove light scratches and swirls caused by car washing and everyday use.

product.title: Boat Polish - 3MTM Marine Clear Plastic Restorer & Polish
product.product_body:
3M Boat Polish - Restore Marine Plastic Clarity Water and weather can cause clear marine plastics to become dull and discoloured. Without maintenance, they can let down the overall appearance of your boat. The 3M range of boat cleaning products is designed specifically for the harsh marine environment, helping you to clean and extend the life of these materials, inside and out. Designed to safely remove fine scratches and haziness, 3M Marine Clear Plastic Restorer & Polish restores clarity to most marine plastic surfaces and is ideal for windshields and hatches.
Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.
This pack contains 1 x 250 ml bottle of 3M Marine Clear Plastic Restorer & Polish. Suitable for use on most tinted plastics; test for suitability in an inconspicuous area first. For best results on polycarbonate plastic, use with a machine.

features.feature: Safely removes fine scratches and haziness from marine plastics
Restores clarity to windshields and hatches
Improves the overall appearance of your boat
Suitable for most tinted plastics

product.title: 3MTM Marine Metal Restorer And Polish 500 ml Can
product.product_body:
3M Marine Metal Restorer & Polish has a light abrasive formulation that cleans, restores and polishes metal components in a single step. Designed to perform in harsh marine environments, it is suitable for use on interior and exterior stainless steel, brass, bronze, copper, chrome and other marine metals. Apply it by hand to remove rust, corrosion, oxidation and tarnish from fixings, window surrounds, railings and other bright work - and restore your boat's original lustre.
This pack contains 1 x 500 ml can of 3M Marine Metal Restorer & Polish. For best results apply by hand with a soft cloth.
Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.

features.feature: Cleans and restores marine metal components in one step
Removes rust, corrosion and tarnish
Restores original lustre
Suitable for interior and exterior use

product.title: Boat Wax - 3MTM Marine Ultra Performance Paste Wax
product.product_body:
When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Ultra Performance Paste Wax is a professional product with exceptional coverage that goes on easily and polishes off quickly, saving you time and effort. Its unique polymer technology combines the durability of acrylic with the soil-release and water-beading properties of silicone - so you get a deep shine that protects against UV damage for longer. Less time waxing, more time boating.
This pack contains 1 x 269g can of 3M Marine Ultra Performance Paste Boat Wax.
Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.

features.feature: High performance, professional boat wax
Carnauba wax base for long-lasting protection against uv damage
Leaves a high gloss finish on gel coats, painted and metal parts
Easy on, easy off formula with exceptional coverage

product.title: Boat Wax - 3MTM Marine Fibreglass Restorer and Wax (1 litre)
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax is a dual action product that removes imperfections like medium oxidisation, rust, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains to restore shine in half the time. This unique blend of rubbing compound and waxes is suitable for use on all fibreglass and gel coat repairs, where it leaves behind a hard coat of wax that protects surfaces from further damage caused by sunlight, salt water and pollutants. With 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax you combine two restoration steps into one - saving you money and leaving you more time to enjoy your boat. Ideal for fibreglass repair, gel coat restoration and general boat detailing

One step restores shine and protects from further damage

product.title: Boat Wax - 3MTM Marine Fibreglass Restorer and Wax 500ml Bottle
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax is a dual action product that removes imperfections like medium oxidisation, rust, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains to restore shine in half the time. This unique blend of rubbing compound and waxes is suitable for use on all fibreglass and gel coat repairs, where it leaves behind a hard coat of wax that protects surfaces from further damage caused by sunlight, salt water and pollutants. With 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax you combine two restoration steps into one - saving you money and leaving you more time to enjoy your boat. Ensure you read the safety data sheet before use http://multimedia.3m.com/mws/mediawebserver?mwsId=SSSSSuUn_zu8lzNvl82xM8tePv70k17zHvu9lxtD7SSSSSS--

product.title: Boat Wax - 3MTM ScotchgardTM Marine Protective Liquid Wax
product.product_body:
When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. ScotchgardTM Marine Protective Liquid Wax has an easy-on, easy-off formula that is quick and simple to apply. Suitable for use on marine fibreglass and gel coat, marine topside paints, painted aluminium and metal parts, the liquid bonds to surfaces to create a durable protective coating that reduces UV light damage, whilst also producing a deep shine with no swirl marks. Tests show that it is 33% more durable than other leading brands after 39 days - and this long-lasting formulation means less time waxing, more time boating.
This pack contains 1 x 500 ml bottle of ScotchgardTM Marine Protective Liquid Boat Wax. It can be applied by hand with a soft cloth or using a mechanical buffer. For best results, apply to small areas at a time.
Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.

features.feature: Liquid boat wax for a durable, high gloss finish
Protects against damage from sunlight, salt water and pollutants
Easy on, easy off formula is quick to apply
Suitable for use on marine fibreglass, gel coat, topside paints, painted aluminium and metal parts

product.title: Boat cleaner - 3MTM Marine Vinyl Cleaner 250 ml Bottle
product.product_body:
Plastics and vinyls are found all over modern and older vessels, and can let down the overall appearance of a boat if they are not maintained. The 3M range of boat cleaning products is designed specifically for the harsh marine environment, helping you to clean and extend the life of these materials inside and out.
3M Marine Vinyl Cleaner is a one-step product that conditions and protects vinyl, plastic and rubber surfaces as it cleans - creating a long-lasting protective barrier that withstands repeated cleaning and prevents damage from sunlight.
This pack contains 1 x 250 ml pump spray bottle of 3M Marine Vinyl Cleaner. Its unique gel formula is easier to control during application, for less wastage.
Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.

features.feature: Boat cleaner designed to perform in marine environments
Cleans, conditions and protects plastic, vinyl and rubber components
Suitable for use on interior and exterior surfaces
Gel formula for better control when applying

product.product_body: The foaming action of this glass cleaner means it will quickly clean glass but won't drip or run off the glass. That leaves you free to spray the product on all windows, leave it to work and then simply wipe off with a Microfibre Detailing Cloth. A final buff with a clean cloth will reveal the ultimate shine

product.title: 3M 3434 High Performance Masking Tape Blue (19mm)
ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface, 25.4mm x 54.8m (2080EL-24E) - 1 roll
product.product_body:
ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape gives you the opportunity to achieve a high quality, decorator’s finish to your project – without having to call in the professionals! Traditional masking tape products can leave messy edges and sticky, torn pieces of tape to ruin the effect of your hard work: This ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape features a flat backing, meaning that it sticks smoothly and securely but can be removed cleanly up to 60 days later with no residue or surface damage. It is UV/sunlight resistant so ideal for use on window frames. In addition, ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface features a 3M proprietary technology called Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector, which repels paint away from the edge of the tape to give you super sharp lines with no bleed-through or seepage underneath. ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface is perfect for everyone from DIY painters to commercial and residential professionals. Its low- to medium-adhesion means that it can be applied to freshly painted areas (24 hours old) and other delicate substrates; its flat backing allows for a super sharp line on smooth surfaces – great for design features, accent walls and stripes. What’s more, this tape can be removed cleanly, with no surface damage, up to 60 days later: perfect for longer-term projects or those that require work over several weekends. For easy identification, it now has the ScotchBlue logo and product number printed in orange on the tape itself. You’ll be able to find it easily in a drawer or tool box and know what you're choosing and using. This pack contains 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape Advanced Delicate Surface. The roll is 25.4mm wide and 54.8m long. Get the edge you deserve with ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface with Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector – for brilliant looks and unlimited ways to transform your space. ScotchBlue and Edge-Lock are trademarks of 3M Company.
1 x 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter's Tape

product.title: 3M 2080EL-2N Scotch Safe-Release With Edge-Lock Painter's Masking Tape
product.product_body: 2" blue painters tape. Safe-Release blue painters' masking tape is the most versatile tape on the market, improved with new advance Edge-Lock paint line protector. While it can be used for most any painting project, it is specially designed for safe use on delicate or damageable smooth surfaces. Safely releases from freshly painted surfaces that have dried for at least 1 day and vinly wallcoverings. Ideal for smooth surfaces, especially glass. It can stay up longer even in direct sunlight, up to 60 days, and removes clean with sharp edges. 2" W. x 60 yd.

product.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7-inch for Kids - (includes Bumper Cover and Carry Case )
product.product_body: With a bright, easy-to-use interface, kid-friendly app store, and durable case, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids is the ideal tablet for your kids' digital playing and learning time. Preloaded with top-ranked apps for kids, the lightweight Galaxy Tab 3 Kids also features a built-in camera and parental controls for access and time limits. It transforms from kid to standard mode so you can enjoy the same familiar features as a regular Galaxy Tab 3. The Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids features a kid-centric interface with bright colours and animated characters to make playing and learning more fun for your little one. Each app appears as a card that your child can select by simply tapping. Kids can personalise their play by adding their name, choosing a character to guide them, and changing the background. The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids has a brilliant 7-inch display, with HD 1024x600 resolution, so text is clearer and colours are brighter. The powerful 1.2 GHz dual-core processor makes it ideal for downloading apps and games, and watching your favorite movies. Samsung's Kids' Store is filled with top apps for learning and playing. The kid-friendly apps are organised by category, so your kids can browse apps based on their preferences. Instead of buying, kids add each app to a wish list that can be accessed through parental controls, letting you choose which ones to purchase. Not only will you have full control over what apps your kids buy and explore, you can also choose your own Google Play apps to add to the Kids Mode by simply checking off those apps in Application Manager. Add Skype if you want to let them video chat with Grandma, or add video apps like Netflix. The built-in camera is specially designed for kids to take pictures and shoot videos. They can use the 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera for silly faces, or flip it around to capture their surroundings with the 3-megapixel rear camera. Virtual stickers let them play pretend and dress up their pictures with different features and accessories. Kids Gallery and Kids Video store all their photos and videos so they can revisit their favorite shots. Parental control mode lets you access their work in your gallery and share with other relatives. The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids includes features just for parents, so you can hand over the tablet with peace of mind. A secure password entry gives you access to parental controls that let you set time restrictions on their usage, control what they view, and choose which apps you want to purchase. The drop-tested bump case is tough enough to withstand daily drops and spills. The soft cover is CPSC certified as a nontoxic material, so it's safe if your teething toddler gets hold of it. The lightweight, 7-inch design makes the Galaxy Tab 3 Kids ideal for little hands. It weighs less than 1lb, so it's easy for little ones to hold in their car seat or for you to carry in your purse or nappy bag. The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids allows you to easily switch from Kids Mode to standard mode, giving you access to the same interface and features of the regular Galaxy Tab 3. Both modes can coexist, so you can switch back and forth without losing content. This makes it easy for parents to stream videos and music, read e-books, or browse up to 750,000 apps from Google Play before switching back to Kids Mode. This tablet comes installed with Android 4.1.2, Jelly Bean, contains a 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, and has a 7-inch display with 1024x600 resolution, a 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera, and a 3-megapixel rear-facing camera. It also comes with 8GB of internal memory and features a microSD card slot (microSD card sold separately) that allows you to add up to 32GB of additional memory. The tablet measures 7.4 by 4.37 by 0.39 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.67lbs including the battery. Up to 7 hours battery life. Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids

Dibond Traffic is highest grade they make, carries a 12 year warranty for external use even in coastal area's where salt in the air significantly increases degradation

Only EU origin, high quality materials used, Genuine Dibond whereas a lot of people say they use Dibond but in fact use cheap sub standard chinese aluminium composites instead. Dibond is made by 3A Composites who will confirm we are approved users.

product.title: Avery Dennison Prismatic High Reflective Conspicuity Tape, For Rigid Surfaces, V-6701B Euro CT Yellow, 3 metres by 50mm
product.product_body: Many accidents are avoidable if the driver of the other vehicle had only been able to detect the truck. Reflective contour markings on trucks make detection easy, giving drivers time to see a vehicle, react and avoid a collision. In fact, NHTSA studies demonstrate 41 percent reduction in side and rear trailer impact when using conspicuity tape. Avery Dennison V-6700B Series Conspicuity Tape provides superior reflectivity and may help reduce accidents, prevent injuries and can decrease related costs such as repairs, insurance expenses and fees.

features.feature: Avery Dennison® V-6701B Series Conspicuity Tape meets the stringent requirements of the ECE 104, Class C regulation.
Designed for use on trucks and trailers with rigid surfaces, V-6700B provides superior reflectivity and enhanced nighttime safety.
It is a high quality, durable, microprismatic retroreflective material with a pressure sensitive adhesive. As with all our products it is of full EU origin, china is barred at SignLine.
The single layer construction does not require edge sealing.
50.8mm x 3m Strips, Available in Red, White and Yellow, Rolls available too.

product.title: Carbon Effect Cast Wrap Film from SignLine.
product.product_body:
A high grade of film, very nice carbon effect, gloss finish. If you bought 5000 metres of this branded, EU origin film, you would still be paying twice as much per metre than what BESTWAYTOYOU are saying they can sell it for. Fraudulent listing by BESTWAY. If you want to pass all our wealth to China buying sub standard materials then there are many (the majority) of other sellers for you. If you want High grades of branded materials of EU origin and are willing to pay the price for a clear conscience, then you are the clients we are here for and have been since 1994. If you covered the whole of China, The UK & The USA with trees & let them grow to maturity over 25+ years & never cut them down, you wouldn't neutralise even one year's worth of pollution buying products from China. Morally & ethically we cannot justify it here at SignLine regardless of any monetary savings, there is no monetary saving that justifies the destruction of the environment of our planet and all the life that it supports.
Therefore we do not supply any materials manufactured in the far east from undemocratic countries, that have few human rights and absolutely no animal welfare, skinning animals like cats and dogs while they are still alive, and they remain alive afterwards too, if only for a short, painful time, or the same countries that do not have to meet all the stringent regulations and standards to protect consumers and the environment as we have to do in the UK and the rest of Europe.
China accounts for 95% of all elephant poaching, slaughtered for their ivory, a recent haul in Africa of ivory bound for China contained the tusks of over 700 elephants, with all the wealth transferred to China based on their cheap prices the Chinese are now building in Africa and living there too, accelerating the demise of our planets largest land mammal and it's environment.

features.feature: A True Wrap Film
Gloss Finish
Highly Conformable
Better than Di-Noc for Intricate Shapes
High Grade Cast Film, EU Origin.

product.title: Avery Dennison Conspicuity Tape, For Flexible Surfaces, V-6772 B Red
product.product_body: Many accidents are avoidable if the driver of the other vehicle had only been able to detect the truck. Reflective contour markings on trucks make detection easy, giving drivers time to see a vehicle, react and avoid a collision. In fact, NHTSA studies demonstrate 41 percent reduction in side and rear trailer impact when using conspicuity tape. Avery Dennison V-6700B Series Conspicuity Tape provides superior reflectivity and may help reduce accidents, prevent injuries and can decrease related costs such as repairs, insurance expenses and fees.

features.feature: Avery Dennison® V-6750B Series Conspicuity Tape meets the stringent requirements of the ECE 104, Class C regulation.
Designed for use on PVC curtain sided vehicles, V-6750B provides superior reflectivity and enhanced night time safety.
It is a high quality, durable, microprismatic retro reflective material with a pressure sensitive adhesive.
The single layer construction does not require edge sealing.
50.8mm x 50m Rolls, Available in Red, White and Yellow

The single layer construction does not require edge sealing.
50.8mm x 50m Rolls, Available in Red, White and Yellow

product.title: Avery Dennison Conspicuity Tape, For Rigid Surfaces, V-6700 B Euro White
product.product_body: Many accidents are avoidable if the driver of the other vehicle had only been able to detect the truck. Reflective contour markings on trucks make detection easy, giving drivers time to see a vehicle, react and avoid a collision. In fact, NHTSA studies demonstrate 41 percent reduction in side and rear trailer impact when using conspicuity tape. Avery Dennison V-6700B Series Conspicuity Tape provides superior reflectivity and may help reduce accidents, prevent injuries and can decrease related costs such as repairs, insurance expenses and fees.

features.feature: Avery Dennison® V-6700B Series Conspicuity Tape meets the stringent requirements of the ECE 104, Class C regulation.
Designed for use on trucks and trailers with rigid surfaces, V-6700B provides superior reflectivity and enhanced night time safety.
It is a high quality, durable, microprismatic retro reflective material with a pressure sensitive adhesive.
The single layer construction does not require edge sealing.
50.8mm x 50m Rolls, Available in Red, White and Yellow

product.title: Pet Cross
product.product_body: Pet Cross For Pet Graves, Cross 785mm x 263mm, digital print applied to rear of 3mm Perspex cross, bonded to aluminium composite cross using Avery VHB tape, black post made from recycled materials 50mm x 50mm x 850mm. We cut the acrylic cross, apply the self adhesive print of the text and background colour, we fit the Dibond cross to the RP Post with countersunk fixings, we then use Avery vhb tape to fix the Perspex cross to the Dibond cross and to cover the screws, the product is then ready to install into ground which we recommend using post mix for.

features.feature: Pet Cross, you can have as little or as much wording as you like.
785mm x 265mm, Will outlast wooden versions by years without any of the maintenance.
You order, we wait until we receive your wording, we set a design and send to you for approval, once approved we manufacture the cross and despatch, then we take payment.
Made from high grade materials, gold text is 10 Year Avery 900QM Supercast High Metallic gold film, face cross is 3mm Perspex, base cross is 3mm Dibond aluminium composite.
The text is behind the Perspex cross, totally sealed in and made to be long term, I made one for my boy so now offer the same to all.
