product.title: Hedgehog Home (Self Assembly)
product.product_body: Sheet materials made from recycled materials, cnc routered to create grooves to bond the materials into. UK waste, made into sheet material by a UK company, machined by a UK company, to help UK wildlife. We appreciate this is more expensive than a wooden one, but that is the only comparison that can be made, other than that, they are worlds apart in terms of longevity and in providing a long term home for hedgehogs without any need to replace or maintain.

features.feature: Rot, insect, Predator and fungi Proof, outlasts wooden versions by years and years without any of the maintenance
Hedgehog friendly, easy to clean and keep free of insects, detachable roof for cleaning.
Will last for many many years without any treatment or maintenance, 5 year warranty.

Self Assembly version, we cnc router all the panels with grooves to bond panels into, we send you all the parts, the CT1 adhesive, all you need is a skelton gun, some masking tape, and about an hour to spare.
Helps endangered native animals to survive and populations to recover.

product.title: Picnic Table, 1.8m, Heavy Duty, Made from recycled materials being UK waste made into timber looking profiles, sustainable Endless supply of materials.
product.product_body: Heavy duty picnic table with 3 pairs of legs, in dark brown, prices include delivery to Norfolk and Suffolk of fully assembled product, outside of those area's it may be supplied part assembled for buyer to finish assembly. Hidden Fixings, very nice looking piece of outdoor furniture, totally weather proof, insect and fungi proof, all you can do is win over a wooden version. We can have more tree's and less waste using intelligent products like these!

features.feature: Heavy Duty, Maintenance Free, Hygeinic washable surface. Does not warp as some of these types of products from other suppliers do.
Sustainable supplies in the true sense, made from UK waste, made into profiles in the UK, manufactured by us a UK company
In dark brown, also available in black. 15 year manufacturers warranty on the profiles.
Reduces landfill, every 1 tonne used saves 1.66 tonnes of C02, these will outlast you, I and everyone alive on the planet today.
Vandal resistant, this product will outlast timber versions by decades, our furniture without any maintenance as wooden ones last so long you can hand them down in your will!

product.title: Goose and Duck Bath, Self Assembly, Bath Only, No Pumps, No Filters, No Geese!
product.product_body: All materials cnc routered to create grooves to bond panels into, supplied with adhesive for buyer to assemble, very easy assembly. I have had mine for 4 years now, in that time I have learnt the filter and pump in the photo are not up to the job, now I have a water butt as a filter, with a Clarke submersible pump capable of pumping solids, this is up to the job.

features.feature: Lighweight but Durable materials.
For installing into or onto level ground, earth or concrete, if above ground it must be framed for strength.
Washable surface, easy to keep clean.
Can and should be fitted with pump and filter by buyer to prevent stagnation.
Ample for use by 4 geese at a time or 12 ducks

product.title: Pig Board, 600mm x 600mm x 10mm, White.
product.product_body: Designed and produced in Norfolk by SignLine. We use our cnc router to cut these to shape, the machine is capable of cutting to any shape or font. All materials we use are of full EU origin, no Chinese rubbish here (you're barred!). Boards are easy to keep clean. They can be decorated as we did in one of the sample photo's but that would be for an additional charge. We also produce herd boards from the same materials. Pig boards are also available in 900mm x 600mm as in photo with our young lad holding one.

features.feature: Made from 10mm Dense Foam.
Cut To Shape With Cut-Out For Handle and Radius Corners.
Durable Material, of full EU origin.
Comfortable Weight Without Being Too Light or Heavy.
Manufactured in GB, (Norfolk)

product.title: Brooder Box for Poultry or Waterfowl
product.product_body: Made from sealed high quality materials this brooder is suitable for all young birds. Easy to clean out and a wipeable surface with proper care makes this a very good product for use in rearing birds.

features.feature: Very durable
Hygienic, easy to keep clean.
Nowhere for bugs to hide.
Chick friendly!
Adjustable useable area so as chicks grow and can cope with being away from lamp you can give them more area.

product.title: Picnic Table made from Recycled Products, Heavy Duty, Black, 1.5m x 1.44m, 25 year limited warranty on materials.
product.product_body: A picnic table made from UK recycled products, hidden countersunk and plugged fixings, comes in easy assembly package, table top is complete, buyer needs to fix seats and legs. This is not the same as the recycled plastic materials, those type have no manufacturers warranty, some are made in the UK but some are brought in from Europe, China etc, ours are totally 100% of UK origin. The Recycled plastic type is also full of holes in the centre, nothing wrong with that as we use that type too but the 25 year material used for this is totally solid.

features.feature: Manufactured using profiles made from recycled polymers and hardwoods
25 year limited manufacturers warranty on materials.
Durable, Hygienic, Maintenance Free.
This listing is for black, also available in brown.
Does not rot or splinter, insect proof.

product.product_body: A Fly Proof Cat Feeding Station, keeps flies off cat food whilst allowing your cat access to it. Foamalux framing for fly screens and recycled plastic profiles or wood for main framework, std door cat flap fitted.
